, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Previously, the Information Technology\n(Amendment) Act, 2008 made changes to the Information Technology Act, 2000 and\nadded the following two sections relating to Privacy:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Section 43A, which deals with implementation\nof reasonable security practices for sensitive personal data or information and\nprovides for the compensation of the person affected by wrongful loss or\nwrongful gain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Section 72A, which provides for imprisonment\nfor a period up to 3 years and/or a fine up to Rs. 500,000 for a person who\ncauses wrongful loss or wrongful gain by disclosing personal information of\nanother person while providing services under the terms of lawful contract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BALLS !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2011, India\npassed a new privacy package that included various new rules that apply to\ncompanies and consumers.&nbsp; &nbsp;A key aspect of the new rules requires that\nany organization that processes personal information must obtain written consent\nfrom the data subjects before undertaking certain activities. Application of the\nrule is still uncertain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Privacy laws can be\nbroadly classified into:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General privacy laws\nthat have an overall bearing on the personal information of individuals and\naffect the policies that govern many different areas of information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Specific privacy laws\nthat are designed to regulate specific types of information. Some examples\ninclude:--<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Financial privacy laws<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; In the United States, a Social Security number (SSN) is a nine-digit\nnumber issued to U.S. citizens, permanent residents, and temporary (working)\nresidents.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number is issued to\nan individual by the Social Security Administration, an independent agency of\nthe United States government.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although its primary purpose is to track\nindividuals for Social Security purposes, the Social Security number has become\na de facto national identification number for taxation and other purposes. Employee,\npatient, student, and credit records are sometimes indexed by Social Security\nnumber.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. Armed Forces\nhas used the Social Security number as an identification number for Army and\nAir Force personnel, Navy , Coast Guard and Marine Corps <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals use Social\nSecurity numbers to steal identities, allowing them to pillage resources,\nestablish credit or to hijack credit cards, bank accounts or debit cards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now the US Military has\nstarted a new stringent &nbsp;DoD\nidentification number replacing the Social Security number.. The DoD\nidentification number is a unique 10-digit number that is assigned to every\nperson with a direct relationship with the department.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The new number also\nwill be the service member's Geneva Convention identification number. Because\ncards will be replaced upon expiration, it will be approximately four years\nuntil all cards are replaced with the DoD ID number<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aadhaar &nbsp;is a 12-digit unique identification number..</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nFebruary 2017 , six employees of telecom service provider Reliance Jio were\narrested for the fraudulent use of fingerprints to activate and sell SIM cards.\nThere were also reports that month about Axis Bank and other entities storing\nand using biometric data without authorisation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">UNLESS LONG JAIL TERM (\nFAST TRACK ) &nbsp;IS INVOLVED THIS WILL\nCONTINUE.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aadhaar\u2019s design is\nbased on a centralised database called the Central Identities Data Repository\nthat stores every individual\u2019s demographic and biometric information. This must be fire proofed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Centralised databases\nare also vulnerable to errors and misuse by custodians of the database\nthemselves.&nbsp; My younger son could NOT\nlink his Aadhar card to pan card because these PAN CARD <span style=\"background-color: white;\">bastards</span> used initials\nfor his middle name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My driving license has\nAJITH instead of AJIT for the past two decades. The presence of one unique\nnumber for every individual across multiple public and private databases makes\nthe convergence of this information easier. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nine judges,\nthrough six concurring opinions held that privacy is a constitutionally\nprotected right that emerges from the right to life and liberty guaranteed by\nArticle 21 of the constitution, which is inseparable from the right to live\nwith dignity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 in The\nConstitution Of India :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">21. Protection of life\nand personal liberty No person shall be deprived of his life or personal\nliberty except according to procedure established by law<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 prohibits\nthe deprivation of the above rights EXCEPT ACCORDING TO&nbsp; A <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">PROCEDURE ESTABLISHED BY LAW</span></b>.&nbsp; &nbsp;Read the UPPER CASE part of this sentence a </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Zillion\ntimes</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE KNOW WHO OUR LAWMAKERS\nARE\u2014WE ELECT THEM.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>OUR JUDGES ARE NOT\nELECTED \u2013 NOR CAN THEY CREATE ANY LAWS<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THIS LAW RESTS WITH\nLAWMAKERS \u2013NOT WITH \u201cLOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 can only be\nclaimed when a person is deprived of his \u201clife\u201d or \u201cpersonal liberty\u201d by the\n\u201cState\u201d as defined in Article 12.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 applies to\nnatural persons. The right is available to every person and &nbsp;citizen .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fundamental Rights are\nthe basic rights of the people and the charter of rights contained in Part III\nof Constitution of India. &nbsp;&nbsp;It guarantees\ncivil liberties such that all Indians can lead their lives in peace and harmony\nas citizens of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY FOREIGN DESH DROHIS\u2014&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO FOREIGNER OR ALIEN CAN CLAIM THIS RIGHT \u2013 SO STOP YOUR PROPAGANDA ON TV AND MAIN\nSTREAM MEDIA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Part-III of the Indian\nconstitution from article 12 to 32, contains fundamental rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These include\nindividual rights common to most liberal democracies, such as equality before\nlaw, freedom of speech and expression, religious and cultural freedom and\npeaceful assembly, freedom to practice religion, and the right to constitutional\nremedies for the protection of civil rights by means of writs such as habeas\ncorpus, Mandamus, Prohibition, &nbsp;Certiorari\nand Quo Warranto. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Violation of these\nrights result in punishments as prescribed in the Indian Penal Code or other\nspecial laws, subject to discretion of the judiciary. The Fundamental Rights\nare defined as basic human freedoms that every Indian citizen has the right to\nenjoy for a proper and harmonious development of personality. These rights\nuniversally apply to all citizens, irrespective of race, place of birth,\nreligion, caste or gender.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aliens\n(persons who are not citizens) are only considered in matters like equality\nbefore law. <span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>REPEAT \u2013 ONLY IN MATTERS OF &nbsp;\u201cEQUALITY\n\u201c BEFORE LAW. &nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nare enforceable by the courts, subject to &nbsp;restrictions. &nbsp;<b>R</b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>EPEAT\u2014 SUBJECT TO RESTRICTIONS </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">READ\nTHE UPPERCASE PARTS OF THE TWO SENTENCES ABOVE A TRILLION TIMES</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">24th constitutional\namendment introduced a new Article 13(4) enabling Parliament to legislate on\nthe subjects of Part III of the constitution using its constituent powers per\nArticle 368 (1)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel is a country\nwhich opens its citizenship for all Jews on the earth. The Law of Return grants\nall Jews the right to immigrate to Israel and almost automatically Israeli\ncitizenship upon arrival in Israel. In 1970s the law of Return was expanded to grant\nthe same rights to the spouse if the Jew, the children of a Jew and their\nspouses, and he grandchildren of a Jew and their spouses, provided that the Jew\ndid not practice any other religion other than Judaism willingly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian laws, a\nforeign national will not be entitled to the same constitutional rights as a\ncitizen of a country will have.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Looking at the history of India, the framers of\nthe constitution found it better to keep a check on the Rights and privileges\nprovided to the foreigners. The main motive behind such a step is to stop the\nillegal activities by the infiltrators or trespassers, and to secure the\nsovereignty of the nation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although they are provided with the basic human\nrights, which they also deserve which are also mentioned in Universal\nDeclaration of Human Rights and belongto every person irrespective of their\nnationality, race, caste or sex, being a non-citizen of the country, they are\ndeprived of certain rights, which are exclusively reserved for the citizens of\nthe country<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE HAVE A CHIEF JUSTICE\nOF INDIA ( JS KHEHAR ) &nbsp;WHO IS HELLBENT\nON ALLOWING FOREIGN LAWYERS TO PRACTICE IN INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">I DON\u2019T WANT TO DISGRACE\nHIM FURTHER BY QUOTING THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aliens &nbsp;cannot hold any constitutional posts of the country,\nlike The President, Vice-President, Governor, ministers, etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">HULLO ITALIAN WAITRESS\nHULLOOOO-</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS ALIEN WOMAN TRIED TO BE PM WITH SUPPORT FROM JUDICIARY AND MEDIA</span><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.firstpost.com/politics/sonia-as-pm-in-2004-has-kalam-backtracked-or-is-swamy-wrong-362466.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.firstpost.com/politics/sonia-as-pm-in-2004-has-kalam-backtracked-or-is-swamy-wrong-362466.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2GyT9dqHxLk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2GyT9dqHxLk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rights given to the\nforeign nationals, such as right to equality before law, right to &nbsp;protection of life and personal liberty, are\nthose rights which every \u2019person\u2019 deserve, irrespective of his nationality and\nwhere he/she is residing, as in accordance with the Universal Declaration of\nHuman Rights.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian Constitution,\ncitizenship is dealt from article 5 to article 11, and also the Citizenship\nAct, 1955, has been enacted, which constitutes the exhaustive laws relating to the\ncitizenship of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although there are various variations in Indian laws\nguiding any person's citizenship, but largely, India follow the concept of jus\nsanguinis, that is citizenship by right of blood, as opposed to jus soli.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two concepts\nthat are followed in granting citizenship to any individual:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1- Jus soli<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2- Jus sanguinis<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These principles are\ngeneral employed for the determination of citizenship.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jus soli is the c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">oncept in which,\ncitizenship is determined by the place of birth and on the other hand jus\nsanguinis is the concept in which the citizenship or nationality is given based\non the fact that where had your parents or your ancestors reside so a child\nborn to Nigerian parents inside the Indian premises is Indian by the concept of\njus soli, but is of Nigerian nationality by jus sanguinis concept.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 19 of the\nConstitution of India provides for 6 basic fundamental rights, which is provided\nto each and every citizen of the country.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The foreigners are kept secluded from\nthese 6 fundamental rights, which means, they do not have right to:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1- Freedom of speech\nand expression<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2- Assemble peacefully\nand without arms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3- Form associations or\nunions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4- Move freely through\nthe territory of India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5- To reside and settle\nin any part of India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6- Practice any\nprofession or to carry any occupation, trade or business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PLUS MANY OTHERS\nDEPENDING ON THE SITUATION\u2014 THIS IS THE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE \u2013 NOT\nA COLLEGIUM LOSER LAWYER TURNED JUDGE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Along with all these\nrights, the foreigners are also secluded from the right to vote.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The freedom of speech\nand expression is a right, which every person should be entitled to, but the\nIndian Constitution does not give this right to foreigners. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although they have their\nsay in case of judicial proceedings going against them, but they cannot\nparticipate in political debate, or criticize the government, because when they\ndo not have the power to form the government, they also do not have the freedom\nto criticize the government. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these rights given\nin Article 19 of the constitution of India form the core rights which are only\ngranted to the citizens of the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If democracy means\ngovernment of the people, by the people, it is obvious, that every citizen must\nbe entitled to participate in the democratic process and in order to enable him\nto intelligently exercise his right of making a choice, free and general discussion\non public matters is absolute essential\u2014 aliens shall LAY OFF !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only those people, who\nare the citizens of the country, and are a part of the democratic setup, can have\nthe right to debate or have their say in any democratic process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">Jew Noam Chomsky \u2013 <b>FUCK\nOFF !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A foreigner cannot\nclaim right \u2018reside and settle in any part of the country\u2019. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The government has thus the unrestricted right\nto expel a foreigner &nbsp;\u2013&nbsp; <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS RIGHT BELONGS TO THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE\nNOT A LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGE <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read the UC words of\nthe para above a billion times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Right to form\nassociations given in the article 19(1) (c), of the constitution, is also not\nprovided to the foreigners.&nbsp; &nbsp;The main motive behind providing this right to\nour</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">citizens, is to enable them to form political\nparties, without which it is an impossible task to run a democratic setup of\ngovernment, especially that of the parliamentary type.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If this right to form\nassociations is given to foreigners as well, this would amount to the meaning\nthat they are equally rightful in forming political parties and participate in\nour political and democratic setup. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This move will allow\nthe non-citizens to form political parties in India, and contest elections,\nthereby, violating the principles for eligibility criteria as given in Part 5\nfor union, and in part 6 for states of the constitution , and will also pose a\nthreat to the sovereignty of the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian context, the\nIndian Constitution which deals with the fundamental rights in its part 3,\ngives every citizen 6 basic fundamental rights, which are only for its\ncitizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However , except for\narticle 15,16, 19,29 and 30, and the right to vote and constitutional posts,\nevery right given in the part 3 of the constitution of India is available to\nthe noncitizens, or is available to every \u2018person\u2019, irrespective of his/her\nnationality, and not specifically to the citizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On one hand, the Indian\nConstitution restricts the non-citizens from enjoying certain rights; on the\nother hand, they welcome them by extending to them all the human rights that\nthey deserve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some &nbsp;fundamental rights are those claims, which can\nbe made only by the itizens of the country and not by the foreigners or the\nnon-citizens. They have been reserved exclusively for the Indians and may have\nunwanted consequences if extended to foreigners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>In the constitutions of\nalmost ALL developed democracies, the word \u201ccitizen\u201d appears late in the text,\nnever in the first paragraph. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>We\nIndians are</b></span></span><b style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;like cats who fell in HOT water ( slavery ) and we are circumspect\nwith COLD water today</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The major exception to\nthis is the Indian Constitution. Here, unlike all others, the term \u201ccitizen\u201d\nmakes its appearance right there in the first sentence, that is, in the\nPreamble itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like the American\nConstitution ours too begins with the ringing words, \u201cWe the People\u2026.\u201d, but\nthat is where the similarity ends. While the word \u201ccitizen\u201d appears in our\nConstitution before the first sentence is over, one has to wait longer in the\nAmerican book for this word to make an entry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">IT IS A SHAME THAT\nADMIRAL LN RAMDASs DAUGHTER MARRIED A PAKISTANI MAN \u2014YET HE WAS MADE NAVAL CHIEF OF\nSTAFF.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sWnjUtZE-IM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sWnjUtZE-IM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS ANOTHER MATTER\nTHAT HE WAS NOT PRIVY TO THE NUCLEAR SECRETS OF THE NAVY\u2014 JUST LIKE GEORGE\nFERNANDES WAS NOT PRIVY TO THE NATIONS SECRETS AS A DEFENCE MINISTER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TWO PRIME MINISTERs OF\nINDIA WERE&nbsp; IN THE SAME \u201cUNTRUSTWORTHY\nBUCKET \u201c TOO. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THERE IS A CORE BUNCH OF HARDCORE &nbsp;DESH BHAKTS TO TAKE CARE OF THIS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS\nWILL ENDORSE ANY JUDGMENTS BY COLLEGIUM JUDGES AND NOT VICE VERSA\u2014&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>INDIAN MEIN\nSAALA ULTA CHAL RAHA HAI!&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NAHIN CHALEGA\u2014 SAYS \u201c WE\nTHE PEOPLE \u201c &nbsp;WHO ARE ABOVE THE\nCONSTITUTION !</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lawmakers MUST make\nconstitutional amendments to Part III of the constitution\u2014to <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>PRESERVE THE\nINTEGRITY OF THE WATAN AND TO PRESERVE DHARMA <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-size: large;\">Read the yellow &nbsp;UC words in the para above a million times</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of fundamental\nrights violation, Supreme court of India can be approached directly for\nultimate justice per Article 32. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nRights have their origins in many sources, including England's Bill of Rights,\nthe United States Bill of Rights and France's Declaration of the Rights of Man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone has the right\nto life, liberty --and the security of person. <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TO PROVIDE THIS SECURITY ( TO PEOPLE AND THE WATAN ) THE\nELECTED EXECUTIVE WILL DO ITS DUTIES AS DEEMED FIT- &nbsp; THEY DONT NEED ADVISE FROM LOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As human rights can\nonly attach to living beings, one might expect the right to life itself to be\nin some sense primary, since none of the other rights would have any value or\nutility without it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">But hey, in India\nBHARATMATA ( watan ) has her rights . We the people will sacrifice our lives\nfor this if need be.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WE THE\nPEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION , DON\u2019T CARE FOR PAST JUDGEMENT MADE BY\nCOLLEGIUM MELORDS.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ALL THESE\nMINDLESS &nbsp;JUDGEMENTS DEVOID OF NATURAL\nJUSTICE AND CONTEXT ARE FIT ONLY TO BE BURNT.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ANY JUDGEMENT\nWHICH HURTS THE WATAN AND GOOD CITIZENS IS NULL AND VOID.&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE\nWANT OUR CHILDREN TO BE FREE FROM HOMOSEXUALS -&nbsp;\n99.5% OF WHOM ARE PEDOPHILES<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE THE\nPEOPLE WILL NOT AFFORD \u201cREPUTATION\u201dTO ANY DESH DROHI OR TRAITOR&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What Art. 21 insists is\nthat &nbsp;deprivation ( of life or personal\nliberty) ought to be according to procedure established by law which must be\nfair, just and reasonable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>We the people will not\nallow an alien desh drohi like Ajmal Kasab to be protected by Article 21</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conferment of a\nperson, as a citizen of India, is governed by Articles 5 to 11 (Part II) of the\nConstitution of India. Article 9 of Indian Constitution says that a person who\nvoluntarily acquires citizenship of any other country is no longer an Indian\ncitizen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also, according to The Passports Act, a person has to surrender\nhis/her Indian passport and vote card and other Indian ID cards must not use\nafter other country citizenship. It is a punishable offence if the person fails\nto surrender the passport. Indian nationality law largely follows the jus\nsanguinis (citizenship by right of blood) as opposed to the jus soli\n(citizenship by right of birth within the territory).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The President of India is\ntermed the first Citizen of India. It is generally difficult to have dual\ncitizenship of India and another country, due to the provisions for loss of\nIndian nationality when an Indian national naturalizes in another country (see\n\"Loss of citizenship\" above), and the requirement to renounce one's\nexisting citizenships when naturalizing in India (see\n\"Naturalization\" above).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have a right against\nNOISE POLLUTION . &nbsp;&nbsp;Majority of India is woken up at 0445 hrs in\nthe morning by ear shattering AZAN calls from mosques which affect our REM\nsleep. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We will NOT allow judges to use\nArticle 21 selectively like Gandhi\u2019s AHIMSA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO SO SO-- Dera chief\nRam Rahim molested adult women ? &nbsp;&nbsp;What about Gandhi who slept nude with young\ngirls \u2013some with stigma of incest ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hey collegium Melords\u2014have\nyou applied Article 21 to UNTERTRIALS rotting in jail without trial for\ndecades?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving the widest\ninterpretation to Art 21, the following rights as fundamental rights within the\nscope of Art. 21:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to education<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to health<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to environment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to shelter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to privacy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to speedy trial<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right of the\nprisoners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to legal aid<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right against cruel\nand unusual punishment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right not to be\nsubjected to bonded labour<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right to travel\nabroad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right against\nsolitary confinement<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Right against\nhandcuffing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">THERE IS NO FUNDAMENTAL\nRIGHT GIVEN TO &nbsp;HOMOSEXUAL TO INSERT HIS\nSYPHILITIC PRICK INTO THE WEE SHIT HOLE OF HIS NEIGHBOURS SON\u2014USING PRIVACY\nLAWS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seven fundamental rights\nrecognized by the Indian constitution are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to equality:\nWhich includes equality before law, prohibition of discrimination on grounds of\nreligion, race, caste, gender or place of birth, and equality of opportunity in\nmatters of employment, abolition of untouchability and abolition of titles.\nRight to equality is provided from Article 14 to Article 18 of Indian\nconstitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to freedom: Which\nincludes freedom of speech and expression, assembly, association or union or\ncooperatives, movement, residence, and right to practice any profession or\noccupation, right to life and liberty, protection in respect to conviction in\noffences and protection against arrest and detention in certain cases. Right to\nfreedom is provided from Article 19 to 22 of constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right against\nexploitation: Which prohibits all forms of forced labour, child labour and\ntraffic of human beings. It is provided under Articles 23 and 24 of Indian\nconstitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to freedom of\nreligion: Which includes freedom of conscience and free profession, practice,\nand propagation of religion, freedom to manage religious affairs, freedom from\ncertain taxes and freedom from religious instructions in certain educational\ninstitutes. Article 25 to 28 enumerates the right to freedom of religion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cultural and\nEducational rights: Preserve the right of any section of citizens to conserve\ntheir culture, language or script, and right of minorities to establish and\nadminister educational institutions of their choice. Article 29 and Article 30\nof Indian constitution provides for cultural and educational rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to constitutional\nremedies: Which is present for enforcement of Fundamental Rights. It is\nprovided under Article 32 to 35 of Indian constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to Privacy: Which\nis an intrinsic part of Article 21 that protects life and liberty of the\ncitizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"></b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">OUR BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL , JUST CANT APPLY BODMAS -- ON RELIGIOUS FREEDOM AND SHATTERING EARDRUMS WITH AZAN ON LOUDSPEAKER AT 5 AM</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Right to Privacy\nis an integral part of Right to Life and Personal Liberty guaranteed in Article\n21 of the Constitution,\" the SC's nine- member &nbsp;MELORD &nbsp;bench ruled unanimously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WITHOUT AADHAR AND\nDIGITALISATION ( TO FACTOR IN FAMILY BASED COTTAGE INDUSTRIES IN GDP ) &nbsp;INDIA CANNOT BECOME THE PLANET NO 1 SUPERPOWER\nIN 16 YEARS .&nbsp;&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY HAVE I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO THAT DESH DROHIS WONT BE ABLE TO HIJACK\nTHE SYSTEM-&nbsp; IN FUTURE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>IN WHICH COUNTRY ON THIS PLANET CAN POLICE\nTORTURE AN ARMY COLONEL AND KEEP HIM IN JAIL FOR NINE YEARS WITHOUT TRIAL &nbsp; ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">KYA HO RAHA HAI ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
