Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/bilva-koovalam-tree-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1409390908850#c4766274955180939507\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 30, 2014 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\nNeither the ATS nor the NIA have been able to establish a case against Lt Col Srikant Prasad Purohit, till now.<br />\n<br />\nDespite probing the matter for almost three years the NIA has not been able to gather any evidence against him to charge sheet him.<br />\n<br />\nSo far there is NIL evidence against him in the 17 February 2007 Samjhauta Express blasts.<br />\n<br />\nThe Indian Army handed Colonel Purohit over to the Maharashtra ATS when he was in Madhya Pradesh learning Arabic for an undercover SIMI operation.<br />\n<br />\nAiding the colonel's defence is the testimony by 50 army personnel in the military court that he was, in reality, an infiltrator and NOT a conspirator.<br />\n<br />\nLt. Col. Prasad Shrikant Purohit has been in jail as an under-trial for over five years under the stringent MCOCA (Maharashtra Control of Organized Crime Act) -- which also put a black bag on \"terrorist\" cricketeer Shreeshant's head .<br />\n<br />\nWhy is he being denied bail?<br />\n<br />\nAt the time when Malegaon bomb blast case investigation was in progress, Purohit was undergoing a course in Arabic language in the AEC (Army Education Corps) Training College and Centre at Panchmarhi in Madhya Pradesh.<br />\n<br />\nHe had specifically requested this 18 months long course in writing and the same was strongly recommended by the Commanding Officer of Southern Command Liaison Unit of Military Intelligence, based on his service profile, experience and performance. Before that he was posted in Devlali in district Nashik as an Intelligence Officer of the Southern Command Liaison Unit, Pune.<br />\n<br />\nPurohit was deputed to the Intelligence Wing of the Indian Army after he suffered a serious knee injury during anti-terrorist operations in Kashmir. His knee had to be reconstructed and the doctors advised him not to undertake any serious physical activity such as running or mountain climbing. That made him unfit for resuming his earlier job in the Infantry Division of the Army.<br />\n<br />\nPurohit had developed an effective intelligence network and was successful in putting together useful information about the infamous terror group, SIMI (Students Islamic Movement of India) and its links with Pakistan\u2019s intelligence agency, the ISI (Inter Services Intelligence). Purohit\u2019s service record shows that he had received several commendation certificates for good performance. The Confidential Reports (CR\u2019s) by his seniors were also consistently positive. To quote a few:<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe officer (Lt. Col. Purohit) has infiltrated the SIMI and other underground outfits in the region through his capabilities and go getter attitude\u201d - Army\u2019s Confidential Report (31 Dec 06)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cHe (Lt. Col. Purohit) developed an effective informant network in the AOR [Area of Responsibility] which led to acquisition of Naxal propaganda, Maoists and Terrorists.\u201d - Army\u2019s Confidential Report (15th February 2008)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cMy heartiest congratulations to you and all ranks of the battalion for successful operations in Gen Area Rangai on 07 May 02 which led to the killing of two foreign terrorists and recovery of large quantity of war like stores\u201d - Brig. Prakash Menon, Commander, 68, Mountain Brigade (8 May 02)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cI am extremely pleased to learn about the achievements of your Cell in obtaining actionable intelligence relating to the terrorist activities in you AOR.\u201d - Lt. Col. Amitabh Joshi, Offg CO, 31, Composite Intelligence Unit (20 Mar 03)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cI am extremely pleased to learn about the achievements of your Cell in obtaining intelligence relating to presence of hard core terrorists at Thimaran Forest MZ 2980 in your AOR\u201d - Lt. Col. Amitabh Joshi, Offg CO, 31, Composite Intelligence Unit (04 Sep 03)<br />\n<br />\nWILL NARENDRA MODI PLAY VOTE BANK POLITICS OVER THIS OFFICER ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Aadhar must be the basis for this where a\ncitizen is identified by number and NOT name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even an idiot knows (\nleave our stupid media ) that the linkage of Aadhaar to the government\u2019s\nwelfare programs involving either subsidy or other benefits will remain\nunaffected by &nbsp;Supreme Court unanimous judgment\nupholding the right to privacy as a fundamental right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allocation of resources\nfor human development is coupled with a legitimate concern that the utilisation\nof resources should not be siphoned off for extraneous purposes. Data mining\nwith the object of ensuring that resources are properly deployed to legitimate\nbeneficiaries is a valid ground for the state to insist on the collection of\nauthentic data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\ngovernment data, there are 276 cash-based transfer schemes that are currently\ncovered under DBT ( direct benefit transfer ) and linked to Aadhaar. &nbsp;&nbsp;Another 52 \u201cin-kind schemes\u201d, that involve\ngovernment benefits in kind, are also linked to the identification number.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Routing government\nsubsidies through Aadhaar has ensured a saving of Rs 57,000 crore in the last\nnearly three years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Section 33 of the\nAadhaar Act the government cannot release data, except under compelling public\ninterest, which needs to be affirmed by the joint secretary in the home\nministry and vetted by a committee of the cabinet secretary, IT secretary and\nlaw secretary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The judgment just reads\nthat personal liberty is not an absolute right but liable to the restrictions\nprovided in the Constitution which will be examined on a case to case basis\u2014within\nthe PERIMETER OF CONTEXT and with NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) and fairness\nparamount<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>There must be a level\nheaded &nbsp;and sensitive balance between\nindividual interests and legitimate concerns of the WATAN.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Centre told the\nSupreme Court that the deadline for linking Aadhaar to various government schemes\nfor benefits will be extended till December 31 2017.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don\u2019t want the\nelected executive to be slaves of the collegium Judiciary in financial matters.\nEven Rajya Sabha should NOT have a say in financial matters.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the PAN was not\nlinked to the Aadhar, then Article 139AA of the Income Tax Act invalidates the\nPAN. So it is mandatory to link Aadhar to PAN card.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The provision of the\nIncome Tax Act is not a violation of Article 14 (Right to equality) and Article\n19 of the Constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are criminals in\nIndia with several PAN cards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How to Link Aadhar to\nPAN card:------<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Log in to the official\nwebsite of Income Tax www.incometaxindiaefiling.gov.in and click on the button\n\u201cLink Aadhar\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enter your Pan card\nnumber and Aadhar number. Enter the name written on Aadhar card.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any important details\nare being asked here will be filled. If the details given in the Aadhar card\nand PAN card are different, you will first have to change the details (in any\none of them) and make it same. If the details given in the Aadhar and PAN are\nthe same, they will be easily linked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BUT COMMIE CUNTS IN THE\nAADHAR CARD DEPT HAVE DELIBERATELY USED <span style=\"color: red;\">NAME INITIALS </span>AND FUCKED UP THE SYSTEM.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS\nWAS DONE TO HELP TERRORISTS .&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">OUR SYSTEM IS ROTTEN FROM WITHIN. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keeping many PAN cards\nof people and shell companies caused the loss of tax of thousands of crores to\nthe government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to prevent the\nfraud from identifying the deceased, the government has made it mandatory to\ngive the Aadhar number of the deceased to get the death certificate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aadhar must be linked\nto driving licence and for &nbsp;registration\nof the vehicle.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U. S. Constitution\ncontains no express right to privacy.&nbsp;\nThe Bill of Rights, however, reflects the concern of James Madison and\nother framers for protecting specific aspects of privacy, such as the privacy\nof beliefs (1st Amendment), privacy of the home against demands that it be used\nto house soldiers (3rd Amendment), privacy of the person and possessions as\nagainst unreasonable searches (4th Amendment), and the 5th Amendment's\nprivilege against self-incrimination, which provides protection for the privacy\nof personal information.&nbsp; In addition,\nthe Ninth Amendment states that the \"enumeration of certain rights\"\nin the Bill of Rights \"shall not be construed to deny or disparage other\nrights retained by the people.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">IN INDIA WE THE PEOPLE\nWILL NOT ALLOW TERRORISTS , NAXALS AND SEPARATISTS TO HIDE BEHIND PRIVACY LAWS,\nEVEN IF NHRC, COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND BENAMI MEDIA WANTS IT. &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loser lawyers\nturned Judges\u2014the bottom of the cerebral barrel at school, do NOT understand\nthat privacy as a concept cannot be defined, and should therefore not be\nrecognised as a specific right under the Constitution.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>We the people will\nallow this only on A CASE TO CASE BASIS , within the PERIMETER OF CONTEXT in\nconsonance to NATURAL JUSTICE .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION\nDOES NOT PROTECT ANY DESH DROHI \u2013ESPECIALLY THOSE WHO POINT A FOREIGN GUN AT\nBHARATMATA</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We will not allow , the\nright to privacy to hide the naked truth.&nbsp;\nGood people who have nothing tohide do not need a veil of privacy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The apex Court has\nrecognised sexual orientation as an essential attribute of privacy and dignity.\nWell Melords\u2014we don\u2019t have a problem with homosexual creatures as long as they\nare NOT pedophiles.&nbsp; The reality is 99.5%\nof homosexuals are pedophiles<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The challenge to the\nAadhaar Act is still pending, and will now be heard by the Supreme Court in the\ncontext of last week's judgment, among other things. The collegium judiciary\nhas NO right to rule on aadhar. We the people want the elected executive to\ncall the shots\u2014of course we want the data NOT to be compromised to criminals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE KNOW WHY ROTHSCHILDs\nFOREIGN KOSHER MEDIA IS CELEBRATING .&nbsp; WE\nARE NOT IDIOTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2017/08/30/opinion/india-privacy.html?mcubz=3\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.nytimes.com/2017/08/30/opinion/india-privacy.html?mcubz=3</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\u201cOur society prospers\nin the shadow of its drapes,\u201d the SUPERME court wrote, \u201cwhich let in sunshine\nand reflect a multitude of hues based on language, religion, culture and\nideologies.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">OH BOY, I AM TOUCHED &nbsp;\u2014SUCH ERUDITE\nJUDGES ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">WELL THEY MUST BE THE CREAM OF\nTHE &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL , EVEN ABOVE THE IIT STUDENTS\u2014THESE CANT BE THE BOTTOM\nDREGS RIGHT ?</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WRONG !<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">THANK GOD THEY DID NOT\nINVOKE SIGMUND FREUD INTO THEIR \u201cELOQUENT\u201d 547 PAGE BHAARDEEKT --NAY VERDICT</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Privacy, &nbsp;is not suitable for a developing country like\nIndia where the majority of the masses don't even have access to basic services\nand lakhs don\u2019t have homes \u2013where corruption is rife . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judgements and laws established in other developed\nWestern nations have no applicability in India, where the reality is very\ndifferent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE \u201cGREEN REVOLUTION\u201d WAS ADOPTED BY DESH\nDROHIS IN INDIA.&nbsp; THE SOIL IS ISRAEL OR\nHOLLAND OR USA IS NOT THE SAME AS HOLY INDIAN TOPSOIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">YET WE APED THE WEST AND BROUGHT IN\nARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND CHEMICAL PESTICIDES WHICH DECIMATED OUR PRICELESS\nTOP SOIL AND ITS PRECIOUS MICROBES --WHICH GAVE US FOOD OF THE \u201cGOLDEN MEAN\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR FOOD WAS PREVENTIVE MEDICINE-- NOT ANYMORE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
