font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>I am the only person to ever support Pol Pot\u2014everybody\nknows this <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>But even a 8 year old child who reads the\npost below, will cry\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>CAPTAIN IS 100% RIGHT\u2014&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ONLY CAPTAIN CAN THINK\nCLEARLY AND FEARLESSLY ON THIS PLANET.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE RIGHT TO PRIVACY IS GRANTED BY \u201cNATURAL\nJUSTICE\u201d&nbsp; ( DHARMA ) AND NOT BY THE\nCONSTITUTION</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Indian constitution lays down the\nframework defining fundamental political principles, establishes the structure,\nprocedures, powers and duties of government institutions and sets out\nfundamental rights, directive principles and the duties of citizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The constitution was adopted by the \u201dConstituent\nAssembly\u201d on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India celebrates its coming into force on 26\nJanuary each year, as Republic Day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the Constitution of India came into\nforce on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India ceased\nto be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic\nrepublic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>An idea for a Constituent Assembly of India\nwas proposed in 1934 by Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent M. N. Roy, the founder of the Indian\n&nbsp;Communist movement in India . &nbsp;MN Roy\nhad a JEWESS honey trap wife named Evelyn Trent</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Constituent Assembly was established\nwhile India was under British rule.. The Constituent Assembly had 299\nrepresentatives, including nine women.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Institutions of governance \u2013 the Parliament,\nthe President, the Judiciary, the Executive, etc. get their power from the Constitution\nand are bound by it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With the aid of the Constitution, India is\ngoverned by a parliamentary system of government with the executive directly\naccountable to the legislature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The process of addition, variation or repeal\nof any part of the constitution by the parliament under its constituent powers,\nis called amendment of the constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The procedure is laid out in Article 368. An\namendment bill must be passed by each House of the Parliament by a majority of\nthe total membership of that House when at least two-thirds members are present\nand voted. In addition to this, certain amendments which pertain to the federal\nnature of the Constitution must be ratified by a majority of state\nlegislatures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike the ordinary bills under legislative powers of Parliament\nas per Article 245 (with exception to money bills), there is no provision for\njoint sitting of the two houses (Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha) of the parliament\nto pass a constitutional amendment bill<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Supreme Court has ruled in Kesavananda\nBharati v. State of Kerala case that, while amending anything in the\nConstitution, it cannot tinker with the \"basic structure\" or its\nframework, which is immutable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>WE DON\u2019T WANT COLLEGIUM &nbsp;JUDICIARY ( WHICH HAS ZERO TRANSPARENCY ) TO\nHAVE SUCH SWEEPING POWERS .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Indian constitution, Judicial review\nis dealt with under Article 13. Judicial Review refers that the Constitution is\nthe supreme power of the nation and all laws are under its supremacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IT IS NOT ETCHED ON ROCK . </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Constitution's provisions have\nconsciously been worded in generalities, though not in vague terms, instead of\nmaking them rigid and static with a fixed meaning or content as in an ordinary\nstatute, so that they may be interpreted by coming generations of citizens with\nthe <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ONWARD MARCH OF TIME</b>, to apply to <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NEW AND EVER CHANGING AND DEMANDING\nSITUATIONS</b>, making the Constitution a living and an organic document.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Rigidity\ntends to check progressive legislation or gradual innovation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>ONLY A FLEXIBLE DYNAMIC CONSTITUTION CAN\nSURVIVE THE TEST OF TIME.&nbsp;&nbsp; </b></span>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN 1947 WHO WOULD EVEN IMAGINE OF\nDIGITIZATION OF INDIAN ECONOMY AND OF SOMETHING CALLED</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"> GST .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_amendments_of_the_Constitution_of_India\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_amendments_of_the_Constitution_of_India</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is a document intended \u201cto endure for\nages\u201d and therefore, it has to be interpreted not merely on the basis of the\nintention and understanding of the its framers but on the experience of its\nworking effectively, in the existing social and political context.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jawaharlal Nehru spAke in\nthe Constituent Assembly on 8 November 1948, \"While we want this Constitution\nto be as solid and as permanent a structure as we can make it, nevertheless\nthere is no permanence in Constitutions. There should be a certain flexibility.\nIf you make anything rigid and permanent, you stop a nation\u2019s growth, the\ngrowth of a living, vital, organic people. Therefore, it has to be flexible ...\nwhile we, who are assembled in this House, undoubtedly represent the people of\nIndia, nevertheless I think it can be said, and truthfully, that when a new\nHouse, by whatever name it goes, is elected in terms of this Constitution, and\nevery adult in India has the right to vote - man and woman - the House that\nemerges then will certainly be fully representative of every section of the\nIndian people. It is right that House elected so - under this Constitution of\ncourse it will have the right to do anything - should have an easy opportunity\nto make such changes as it wants to. But in any event, we should not make a\nConstitution, such as some other great countries have, which are so rigid that\nthey do not and cannot be adapted easily to changing conditions. Today\nespecially, when the world is in turmoil and we are passing through a very\nswift period of transition, what we may do today may not be wholly applicable\ntomorrow. Therefore, while we make a Constitution which is sound and as basic\nas we can, it should also be flexible ...\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>RIGHT TO LIFE &nbsp;as guaranteed under Article 21, has by\ninterpretation been expanded to progressively mean a whole lot of human rights</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A constitution is not a parchment of paper,\nit is a way of life and has to be lived up to.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Eternal vigilance is the price\nof liberty and in the final analysis, its only keepers are <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE THE PEOPLE.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT\nACTS AGAINST THE WATAN</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT\nGOES AGAINST THE PRINCIPLE OF DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL\u2014THESE\n\u201cLOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES\u201d DON\u2019T SEEM TO UNDERSTAND THIS</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The procedure of amendment in the\nconstitution is laid down in Part XX (Article 368) of the Constitution of\nIndia.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">This procedure ensures the sanctity of the Constitution of India and\nkeeps a check on arbitrary power of the Parliament of India and also EXTREME\nJUDICIAL OVERREACH&nbsp; by Collegium\nJudiciary which is NOT sanctioned by the Constitution</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ILLEGAL SOLLEGIUM SYSTEM which is the\ncurrent method for appointing judges to High Courts and Supreme Court, came\ninto existence in 1993 with a judgment of the Supreme Court in Second Judges\ncase.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE THE PEOPLE ARE ANGRY \u2013NAY- PISSED OFF with\nthe &nbsp;Collegium Judiciary for instances of\nnepotism, favouritism and elevation of incompetent judges<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Modi Govt had introduced the National\nJudicial Appointments Commission (NJAC) by way of a Constitutional amendment to\novercome the Second Judges case and thereby, do away with the Collegium system.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Supreme Court had, in another instance EXTREME\nJUDICIAL OVER REACH&nbsp; however, struck down\nthe said amendment as unconstitutional.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Justice Chelameswar was highly critical of\nthe manner in which the Collegium functioned. He wrote-- &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">\u201cHave we really outgrown the malady of\ndependence or merely transferred it from the political to judicial hierarchy?\u201d</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Subsequently, Chelameswar J. had refrained\nfrom attending Collegium meetings last year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The framers of our Constitution and WE THE\nPEOPLE did not intend the judiciary to be \u201csuperior\u201d to elected Parliament and\nthe elected executive, but intended it to be the sentinel on the qui vive\nshould the other two wings overstep the boundaries of their jurisdiction or\nomit to discharge their duty as public trustees.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY DO NOT UNDERSTAND THE\nCONSTITUTION NOR THEY HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO APLY BODMAS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Under Article 145(1), the Supreme Court can\nmake rules for regulating the practice and procedure of the court, which is\nessentially a legislative function.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">However, such power can be exercised ONLY\nREPEAT ONLY &nbsp;with the EXPRESS APPROVAL OF\nTHE PRESIDENT &nbsp;and is SUBJECT &nbsp;to the provisions of any law made by PARLIAMENT.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Collegium Judiciary CANNOT exercise\nadjudicatory power, without any CHECKS AND BALANCES .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This &nbsp;would be destructive of the basic feature of\ndemocracy, and if not forthwith remedied, would dilute the very essence of a\ndemocratic form of governance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The<span style=\"color: red;\"><b> ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY</b></span> has never\never been &nbsp;accountable in the manner that\nthe elected executive is accountable.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">These Melords keep pointing fingers without\nany sense of accountability. &nbsp; If these Judges were Captains of ships they would\nbe thrown overboard by the crew within 24 hours</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is a constitutional imperative that an\nauthority must be accountable if it wields power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since the appointment of judges is an\nexecutive function and not an adjudicatory function, accountability follows as\nits inseparable concomitant. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Presently, in matters of judicial appointment, the\naccountability seems to lie neither with the judiciary nor with the executive.\nSuch a situation is without precedent, in our country or elsewhere.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHY DO WE NEED A PRESIDENT ?<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE THE PEOPLE have the ULTIMATE STAKE &nbsp;in the general administration of justice and\nthe government is the elected trustee of public interest. &nbsp;Therefore, it must &nbsp;be allowed to have a say in the appointment of\njudges<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The ELECTED EXECUTIVE now been reduced to a\n\u201crubber stamp\u201d in the matter of appointment of judges.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">AS PER THE LAW THESE DELIBERATELY ERRING &nbsp;JUDGES CAN GO TO JAIL\nAND BE DENIED OF THEIR RETIREMENT BENEFITS</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>HULLO PM MODI\u2014&nbsp;&nbsp; DO YOU HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO\nUNDERSTAND THIS SIMPLE TRUTH ? &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">DO YOU\nAND THE PRESIDENT&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">KHO KHO KOVINDA</span><span style=\"color: magenta;\"> KNOW YOUR OWN POWERS ?</span></span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></span></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/H9ySOP8PYEI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/H9ySOP8PYEI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The \u201cprimacy\u201d of the judiciary was neither\nintended nor provided for by the Constituent Assembly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The primacy of the chief justice of India or\na collegium of judges cannot be part of the basic structure of the\nConstitution. A collegium of five judges curtails the discretion of the\npresident, enshrined in Article 124(2), to consult such judges of the Supreme\nCourt and high courts as he may \u201cdeem necessary for the purpose\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;If the\npresident deems it necessary to consult more than five </span><b style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 14pt;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">LORD FUCKLANDS</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">-- nay \u2014COLLEGIUM\nJUDGES of the Supreme Court, judges of the high court and other judges of the\nSupreme Court (not part of the collegium), who unanimously or by a majority\ngive an opinion contrary to that of the collegium, the president would\nnevertheless be bound by the opinion of the</span><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"> ILLEGAL MAFIA collegium.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is ridiculous nay- NULL AND VOID &nbsp;as it breaches of the letter and spirit of the\nConstitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The parameter for judicial review of a\nconstitution amendment is very narrow, because democracy is based on the\nprinciple of majority. In exercising the power of judicial review, the courts\ncannot be oblivious of the practical needs of the government\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judicial review\nis not intended to create what is sometimes called judicial oligarchy, the\naristocracy of the robe, covert legislation, or judge-made law. The proper\nforum to fight for the wise use of the legislative authority is that of public\nopinion and legislative assemblies. Such contest cannot be transferred to the\njudicial arena<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>HULLO PM MODI \u2013DO YOU HAVE BALLS ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE THE PEOPLE ARE ABOVE THE\nCONSTITUTION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE WHICH YOU HEAD PM MODI\nIS JUST A TRUSTEE OF \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d\u2014WE DEMAND AN EXPLANATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The constitutional amendment in relation to\nappointment of judges was passed with an overwhelming majority in both the\nhouses of Parliament, with only one dissent \u2013of a HALF WIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE THE PEOPLE DEMAND THAT THE COLLEGIUM\nJUDICIARY BE DISBANDED IMMEDIATELY</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Article 145(3) states that a MINIMUM OF FIVE\njudges are to sit for the purpose of deciding any case involving a substantial\nquestion of law pertaining to interpretation of the Constitution or a\npresidential reference under Article 143. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The use of the word \u201cminimum\u201d implies that\nthe composition of the bench has to be decided according to the needs of the\ntime and the importance of the constitutional question. A minimum of five\njudges was prescribed when the total strength of judges was seven, which later\nhas increased to THIRTY ONE now.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although Parliament\nmust preserve the basic framework of the Constitution, there is no other\nlimitation placed upon the amending power, meaning that there is absolutely no &nbsp;provision of the Constitution that cannot be\namended.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court first\nstruck down a constitutional amendment in 1967, on the basis that it violated\nArticle 13: \"The State shall not make any law which takes away or abridges\nthe rights conferred by [the charter of Fundamental Rights]\". The term\n\"law\" in this article was interpreted as including a constitutional\namendment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parliament showed BALLS\nand responded by enacting the twenty-fourth Amendment of the Constitution of\nIndia which declared that \"nothing in Article 13 shall apply to any\namendment of this Constitution\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current limitation\non amendments comes from Kesavananda Bharati v. The State of Kerala, where the\nSupreme Court ruled that amendments of the constitution must respect the\n\"basic structure\" of the constitution, and certain fundamental\nfeatures of the constitution cannot be altered by amendment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parliament<b style=\"background-color: white;\"> RIGHTLY</b>\nremoved this limitation by enacting the Forty-second Amendment, which declared,\namong other provisions, that \"there shall be no limitation whatever on the\nconstituent power of Parliament to amend ...this Constitution\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, this change was itself later <b style=\"background-color: white;\">ILLEGALLY\n</b>declared invalid by the Supreme Court in Minerva Mills v. Union of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judicial\ncorruption has been around ever since the system of courts evolved in the\nCommon Law of the United Kingdom, and passed on to India by JEW Rothschild as a\ncolonial legacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: orange; font-size: large;\">There\nare NO checks and balances in selection of Judges \u2013and we know that this\nprocess is controlled from abroad as is the case with JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nRead all 11 parts of the post below-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any\nform of authoritarianism is a danger to the fundamental rights of citizens.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The Collegium judiciary has developed the\nmindset that it is above the law. &nbsp; We the people would not have minded if these\njudges were the CREAM of the school cerebral barrel-- and not the bottom dregs<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Britain\nwhose constitution was lifted by Jew Rothschild and given to BR Ambedkar and\nteam is a flexible constitution.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nFLEXIBLE constitution is one in which the legislature may amended the\nconstitution's content and principles through use of the ordinary legislative\nprocess.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE\nARE COMMIE IDIOTS WHO STILL KEEP THE OLD CATHODE RAY TUBE TV IN THEIR LIVING\nROOMS.&nbsp; THE WORLD HAS MOVED ON, THESE\nPATHETIC COMMIE WORMS CANNOT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nUnited Kingdom does not have one specific constitutional document named as\nsuch. Instead, the so called constitution of the United Kingdom is a sum of\nlaws and principles that make up the body politic of the UK. This is sometimes\nreferred to as an \"unwritten\" or uncodified constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nBritish constitution primarily draws from four sources: statute law (laws\npassed by the legislature), common law (laws established through court\njudgments), parliamentary conventions, and works of authority. Similar to a\nwritten constitution, this sum also concerns both the relationship between the\nindividual and the state, and the functioning of the legislature, the executive\nand judiciary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Britain\n, the Parliament is the supreme law-making body: its Acts are the highest\nsource of English law. &nbsp;According to the\ndoctrine of parliamentary sovereignty, the UK Parliament may pass any\nlegislation that it wishes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Israel\nas of 2017 functions according to a FLEXIBLE uncodified constitution consisting\nof both material constitutional law, based upon cases and precedents, common\nlaw, and the provisions of these formal statutes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\ncontrast, in India we have a codified constitution, the legislature is normally\nforbidden from passing laws that contradict that constitution: constitutional\namendments require a special procedure that is more arduous than that for\nregular laws.&nbsp; By allowing this we CRUSH\ninnovation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nflexible constitution can be amended by ordinary law making exercise while a\nrigid constitution can be amended by a very difficult and special procedure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nConstitution can be amended in three ways such as:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nParliament can alter or modify many of the laws of the Constitution by a simple\nmajority as is required for ordinary legislations. For instance the Parliament\ncan deal with the abolition or creation of Legislative Councils (Article 169).\nFurther, the Parliament can change the name of boundaries, areas etc. of States\nthrough simple majority; and these changes don\u2019t even need to done via a\nConstitutional Amendment Bill. These are examples of most flexible provisions\nof the constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Parliament\ncan amend other major parts of the Constitution with special majority (a\nmajority of not less than 2/3 of the members of each House present and majority\nof them voting) as mentioned in Article 368. This process can be semi-rigid and\nexamples include those amendments needed for inclusion / exclusion of\nfundamental special right, special provisions for SC/ST, special provisions for\nsome regions etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\namendments to certain features affecting the federal structure of Indian State\nrequires special majority with ratification by half of the States. Provisions\nrelated to election to the President and its manner; extent of the executive\npower of the Union and the states; Supreme Court and high courts etc. fall\nunder this. These are examples of a rigid constitution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Despite\nits rigidity , the Indian constitution has been amended &nbsp;101 times since its enactment. Had it been\nrigid, it was not possible to amend it almost twice a year. Amendment No 101 doe\non 1<sup>st</sup> July 2017 is about GST.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\nare two types of amendments to the constitution which are governed by article\n368:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nfirst type includes amendments that can be effected by Parliament of India by a\nprescribed \u2018special majority\u2019; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nsecond type of amendments includes those that require, in addition to such\n\"special majority\", ratification by at least one half of the State\nLegislatures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Amending\nthe Constitution of India is the process of making changes to the nation's\nfundamental law or supreme law. The procedure of amendment in the constitution\nis laid down in Part XX (Article 368) of the Constitution of India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nbasic structure doctrine is an Indian judicial principle that the Constitution\nof India has certain basic features that cannot be altered or destroyed through\namendments by the parliament.&nbsp; &nbsp;Key among these \"basic features\",\nare the fundamental rights granted to individuals by the constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE ABSOLUTE\nRIGHT TO PRIVACY IS NOT A FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT\u2014AS IT WILL HELP DESH DROHIS AND\nFOREIGN FUNDED TRAITORS WHO POINT A GUN AT BHARATMATA. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE\nBOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL\u2014OUR \u201cLOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES\u201d DO\nNOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND THIS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE\nKNOW THE NEXUS BETWEEN THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND THE BENAMI MEDIA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nMelords of the Collegium Judiciary do NOT even understand what is the meaning\nof &nbsp;altering this \"basic\nstructure\" of the Constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NO\nNATION CAN PROGRESS WITHOUT INNOVATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We must\nnurture a climate where innovation happens.&nbsp;\nWith such low quality brains in the Judiciary it is NOT possible\u2014the Collegium\nJudicial system &nbsp;kills creativity. &nbsp; &nbsp;They\nwant us to hang film roll cameras around our necks in this digital camera\nage.&nbsp; If these pathetic Judges send a\nrocket to Mars it will never reach the destination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nis why we need a selection process by way of an all India exam like IIT JEE to\nselect judges. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Innovation\nmust be &nbsp;evolutionary and not a\nrevolutionary panic response to change. I am this planet\u2019s No 1 CHANGE MANAGER \u2013\nI know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To\ninnovate is not to reform, but to bring useful change. Changes need not be\ninnovations but innovations are changes. Application of creativity is\ninnovation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judges\nwork behind a veil of secrecy .&nbsp; While\nthe elected Parliament &nbsp;brainstorm to get\nfeedback.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We can\nsense the drift of change and ensure that we are aligned to it in advance as\nsurely as a ship enters a narrow channel. We take change by hand before it\ntakes us by the throat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At sea\nI never allowed my creative wild geese to fly in military formation. This is\nwhy Capt Ajit Vadakayil is a LIVING LEGEND at sea. &nbsp; &nbsp;Innovate or die was my slogan. &nbsp; &nbsp;People know\nthat at sea I flouted all laid down procedures ( by stupid white men ) , but my\nshore bosses dared not punish me as my own procedures were perfect .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our\norganisational gatekeepers frame the environment that enables innovation,\nhowever innovation is enacted \u2013 recognised, developed, applied and adopted \u2013\nthrough individual employees.. &nbsp; Collective synergy of experience and expertise,\naccented with harmony, loyalty and camaraderie was indisputably our core asset.\nHow may of you think that our Melord Judges can understand this small simple para\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We must\nhave a commitment not to allow our MINDLESS OUTDATED policies , RIGID&nbsp; procedures and MEANINGLESS MELORD rituals to\nget in the way of innovation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I have\nworked for a lot of ignorant companies, who confuse goals with values. Their\ncollective noses are stuck forever in a knothole. They get their knickers in a\ntwist when they are reminded that --&nbsp; \"A\ngoal is something you intend to accomplish. A value is something you believe\nin\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nbasic features of the Constitution have not been explicitly defined by the Judiciary,\nand the claim of any particular feature of the Constitution to be a\n\"basic\" feature MUST be determined by the Court in each case that\ncomes before it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But hey\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN\nHAVE OUR \u201cJUSTICE IS BLIND\u201d MELORDS EVER UNDERSTOOD PERIMETER OF CONTEXT &nbsp;OR THE MEANING OF BODMAS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">AT\nSCHOOL IN MATH CLASSES IF A STUDENT DID NOT UNDERSTAND </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BODMAS </span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">\u2013 HE IS CALLED A\nCUNT .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THESE RIGID\nMINDED MELORDS IF MADE CAPTAIN OF A SHIP WILL RUSH INTO AN ONCOMING TYPHOON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any\npart of the Constitution is amendable and that the Parliament might, by passing\na Constitution Amendment Act in compliance with the requirements of article\n368, amend any provision of the Constitution, including the Fundamental Rights\nand article 368.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some\nof the features of the Constitution termed as \"basic\" are listed\nbelow:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Supremacy\nof the Constitution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rule\nof law<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nprinciple of Separation of Powers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nobjectives specified in the Preamble to the Constitution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judicial\nReview<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Articles\n32 and 226<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Federalism\n(including financial liberty of states under Articles 282 and 293)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Secularism<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSovereign, Democratic, Republican structure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Freedom\nand dignity of the individual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unity\nand integrity of the Nation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nprinciple of equality, not every feature of equality, but the quintessence of\nequal justice;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\n\"essence\" of other Fundamental Rights in Part III<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nconcept of social and economic justice \u2014 to build a Welfare State: Part IV in\ntoto<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nbalance between Fundamental Rights and Directive Principles<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nParliamentary system of government<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nprinciple of free and fair elections<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Limitations\nupon the amending power conferred by Article 368<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Independence\nof the Judiciary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Effective\naccess to justice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Powers\nof the Supreme Court under Articles 32, 136, 141, 142<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Legislation\nseeking to nullify the awards made in exercise of the judicial power of the\nState by Arbitration Tribunals constituted under an Act<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Welfare\nstate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every part\nof the &nbsp;Constitution is amendable and\nthat the Parliament might, by passing a Constitution Amendment Act in\ncompliance with the requirements of article 368, amend any provision of the\nConstitution, including the Fundamental Rights and article 368.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">T</span></b><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">he\nbasic structure of our constitution consists of the following:--<o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">The preponderance\nof DHARMA ( natural justice )<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Maintenance\nof the unity and integrity of India.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">The\nsovereignty of the country.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;( ENSURE THAT WE TAKE &nbsp;A RUBBER STAMP WHEN WE SIGN INTERNATIONAL\nAGREEMENTS LIKE WTO\u2014&nbsp; \u201c</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUSE</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">\u201d \u2013\n\u201cNOTHING AGREED IN THIS DOCUMENT CAN INFRINGE THE SOVREIGNITY OF INDIA AMONG\nTHE COMITY OF NATIONS\u201d</span></span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">The\nsupremacy of the constitution ( WHICH IS SUBJECT TO INNOVATION ).<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">A\nrepublican and democratic form of government.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">The\nsecular character of the Constitution.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Maintenance\nof the separation of powers. &nbsp;( WE WILL NOT ALLOW THE JUDICIARY TO &nbsp;\"</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">RAP</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\" &nbsp;THE KNUCKLES OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE GHADI GHADI . &nbsp; THE BENAMI MEDIA LOVES TO TELL THIS , RIGHT ? &nbsp;THESE MEDIA PICKLE JOHNS AND CHUTNEY MARYs &nbsp;GET A HUGE KICK OUT OF RUNNING SUCH FOOTERS ON BENAMI TV )</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
