( CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT FOREIGN FUNDED\nAND ARMED TRAITORS )</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Liberty\nof thought, expression, belief, faith and worship.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Equality\nof status and opportunity. ( BUT, FOREIGNERS&nbsp;/ ALIENS WILL NOT GET SAME STATUS AS\nGOOD CITIZENS )<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Just who the hell &nbsp;told that writing the constitution was a one\nman show?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was a team who did that. &nbsp; BR Ambedkar was of\ncourse involved in making it a \"social responsibility and relations \"\ndocument. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was a sheer copy of the British model,\njust amended to suit India-- a draft given to Ambedkar on the quiet by\nRothschild.. There was NIL brainwork involved.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Why don't you compare the two constitutions.\nWhere is the intelligence, in copying and plagiarism?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dr B. R. Ambedkar was just the Chairman of an\neminent team consisting of K M Munshi, Alladi Krishnaswamy Iyer, &nbsp;N Gopalaswami\nAyengar , &nbsp;Madhava Rao , &nbsp;Md. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Basic structure theory ( absolutely rigid):\nas per this theory evolved in Kesavananda Bharti VS Kerala Govt &nbsp;case by supreme Court \u201cthe Parliament cannot\nuse its power to amend the Constitution to alter, distort or damage in anyway\nthe basic characteristics and principles of Constitution \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On April 24, 1973, Chief Justice Sikri and 12\njudges of the Supreme Court took up the case of Kesavananda Bharati v State of\nKerala.&nbsp; They heard the case &nbsp;for 68 days, the arguments commencing on\nOctober 31, 1972, and ending on March 23, 1973.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Literally hundreds of cases were cited and the\nthen Attorney-General had made a comparative chart analysing the provisions of\nthe Constitutions of 71 different countries!&nbsp;\n-- <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALMOST ALL OUT OF FUCKIN\u2019 CONTEXT </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The 703-page judgment revealed a sharply divided\ncourt and, by a wafer-thin majority of 7:6, it was held that Parliament could\namend any part of the Constitution so long as it did not alter or amend \u201cthe\nbasic structure or essential features of the Constitution.\u201d This was the\ninherent and implied limitation on the amending power of Parliament<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shri Kesavananda Bharati or officially,\nSrimad Jagadguru Sri Sri Sankaracharya Thotakacharya Keshavananda Bharathi\nSripadangalavaru &nbsp;was the pontiff &nbsp;of Jagadguru Sri Sankaracharya Thotakacharya\nSamsthanam, &nbsp;Edneer Mutt ( CREATED BY JEW\nROTHSCHILD ) &nbsp;in Kasaragod district of\nthe Indian state of Kerala<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">&nbsp;LIBERTY ALLOWS US TO EXPOSE BASTARDS HIDING BEHIND THE VEIL OF PRIVACY</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YMhFzWGD4a0/WavtnI1sj9I/AAAAAAABVps/xqpdRzcQmQI_z6wMX8s5qUD_TWaIBP-jwCLcBGAs/s1600/Dimages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Times have changed .. We\nlive in an age of big data and the State is entitled to regulate the data\nwhether it is for the purpose of regulating crime, taxation or other\nactivities... &nbsp;Right to privacy cannot be\nso absolute that it prevents the State from legislating or regulating it. The\nstate needs to defends its citizens from traitors holding foreign guns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are the homosexuals\nbitching? &nbsp; Has the state ever asked them to declare their sexual instincts ? They\ncould eat their own homosexual shit for all we care. &nbsp;&nbsp;We will NOT allow homosexuals to molest\nchildren behind the veil of privacy.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a bank has sought\npersonal details for disbursing loans then it could not be said to be an\ninfringement of right to privacy.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ya1Ovjsl6-M/WawVoREZBZI/AAAAAAABVqU/77-3hHs6wa4lBOHkzhC7jhoub27kuHuqwCLcBGAs/s1600/iSmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"192\" data-original-width=\"262\" height=\"293\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ya1Ovjsl6-M/WawVoREZBZI/AAAAAAABVqU/77-3hHs6wa4lBOHkzhC7jhoub27kuHuqwCLcBGAs/s400/iSmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Liberty is the\nfundamental value of our Constitution. &nbsp;Life\nand liberty are natural existing rights which our Constitution acknowledges and\nguarantees. &nbsp;How can liberty be at all\nexperienced without privacy\u201d\u2014 a mindless CHOOT asked ? ( </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Senior advocate Gopal Subramanium\n).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DON\u2019T WANT GOPAL\nBABY TO SAVE INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CUNTS argue \u201cIndia\nis a signatory to the Universal Declaration on Human Rights\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sCyRfVGoxfw/WawYxuI04QI/AAAAAAABVqo/DmOUrF_aGIYf2SptR49EK6YQgkNKUyRHQCLcBGAs/s1600/iQmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"170\" data-original-width=\"297\" height=\"366\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sCyRfVGoxfw/WawYxuI04QI/AAAAAAABVqo/DmOUrF_aGIYf2SptR49EK6YQgkNKUyRHQCLcBGAs/s640/iQmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right to privacy is\na fundamental right under Article 21 but it is not an absolute right. Article\n21 says that no person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except\nin accordance with the procedure established by law. So if there is a procedure\nby which your privacy can be curtailed, that is permissible even now, in\naccordance with the procedure established by law<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-odyyNGDAHaQ/WawUfPnGweI/AAAAAAABVqI/WYXJhALePv8jt86zbN1suHfJr1LXpmu0wCLcBGAs/s1600/imdages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"179\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-odyyNGDAHaQ/WawUfPnGweI/AAAAAAABVqI/WYXJhALePv8jt86zbN1suHfJr1LXpmu0wCLcBGAs/s320/imdages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">THE </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"> WILL NOT UNDERSTAND THE POSTER BELOW</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dPc8Zhex-NY/WawUsilAXfI/AAAAAAABVqM/mcuiXnifVZcvyB9XG3SpisjlRL_kHio7gCLcBGAs/s1600/dowssnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"156\" data-original-width=\"322\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dPc8Zhex-NY/WawUsilAXfI/AAAAAAABVqM/mcuiXnifVZcvyB9XG3SpisjlRL_kHio7gCLcBGAs/s640/dowssnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the rapid\ntechnological advances of the digital age, doubts have been cast over the\nviability and sustainability of privacy injunctions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How should conflicts\nbetween privacy and freedom of speech be resolved? The law cannot protect both\nrights when these conflicts arise&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8YPoelM0KOk/WawYcqaPFXI/AAAAAAABVqk/CfCail67NKwwgkKsr_pErE7sM6UcOYt0gCLcBGAs/s1600/3ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8YPoelM0KOk/WawYcqaPFXI/AAAAAAABVqk/CfCail67NKwwgkKsr_pErE7sM6UcOYt0gCLcBGAs/s640/3ownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHEN <span style=\"color: red;\">BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL</span>, THE<span style=\"color: blue;\"> LOSER LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES &nbsp;</span>PIT \u201cFREEDOM OF SPEECH\u201d AGAINST \u201cPRIVACY\u201d THEY ARE JUST KEEPING BASTARD LAWYERS BUSY\nRAKING IN THE MOOLAH</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-unvcRX96yag/WawYISG2PlI/AAAAAAABVqg/Fu83l6JRzRM9PZJRLJ0dN6RPBUvsrmI7gCLcBGAs/s1600/dowWnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-unvcRX96yag/WawYISG2PlI/AAAAAAABVqg/Fu83l6JRzRM9PZJRLJ0dN6RPBUvsrmI7gCLcBGAs/s640/dowWnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/multimedia/archive/03195/Right_to_Privacy___3195287a.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://www.thehindubusinessline.com/multimedia/archive/03195/Right_to_Privacy___3195287a.pdf</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court has\nasserted that Art. 21 is the heart of the Fundamental Rights. Article 21 has\nproved to be multi-dimensional. The extension in the dimensions of Art.21 has\nbeen made possible by giving a extended meaning to the word \u2018life\u2019 and \u2018liberty\u2019\nin Article 21.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court has asserted that in order to treat a right as\na fundamental right, it is not necessary that it should be expressly stated in\nthe constitution as a Fundamental Right. Political, social, and economic\nchanges in the country entail the recognition of new rights. The law in its\neternal youth grows to meet the demands of society. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to privacy is one\nsuch right which has come to its existence after widening up the dimensions of\nArticle 21. The constitution in specific doesn\u2019t grant any right to privacy as\nsuch. However, such a right has been culled by the Supreme Court from Art. 21\nand several other provisions of the constitution read with the Directive\nPrinciples of State Policy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Black\u2019s\nLaw Dictionary PRIVACY&nbsp; means \u201cright to\nbe let alone; the right of a person to be free from any unwarranted publicity;\nthe right to live without any unwarranted interference by the public in matters\nwith which the public is not necessarily concerned\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 21 of the\nConstitution of India states that \u201cNo person shall be deprived of his life or\npersonal liberty except according to procedure established by law\u201d. After\nreading the Article 21, it has been interpreted that the term \u2018life\u2019 includes\nall those aspects of life which go to make a man\u2019s life meaningful, complete\nand worth living.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The principle of the\nworld today can be: whatever you may do, the world will get to know before you\nrealize. Imran Khan enetered Mo#n M#on Sen\u2019s room in Calcutta at midnight.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 6\nAM the newspaper was slipped under the hotel room door&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><b>WHAT IS IMRAN KHAN DOING\nIN MO#N M#ON SENs ROOM FROM MIDNIGHT TO 6 AM ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n the earlier times in\nIndia, the law would give protection only from physical dangers such as\ntrespass from which the Right to Property emerged to secure his house and\ncattle. This was considered to be the Right to Life. As the ever changing\ncommon law grew to accommodate the problems faced by the people, it was\nrealized that not only was physical security required, but also security of the\nspiritual self as well as of his feelings, intellect was required.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Now the\nRight to Life has expanded in its scope and comprises the right to be let alone\nthe right to liberty secures the exercise of extensive civil privileges; and\nthe term \u201cproperty\u201d has grown to comprise every form of possession \u2014\nintangible, as well as tangible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strategy adopted by\nthe Supreme Court with a view to expand the ambit of Art. 21 and to imply\ncertain right there from, has been to interpret Art.21 along with international\ncharters on Human Rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS NOT A RICH\nSUBURB OF HOLLYWOOD STARS HOMES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;INDIA HAS MILLIONS OF HOMELESS WHO DON\u2019T KNOW\nWHERE THEIR NEXT MEAL IS COMING FROM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court has implied\nthe right of privacy from Art.21 by interpreting it in conformity with Art.12\nof the Universal Declaration on Human Rights and Art.17 of the International\nCovenant on Civil and Political Rights, 1966. Both of these international\ndocuments provide for the right of privacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right to privacy is not\nenumerated as a Fundamental Right in the Constitution of India. The scope of\nthis right first came up for consideration in Kharak Singh\u2019s Case which was\nconcerned with the validity of certain regulations that permitted surveillance\nof suspects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">International Concepts\nof Privacy:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 12 of Universal\nDeclaration of Human Rights (1948) states that \u201cNo one shall be subjected to\narbitrary interference with his privacy, family, home or correspondence nor to\nattack upon his honour and reputation. Everyone has the right to protection of\nthe law against such interference or attacks.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 17 of\nInternational Covenant of Civil and Political Rights (to which India is a\nparty) states \u201cNo one shall be subjected to arbitrary or unlawful interference\nwith his privacy, family, home and correspondence, nor to unlawful attacks on\nhis honour and reputation\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 8 of European\nConvention on Human Rights states \u201cEveryone has the right to respect for his\nprivate and family life, his home and his correspondence; there shall be no\ninterference by a public authority except such as is in accordance with law and\nis necessary in a democratic society in the interests of national security,\npublic safety or the economic well-being of the country, for the protection of\nhealth or morals or for the protection of the rights and freedoms of others.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>WE DON\u2019T NEED TO APE\nTHE WEST</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE HAVE JUST COME OUT\nOF 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY\u2014 &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; However, many colleges and institutes had taken a stay order and conducted private examinations for admission to their MBBS and BDS courses<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO STOP INTERFERING IN ADMIN MATTERS . WE HAVE AN ELECTED EXECUTIVE FOR THAT<br />\n<br />\nA ROGUE CJI NAMED ALTAMAS KABIR MADE A DESH DROHI JUDGEMENT<br />\n<br />\nOn the LAST DAY OF HIS RETIREMENT this traitor Altamas Kabir quashed the single-window National Eligibility-cum-Entrance Test (NEET) dealing a body blow to uniform admission norms for MBBS, BDS and MD seats in all medical colleges and allowing private medical colleagues to frame their own admissions norms and charge, in many cases, HUMNONGOUS capitation fees.<br />\n<br />\nThe NEET had been welcomed by students and parents because of transparency and the respite it offered from the ordeal that the aspiring doctors had to endure until last year when they had to file multiple applications and shuttle between cities across the country to take entrance tests medical colleges would hold with no co-ordination among them. It had also curbed the room for the promoters of several medical colleges to extort hefty capitation fees.<br />\n<br />\nTraitor Altamas Kabir ruled that the Medical Council of India is not empowered under the MCI Act, 1956 to actually conduct the NEET<br />\n<br />\nIn 2010, the bench of Justices Raveendran and Patnaik had strived to bring together the MCI and CBSE on the same page for conducting NEET. The bench was convinced that a single entrance test would save poor and meritorious students , by sparing them the physical and financial stress of having of travel from one city to another to appear in multiple entrance tests in the hope of bagging a MBBS, BDS or MD seat in a college.<br />\n<br />\nNEET cut down corruption. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The First Amendment of\nthe Constitution of India, enacted in 1951, made several changes to the\nFundamental Rights provisions of the constitution. It was moved by the then\nPrime Minister of India, Jawaharlal Nehru, on 10 May 1951 and enacted by\nParliament on 18 June 1951.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Journalist\nRomesh Thapar\u2019s left-leaning magazine Cross Roads had been banned for being\ncritical of Nehru\u2019s policies in Madras. Thapar challenged the ban in the\nSupreme Court, which lifted the ban in May 1951. After that, independent\nIndia\u2019s first government added the caveat to the right to freedom of speech and\nexpression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>IN THE MIDST OF THE\n1962 WAR WITH CHINA ,&nbsp; NEHRU DID THE\nUNTHINKABLE\u2014 &nbsp;HE SACKED HIS ARMY GENERAL GEN PN THAPAR.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Romesh Thapar\n(1922\u20131987) was a commie journalist and political commentator.&nbsp; He was the founder-editor of the monthly\njournal Seminar, published from New Delhi, India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Romesh Thapar was the\nbrother of Romila Thapar, the JNU Commie professor whom I have trashed in the\ngarbage bucket list.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General Pran Nath\nThapar, Chief of Army Staff, was his Romesh Thapar\u2019s father's brother, and the\nmidget journalist Karan Thapar is his first cousin.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Romesh Thapar was also\nrelated to the family of PM Nehru.&nbsp;\nNehru's niece, the writer Nayantara Sahgal, was married to Gautam\nSahgal, brother of Bimla Thapar, wife of Pran Nath Thapar.&nbsp;&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rabidly anti-Modi,&nbsp; Nayantara Sehgal ( Sahitya academy\nreturnee )&nbsp; is daughter of Vijayalakshmi Pandit, Nehru\u2019s\nsister.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Partition of\nIndia, Rothschild had made Thapar,the Director of Military Operations and\nIntelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thapar took over as\nChief of Army Staff of the Indian Army on 8 May 1961 and served until 19\nNovember 1962.&nbsp; He was removed in the\nfinal days of the India China war. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Till today nobody knows how Thapar family\nbecame so rich all of a sudden.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Commander K.M. Nanavati\ntried by the Bombay High Court ( bench trial ) convicted and sent to life\nimprisonment under Section 302 of the IPC for murdering his white wife\u2019s Sindhi\nlover Ahuja..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Vijayalakshmi Pandit ( related to Thapars )\npardoned this murderer when she was governor of Bombay.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of\nCommander Nanavati who was held guilty of murder, the state governor gave him\npardon although the minimum sentence for murder is life sentence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She had NO authority to\npardon this man. The scope of the pardoning power of the Indian President under\nArticle 72 is wider than the pardoning power of the state Governor under\nArticle 161.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The President can grant\npardon in all cases where the sentence given is sentence of death but pardoning\npower of Governor does not extend to death sentence cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_183M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_628M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">Below: Onam is celebrated only in Kerala. &nbsp; This festival carried on over thousands of years is a sign of gratitude to Danava King Mahabali who also ruled the whole planet. &nbsp;This festival knows NO bars --and Muslims and Christians celebrate it with equal gusto. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">Onam knows NO political leanings, caste , creed , language or any bars. We in Kerala are proud of our ancient culture and our beautiful fertile land . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">Maharishi Shukracharya was the mentor of Danava King Mahabali. &nbsp; His bitter rival Brihaspati ( inferior in intellect and skills ) was the mentor of the Devas. &nbsp; Brihaspati's son Kachcha did LOVE JIHAD on Shukracharya's daughter , the beautiful Devyani and their enmity ran deep. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">There was a time when the whole planet was split into two-- the followers of Shukracharya and that of Brihaspati.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_14.html?showComment=1505223816274#c1685942291529043572\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 12, 2017 at 7:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_182MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSiddharth Chakraborty commented: \"Elst views differs from what you have emphasized on your blog, I asked Elst on Twitter to engage with you in an interview/debate, to which he agreed. THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS PROVIDED THE BLACK STONE AT KAABA ( SE CORNER 5 FEET ABOVE THE GROUND ) . THE NAMBOODIRI PRIEST OF MECCA SHIVA TEMPLE WAS ON THE SALARY ROLL OF CALICUT KING. PROPHET MOHAMMADs FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF THIS PRIEST. PROPHET MOHAMMADs FATHER WAS PARTLY IN CHARGE OF THE CUSTOMS POST FOR SPICES AT MECCA OASIS.<br />\n<br />\nTHE STATE OF DHOFAR ( WITH CAPITAL SALALAH IN OMAN ) BELONGED TO THE CALICUT KING. KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OF CALICUT IS BURIED THERE . HIS GRAVE SAYS \u201cTHIYAJUDDIN \u201c \u2013RULER OF THE THIYYAS. I HAVE BEEN THERE<br />\n<br />\nDHOFAR KINGDOM EXTENDED FROM SOUTH OMAN TO NORTH YEMEN. THE CALICUT KINGs PRIVATE PORT WAS AT SALALA ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE NOT WRITTEN ABOUT ABOUT SAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGAL WHO WAS MADE THE <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">RULER OF DHOFAR BY JEW ROTHSCHILD</span></b>. &nbsp; &nbsp; MUSLIMS IN KERALA CANT HANDLE THIS TRUTH.<br />\n<br />\nFAZALs FATHER SAYYID ALAVI THANGALs DARGAH IS AT MAMBARAM\u2014A MAJOR PILGRIMAGE CENTRE FOR MUSLIMS. HE WAS A YEMENI.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH FATHER AND SON DROVE WEDGES BETWEEN HINDUS OF KERALA AND MAPPILAS ( HALF BREEDS WITH ARAB FATHERS AND KERALA HINDU MOTHERS ).<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>MAPPILAS EXISTED THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE ISLAM WAS BORN .. &nbsp; &nbsp;THEY CONTROLLED THE CAMEL CARAVAN ROUTE FROM DHAFUR TO MECCA OASIS TO WEST COAST OF PALESTINE. FROM HERE KERALA SPICES WENT BY SHIP TO EUROPE .</b></span><br />\n<br />\nMY NEXT POST WOULD HAVE BEEN ABOUT THIS FATHER SON SAYYID THANGAL DUO ( HEROES OF KERALA MUSLIMS ) AND BRITISH COLLECTOR HENRY VALENTINE CONNOLLY WHO DUG THE KANOLI CANAL AT CALICUT..<br />\n<br />\nALAS IT IS NOT MEANT TO BE.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE STOPPED BLOGGING.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1301834754903074033\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">September 28, 2017 at 4:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY DOES GOOGLE WANT TO TAKE DOWN THIS BLOGSITE ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE WORLD IS RUN ON A LIE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FORCES WHO RUN THIS PLANET WANT IT TO REMAIN THIS WAY.<br />\n<br />\nIT RUFFLES KOSHER FEATHERS WHEN A BROWN SKINNED INDIAN REVEALS&nbsp;THAT&nbsp;PYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY INDIANS USING VAASTU AND WATER FLOTATION POWER--AND STONEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT DOES NOT SUIT THE RULING FORCES WHEN IT IS DECLARED THAT THERE IS NOT AN IOTA OF SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA-- THAT ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ( EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS ) -- THAT THERE IS NO HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUISM<br />\n<br />\nIT DOES NOT SUIT THEM WHEN ONE MAN HAS THE ANSWERS AND THE POWER TO TELL THE TRUTH.-- SAY-- WHAT GAYATRI MANTRA WHICH HAS BEEN CHANTED FOR THOUSAND OF YEARS AND BILLIONS OF WORDS OF BULLSHIT EXPLANATIONS WRITTEN IS ALL ABOUT -- WHAT IS SAVITUR--&nbsp;THE QUASAR<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INDIAN BLOGGER MAKES ALL WHITE MEN EAT CROW--IT DOES NOT SUIT THEM<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA IS A DEEP PROFOUND DOCUMENT -- IT HAS BEEN MURDERED, BY IDIOTS USING SANSKRIT/ ENGLISH DICTIONARY -- FAKE ROGUE GURUS ARE PREACHING THE FAKE SHALLOW ASHTAVAKRA GITA.. .<br />\n<br />\nALL PAST TRUTHS ETCHED ON ROCK BECOMES QUESTIONABLE WHEN ONE OF THEM IS ESTABLISHED AS A LIE<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IS A LIVING LEGEND AT SEA--ONLY BECAUSE HE HAD THE BALLS TO POINT OUT THE ELEPHANT IN THE FUCKIN' ROOM AND HOLLER THAT THE EMPEROR IS NOT WEARING CLOTHES.<br />\n<br />\nSO WHAT IS A LIE WHICH IS BEING TOUTED AS THE TRUTH ?<br />\n<br />\nJUST A WEE EXAMPLE ? SOMEONE WANTED ONE SINGLE SOLID PROOF WHICH IS TANGIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nCONSIDER THIS<br />\n<br />\n#######################<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ON CHEMICAL TANKERS,&nbsp; SAILORS WERE FORCED TO SPRAY METHANOL INSIDE CARGO TANKS.&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO USE THE TEST MEDIUM WHICH IS USED TO DO WALL WASH AND CHEAT AND PASS TANKS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE \"SAFETY OF LIFE AT SEA\" ( SOLAS )&nbsp; &nbsp;RULES THERE IS A PASSAGE ON \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LUNG DEMAND TIME</span></b>\" WHICH HAS BEEN KOSHER WHITE WASHED AS \"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WORKING TIME</span></b>\" IN THE PROSE<br />\n<br />\nNO REGULATION ALLOWS SAILORS TO GO DOWN INTO TANKS AND SPRAY METHANOL .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: By the way NO regulation allows methanol spray with SCBA IBC sets. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country.</span></b>&nbsp; &nbsp;SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE GIVEN SPARE SCBA SETS CALLED IBC SETS FOR METHANOL SPRAYING ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/scba-self-contained-breathing-apparatus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMETHANOL SPRAY IS JUST CHEATING YOURSELF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: In the IBC code , \" working time \" has been erroneously read by vested interests as&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">official sanction</span></b>&nbsp;to do routine WORK inside chemical cargo tanks. IT IS NOT SO. \" WORKING TIME \" IS TO BE READ AS \" LUNG DEMAND TIME \" -- WHICH IS 100 LITRES OF FREE AIR A MINUTE FOR STRAIN ( OF FIREMANS LIFT RESCUE) , 30 LITRES A MINUTE FOR LIGHT ACTIVITY , AND 10 LITRES A MINUTE WHILE AT REST---UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD THE BALLS AND THE PERCEPTION TO SPELL OUT A KOSHER LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY VADAKAYILs WALL WASH METHOD IS USED ALL OVER THE GLOBE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/02/wall-wash-method-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WORLD RUNS ON LIES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; There were more than 80 ship captains in the hall.<br />\n<br />\nA speaker from the DG Shipping Dept of Govt of India --an ex-ship captain and a TOP govt official who can MAKE OR BREAK -- made a remark<br />\n<br />\nHe said with respect to \"Flag of convenience\" shipping-- THIRD WORLD SAILORS LIKE INDIANS ARE CONSIDERED LESS VALUABLE THAN PENGUINS AND WHALES BY THE FIRST WORLD SHIP OWNERS<br />\n<br />\nOne Dutch Shipowner CEO on whose chemical tanker I was Captain before I went of leave got up from the podium in a huff and interjected rudely \u201c I DONT AGREE WITH YOU -- HOWEVER YOU CAN CONTINUE WITH WHAT YOU NEED TO SAY\u201d -- and he made a high profile walk out<br />\n<br />\nThe owner of our Technical management company an Indian , was on THIN ICE-- both dignitaries were powerful and could sink his company<br />\n<br />\nI immediately knew , my opinion would be sought--so I slipped out of the hall, went to the nearest restaurant bar -and was sipping chilled beer<br />\n<br />\nAfter half an hour the Personnel Dept head walks in ..He says \"Ajit, what are you doing here--the boss wants you \"<br />\n<br />\nSo we went to meet the Indian company boss.<br />\n<br />\nHe asked me \"CAPTAIN, WHO IS RIGHT ? THE DUTCH SHIPOWNER ( our companys moneybag with deep pockets ) OR THE GOVT OF INDIA GD SHIPPING TOP OFFICIAL ( who has hajaar nuisance potential as company was squeezing on wages and usual sailor perks ) ??<br />\n<br />\nAbout 6 company shore bosses were all ears for my opinion ( I was reputed as a straight shooter who shot through the holster ) -- i replied BOTH ARE RIGHT!<br />\n<br />\nThe top gun immediately remarked CAPTAIN, SINCE WHEN HAVE YOU BECOME A FENCE SITTER ?<br />\n<br />\nI replied \" WHY HAVE WE GATHERED HERE ? FOR A \"TRUTH FINDING EXERCISE \"? OR TO BOLSTER THE COMPANYs MORALE AND IMAGE ??<br />\n<br />\nWe dont mind if our BENAMI media indulges in TRUTH FINDING EXERCISE .. but there must be a LAXMAN REKHA .<br />\n<br />\nFAYE SORPOTEL DSOUZA of Mirror Now TV says--our TV channel's motto is YOU FIRST<br />\n<br />\nHey Faye baby -- it must mean WE THE PEOPLE FIRST --it cannot be NAXALS , SEPARATISTS and FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs FIRST ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_105BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; ALL JUDGES CAN DO IS TO INTERPRET EXISTING LAWS...INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION WERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br /><br />LAWS HAVE TO BE MADE BY LAWMAKERS NOT COLLEGIUM JUDGES ...THEY SCUTTLED NJAC<br /><br />EVERY PAST LAW CREATED BY JUDGES IS NULL AND VOID--WE THE PEOPLE, WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION, WILL NOT ACCEPT IT..<br /><br />WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WILL NOT ALLOW DEEP STATE JUDGES TO USE PAST RULING OF JUDGES ( SANS CONTEXT USING JUSTICE IS BLIND SYSTEM ) AS A LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION...<br /><br />ALL PAST JUDGMENTS OF COLLEGIUM JUDGES MUST BE BURNT..\u2026 PERCEPTION MUST BE RULED BY CONTEXT...... IF CONTENT IS KING- CONTEXT IS GOD !!......<br /><br />SOME STUPID JUDGES HAVE EVEN USED RIDICULOUS PROSE IN THEIR JUDGEMENTS , TO SHOW THAT THEY ARE POETS AND PHILOSOPHERS -- EVEN QUOTING A MAD MAN NAMED SIGMUND FREUD.....<br /><br />WE KNOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES HAVE FOREIGN SUPPORT WHEN THEIR LEGISTLATE , DO EXTREME JUDICIAL OVERREACH . . .<br /><br />BHARATMATA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETS NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS --BEFORE THAT THE NEW WORLD ORDER WANTS INDIA TO IMPLODE. ..<br /><br />EVERY TIME DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES WANT A NEW LAW IN INDIA, THEY USE THEIR TROJAN HORSE NGOs TO FILE A PIL WHICH STRANGELY IS GIVEN TOP PRIORITY ALONG WITH HOM0SEXUALITY . . . .<br /><br />OUR COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA BARS ( WH0RE HOUSES IN MUMBAI )\u2026..<br /><br />BREAD WINNERS OF ENTIRE FAMILIES HAVE BEEN ROTTING IN JAIL WITHOUT A TRIAL FOR THREE DECADES .. . . ..<br /><br />EVERY TIME OUR UNIFORMED MEN RISK THEIR LIVES AND ARREST TERRORISTS , NAXALS AND SEPARATISTS - -OUR COLLEGIUM MELORDS WHO ARE AFRAID OF JEW NOAM CHOMSKY SAVE THEM . . ..WE DO NOT WANT JUDICIARY TO PLAY GOD IN INDIA . .<br /><br />MOST OF OUR COLLEGIUM JUDGES ARE PEA BRAINED . . THEY WERE FOOT SLOGGING UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS . .THEY BECAME JUDGES SO THAT THEY CAN C0CK A SNOOK AT THEIR SUCCESSFUL LAWYER COLLEAGUES. . \u2026<br /><br />KICK ALL INDIAN TRAITORS INTO JAIL , FROM THE BENAMI MEDIA, ATHEIST COMMIES, 5 STAR PERCEPTION MOLDERS OF LITERARY FESTS, THE FOREIGN PAYROLL RAJYA SABHA MPs, OPENLY ANTI-WATAN COLLEGIUM JUDGES / NHRC / NCM, NAXAL-SEPARATIST SYMPATHISERS, ANTI-WATAN LUTYENS CLUB, TRACK TWO ISI PAYROLL PEACENIKS WHO WANT DIALOGUE WITH ALL STAKEHOLDERS, FOREIGN SPONSORED AWARD WAPSI GANG etc . . .<br /><br />WE CANT HAVE ENEMIES FROM WITHIN . .WE MUST HAVE AN EXAM FOR JUDGES .. LIKE IAS / IPS . . . . WE DONT WANT LAWYERS TO BECOME JUDGES , AS THEY SOULS ARE ALREADY CORRUPTED . ..<br /><br />BEFORE 1947 , ALMOST ALL JUDGES WERE ON THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD .. .. BY THE TIME A LAWYER BECOMES A JUDGE HE IS CORRUPT, AND HE IS READY TO SELL HIS OWN MOTHER IN THE WH0REHoUSE PROVIDED THE PRICE IS RIGHT . . .<br /><br />COURT CLERKS KNOW THE MORAL FIBRE OF THE JUDGES AS THEY WERE LAWYERS BEFORE WHO GAVE THEM A CUT . POOR UNDERTRIALS WHO ARE BREAD WINNERS ARE KEPT IN JAIL FOR DECADES WITHOUT A TRIAL . .. .<br /><br />POOR PEOPLE DO NOT HAVE THE WHEREWITHAL TO PROVIDE BAIL MONEY OR PERSONAL SURETY . . .WITH ANOTHER MAN COMING AND SHOWING ALL THOSE DOCUMENTS WHICH ARE REQUIRED FOR THE GUARANTEE . ... WHY IS THE INDIAN GOVT INSISTING ON BAIL MONEY FROM VERY POOR PEOPLE ?<br /><br />WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA FIRST WANT THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO SEE THEMSELVES IN THE MIRROR .............<br /><br />OWAISI WANT COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO DEAL WITH THREATS TO BHARATMATAs INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL SECURITY... FARMER SUICIDES ARE BEING HYPDED UP BY DESH DROHI BENAMI MEDIA.. OUR BENAMI INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA HAS LOST ALL CREDIBILITY..CALLING NAXAL FARMERS AS ANNA DHATAS.. GOD IS ANNA DHATA..\u2026\u2026..<br /><br />ANY POLITICIAN , JUDGE OR NHRC MEMBER WHO SUPPORTS COP KILLERS FOR SELFISH GAINS , SHOULD BE TAUGHT A SEVERE LESSON\u2026... OUR COPS ARE POORLY PAID\u2026.. NDTV SAYS \" CM HAS BROKEN THE RULE OF SUPREME COURT THAT NO SUCH CASH AWARDS CAN BE GIVEN \" \u2026..<br /><br />OH YEAH ?..<br /><br />SINCE WHEN HAS COLLEGIUM SUPREME COURT STARTED MAKING RULES AND FAALTHU LAWS ? \u2026THEY DONT HAVE SUCH RIGHTS UNDER THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION ! \u2026AND PAST RULING ?... THESE RICH LAWYERS CANT ARGUE FOR NUTS -- IF SO HOW DO THEY WIN THEIR CASES ?...<br /><br />WE MUST DISMANTLE THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND REBUILD IT\u2026 PROFILE EVERY FREEMASON JUDGE ..<br /><br />CONTEMPT OF COURT CANNOT BE APPLIED TO THINGS WHICH HAPPENED OUTSIDE THE COURT \u2026CONTEMPT OF COURT APPLIES WHEN THE COURT IS IN SESSION AND SOMEONE IN THE COURT RELATED TO THE CASE UNDERMINES THE JUDGE'S AUTHORITY REPEATEDLY . \u2026<br /><br />CONTEMPT OF COURT CANNOT BE APPLIED ALONG THE LENGTH AND BREATH OF INDIA ( ON LAND/ UNDER GROUND/ IN SPACE ) , AS IT IS MEANT WITHIN THE CONFINES OF A WEE BRICK AND CEMENT BUILDING COURT ROOM --------ONE STUP1D JUDGE HAD SLAPPED BOTH \"SEDITION\" AND \"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" ON ARUN JAITLEY FOR SAYING CONSTITUTION DOES NOT SUPPORT \"COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\" BUT ONLY NJAC \u2026.<br /><br />THIS JUDGE WILL NEVER BE PROMOTED AGAIN . \u2026<br /><br />THE MELORDS CANT EVEN UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF CIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE ... THIS IS WHY NAXALS LOOK INTO THE CAMERA AND SAY--WE TRUST OUR SUPREME COURT... -- FOR FAKE WITNESSES CAN BE PRODUCED OUT OF THIN AIR BY FOREIGN MONEY ( LIKE TEESTA SETALVAD )\u2026.<br /><br />THE PREPONDERENCE OF LAWS IN THE CONSTITUTION MUST BE CLEARLY LAID OUT IN A CRYSTAL \"BODMAS \" STYLE..... 1 + 5 x 6 - 3 + (4 - 2)... ... what part should you calculate first?..... Calculate them in the wrong order, and you will get a wrong answer !... This is where BODMAS kicks in !......<br /><br />OUR UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DONT HAVE THE BRAINS TO PRIORITIZE........ B- Brackets first.... O- Orders (ie Powers and Square Roots, etc.)..... DM- Division and Multiplication (left-to-right)..... AS- Addition and Subtraction (left-to-right)... ..<br /><br />The Constitution was made in 1950, and 68 years had passed since it was promulgated, but Article 44 had been totally ignored by vested politicians\u2014eager to appease Muslims for vote bank politics.......<br /><br />We urge Modi to rewrite the Indian Constitution afresh in tune with the changing needs, while preserving the unity, integrity and sovereignty of the watan..... India needs a new engine because the old one is broken and can never deliver the power needed for the NEW journey.....<br /><br />INDIA IS ON COURSE TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS...... He mentioned that a lovely scent\nemanated from Babaji and he looked divine. In the second last chapter of his\nbook, he mentions that Babji himself was Lord Shiva. He describes seeing Babaji\nchanging his form to Lord Shiva again and again. He also mentions that SaiBaba,\nYesu, Guru Nanak and many others were disciples of Mahavatar Babaji. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He has\nwalked all over India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lahiri Mahasaya claims\nto have received KRIYA YOGA it from his guru, Babaji.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paramahamsa Yogananda\nwrote:-- \u201cThe northern Himalayan crags near Badrinarayan are still blessed by\nthe living presence of Babaji, guru of Lahiri Mahasaya. The secluded master has\nretained his physical form for centuries, perhaps for millenniums. The\ndeathless Babaji is an AVATARA\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogananda wrote :\nBabaji gave yoga initiation to Shankara, ancient founder of the Swami Order,\nand to KabirDAS , famous medieval saint.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, ADI SHANKARACHARYA\nLIVED 4000 YEARS AGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KABIRDAS , NEVER\nEXISTED \u2013LIKE ALL OTHER DASAS ( KALIDAS / TULSIDAS/ RAMDAS/ RAVIDAS/ HARIDAS\nBLAH BLAH\u2014ALL FAKE BACKDATED CREATIONS OF ROTHSCHILD THE JEW OWNER OF BRITISH\nEAST INDIA COMPANY )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have a white man\nMarshall Govindan, a.k.a. M. G. Satchidananda doing BABAJI propaganda today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">White man Marshall\nGovindan now teaches KRIYA YOGA OF BABJI for exhorbitant amounts. This is the place\nof mahatmas or spiritual adepts, in the Himalayan mountains . They live on\nthrough centuries in various incarnations, perpetuating the knowledge of\nearlier, more spiritually advanced, civilizations like the Egyptian and the\nGreek, and teach it to worthy pupils, -- an example is she herself .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She swears on her ample\nbosom that one of these adepts, Koot Hoomi (or Kuthumi Baba) was her guru and\nhe was more than 500 years old. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Under the Ryotwari System every registered\nholder of land is recognised as its proprietor, and pays direct to Rothschild. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Payment\nof the land tax in cash, rather than in kind, was instituted &nbsp;by Rothschild so that he can establish an\nexclusive monopoly in the market as buyers of Indian goods<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The requirement of cash payments was ruinous\nto the cultivator, exposing him to the demands of moneylenders ( benami Indian Marwari\nagents of Jew Rothschild ) as an alternative to the loss of his land and\nstarvation when crops failed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The lean years resulted in regional famines,\nas the cultivators could not accumulate capital or invest in the productive\ndevelopment of their landholdings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The British East India Company claimed the property rights to\nall the lands but allotted it to the cultivators on the condition that they pay\na rent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The rent was directly collected by Rothschild\u2026 As long as the\nCultivators paid the rents, they had rights to use the land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Revenue had to be paid even during drought and\nfamine, else the cultivator would be evicted. &nbsp; Rothschild used his collectors to\nkick start DELIBERATE FAMINE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Thomas Munro spoke in English everybody nearby heard him --but only Thomas baby could see - others could only hear Thomas baby. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8_ozE5mw5TM/WZR0KZLS9gI/AAAAAAABVfk/hb0sYwXa0pAnriVSDWDg0BM1XS6N9bxiQCLcBGAs/s1600/dc-w1bv76350uv8a5e6n9dim0009h7-20170215205045.Medi.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"448\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8_ozE5mw5TM/WZR0KZLS9gI/AAAAAAABVfk/hb0sYwXa0pAnriVSDWDg0BM1XS6N9bxiQCLcBGAs/s640/dc-w1bv76350uv8a5e6n9dim0009h7-20170215205045.Medi.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Breaching\ntrust is VERY bad karma</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VCmEu_Q5P64/WZSbAcEPWhI/AAAAAAABVgE/Wh4DOjvNI80pdk1qf1sUUuijpnddwQBTgCLcBGAs/s1600/maxjresdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"1280\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VCmEu_Q5P64/WZSbAcEPWhI/AAAAAAABVgE/Wh4DOjvNI80pdk1qf1sUUuijpnddwQBTgCLcBGAs/s640/maxjresdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">The ryotwari system (\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">for which Thomas Munro baby obtained divine permission from Raghavendra</span></b> ) was\nknown as \"severality villages and was based on the system of peasant\nproprietorship.&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FVsUgguzV0I/WZSbPbCR8vI/AAAAAAABVgI/RFUgxfSQVkwfnqKy3ZMjmxP7GkAS3owCwCLcBGAs/s1600/Thomas_Munro_classiwc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1024\" data-original-width=\"768\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FVsUgguzV0I/WZSbPbCR8vI/AAAAAAABVgI/RFUgxfSQVkwfnqKy3ZMjmxP7GkAS3owCwCLcBGAs/s1600/Thomas_Munro_classiwc.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ryotwari System the\nownership rights were handed over to the peasants. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rothschild collected taxes directly from the\npeasants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ryotwari tenure\nrelated to land revenue imposed on an individual or community owning an estate,\nand occupying a position analogous to that of a landlord. &nbsp;The land revenue is imposed on individuals who\nare the actual occupants, and this assessment is known as ryotwari.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under\nzamindari tenure, the land is held as independent property; while under\nryotwari tenure it is held of the crown in a right of occupancy, which is under\nBritish rule both heritable and transferable by the ryots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The principle was the\ndirect collection of the land revenue from each individual cultivator by\ngovernment agents. For this purpose all holdings were measured and assessed according\nto crop potential and actual cultivation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Ryotwari system also gave much\npower to &nbsp;revenue officials-- agents of\nJew Rothschild . The revenue rates of Ryotwari System were 50% where the lands\nwere dry and 60% in irrigated land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So long as the ryot (\nkisan )paid the revenue in time, the peasant was not evicted from the land.\nEvery peasant was held personally responsible for direct payment of land\nrevenue to the government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent\nMunro baby brought the ryots under his DIRECT authority \u2013removing local\nzamindars , who were lenient to fellow Indians . There was an instant spurt in\nrevenue collection.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The contact of the\nadministration with each individual farmer, implied in the Raiyatwari system was\nmore conducive to the interest of Rothschild who could &nbsp;assess the cultivated area &nbsp;and the income of the tax payer ( extreme\ndeceit was used ) , and could itself carry out the collection of taxes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A TORURE INSTRUMENT\nCALLED \u201c<span style=\"color: red;\">KITTE</span>\u201d WAS USED TO BREAK THE FINGERS OF THE RYOTS WHEN THEY COULD NOT\nPAY TAX.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ONCE A FARMERs RIGHT HAND FINGERS WERE BROKEN BY KITTIE, HE IS NO LONGER A FARMER --AS HE CANT WORK.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THE RYOTS DEEP IN DEBT\nWERE FORCED TO SELL THEIR LANDS</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1854, the House of\nCommons was rocked by allegations of torture against the Honourable East India\nCompany.. Mr Danby Seymore, MP, accused the Company of using torture and\ncoercion to get ten shillings from a man when he was supposed to give only eight.\nThe Times wrote of the \"Indian Inquisition\" and Punch carried a\nsatirical piece on the issue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the 9th of September\n1954, a three-member Commission1 was appointed to enquire into the \"use of\ntorture by the native servants of the state, for the purpose of realising the\nGovernment revenue\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the scope of\nthe enquiry was soon enlarged to include \"the alleged use of torture in\nextracting confessions in police cases\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Commissioners were\ninformed that:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The instructions of\nGovernment were at first confined to the Revenue Department, because the\nimputation of the use of torture solely referred to the collection of the\npublic revenue; but the Governor in Council is desirous of taking this\nopportunity of ascertaining the extent to which similar practices are resorted\nto in police matters, in which they have long been admitted to prevail, and the\nCommission will therefore be requested to extend their investigation to the\nPolice Department, and, in fact, go fully into the whole subject in all its\nbearings. (MADRAS, 1855, p. 3).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.thehansindia.com/posts/index/Andhra-Pradesh/2017-05-28/Sir-Thomas-Munro-remembered/302771\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thehansindia.com/posts/index/Andhra-Pradesh/2017-05-28/Sir-Thomas-Munro-remembered/302771</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
