, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">######################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">June 7, 2013 at 11:15\nAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">hi hari,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First , punch into\ngoogle search THE BACK SWING OF JOHN GALT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild tried his\nbest to propagate the John Galt hedonist philiosophy by subverting our ancient\nliterature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is where the\nSanskrit proverb is \u201cRinam kritva ghritam pibet, yavan jivet sukham jivet\u201d\nmeaning \u2013\u201cLive so long you have a life and live with all comforts and luxury\neven if you have to take a loan\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charvaka is\n\u201cmaterialist hedonism\u201d and supposed to be propagated by a the \u201cfather of\nCarnatic music\u201d <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Puranadara Dasa </span></b>( sic!). &nbsp;&nbsp;There\nis NO sage Charvaka in Indian history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the white\nChristian missionary ,<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b> Purandara Dasa </b></span>fought the evils of casteism through his\nsongs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian have NO idea\nwhat all false and fake ways the white man tried to subvert indian thought. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They created the fake \u201c\nCharvaka school of philosophy\u201d with its variety of atheistic and materialistic\nbeliefs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a school of\nthought never existed in India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Charvaka\nphilosophy was about the virtue of selfishness ( Ayn Rand \u2013mistress of\nRothschild philosophy )and the belief that that wisdom lay in enjoying pleasure\nand avoiding pain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were extremely\ncritical of the Vedas giving propaganda that Vedas were just incoherent\nrhapsodies , and that the Vedas suffered from three faults - untruth,\nself-contradiction and tautology. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Charvaka philosophy\nspread the belief that Vedas were cooked up by men and had no divine authority.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\ninvented a false Charvaka philosophy( Sarva-dar\u015bana-sa\u1e45graha ) a fake poison\ninjected work back dated and attributed to a 14th century Advaita Vedanta\nphilosopher M\u0101dhava Vidy\u0101ra\u1e47ya from Hampi India, which starts with a chapter on\nthe C\u0101rv\u0101ka system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actually this chapter\nis not there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Paramahamsa\nYogananda the ancient Yogic text the Yoga Sutras of Patanjali, contains a\ndescription of Kriya Yoga in the second chapter II.49:&nbsp; &nbsp;\"Liberation can be attained by that\npranayama which is accomplished by disjoining the course of inspiration and\nexpiration.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.49\u2014 tasmin sati\nshvasaprashvasayorgativichchhedah pranayamah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expansion of the life\nforce or vital energy by regulation of breath is next.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranayama is the\nregulation of the incoming and outgoing flow of breath with retention.&nbsp; It needs to be practised only after\nperfection in asana has been attained.&nbsp;\nPatanjali expressly advises the sadhaka to perform pranayama only after\nattaining perfection in asana.&nbsp;&nbsp; For the\nfirst time, he demonstrates a distinct step in the ascension of the ladder of\nyoga, whereas he has not specified progression for the other aspects.&nbsp; Normally the flow of breath is unrestrained\nand irregular. Observing these variations, and conditioning the mind to control\nthe inflow, outflow and retention of the breath in a regular, rhythmic pattern,\nis pranayama.&nbsp; The word pranayama\nconsists of two components - prana and ayama.&nbsp;\nPrana is energy, when the self-energising force encompasses the\nbody.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ayama means regulation.&nbsp; Pranayama\u2014 where you exhale twice as long as\ninhale\u2014 is more about dumping old experiences rather than mere oxygenation&nbsp; of blood.&nbsp;\nIt is always starts with the left nostril for right handers \u2013 for left\nhanders it is vice versa ( no book on pranayama talks about this ) .. Left\nhanded people have their sub-conscious in the left lobe of the brain.Breathe in\nthe new , breathe out the old. Pranayama\u2014inhale and exhale with awareness\u2014 long\nexhales with the sound of&nbsp; MMMMMMM.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Humming boosts level of nitric oxide\u2014this\nin turn ups the oxygen intake by 98%, the biggest secret . Ordinary breath is a\nmere 4%.&nbsp; It is amazing Nitric oxide was\ndiscovered by Indian yogis 11000 years ago.&nbsp;\nFor re-inventing this a Nobel prize was given 2 decades ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is\nnecessary for-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Destruction of\nviruses, parasitic organisms, and malignant cells in the airways and lungs by\ninactivating their respiratory chain enzymes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Regulation of\nbinding - release of O2 to hemoglobin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Vasodilation of\narteries and arterioles (regulation of blood flow or perfusion of tissues).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Inhibitory effects\nof inflammation in blood vessels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Hormonal effects.\nNitric oxide influences secretion of hormones from several glands (adrenaline,\npancreatic enzymes, and gonadotropin-releasing hormone)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Neurotransmission.\nMemory, sleeping, learning, feeling pain, and many other processes are possible\nonly with NO present (for transmission of neuronal signals).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obviously, during mouth\nbreathing it is not possible to utilize one's own nitric oxide which is\nproduced in the sinuses.&nbsp; The mouth, was\ncreated by nature for eating, drinking, and speaking.&nbsp; At all other times, your trap should be\nshut.When there is lack of oxygen in your blood , you living to a small percentage\nof your potential. Endurance exercise can increase oxygen utilization from 10\nto 20 times over the resting state. This greatly also&nbsp; increases the generation of free radicals,\nwhich can cause cancer.&nbsp; Metabolism, or,\nmore accurately the metabolic rate of the cells, sets the demand for oxygen. At\nrest, a human consumes about 250 millilitres of oxygen each minute. With\nexercise this rate can be increased more than 10-fold in a normal healthy\nindividual, but a highly trained athlete may achieve a more than 20-fold\nincrease.. Muscle can do more work, but beyond the aerobic scope they must\nrevert to anaerobic metabolism, which results in waste products, mainly lactic\nacid.&nbsp; The ability of the eye to\ndark-adapt (, increase its sensitivity at low light levels) decreases with age,\nbut part of that decrease can be restored by breathing pure oxygen. Various\nmental processes in old people are also found to be improved by breathing\noxygen. Any slowed induction of protein synthesis, as from lower oxygen intake,\nwith age is a factor in the deficits of learning and memory of old people. 70%\nof toxins in your body are released by exhalation\u2014 rest by sweat, defecation\nand urine\u2014 surprised?&nbsp; Oxygen drives the\nbasic metabolic processes that permit growth and constant body temperature. The\nmain purpose of respiration is to provide oxygen to the cells at a rate\nadequate to satisfy their metabolic needs. This involves transport of oxygen\nfrom the lung to the tissues by means of the circulation of blood. The precise\nobject of respiration therefore is the supply of oxygen to the\nmitochondria.&nbsp; Ganges' self-purifying\nquality leads to oxygen levels 25 times higher than any other river in the\nworld. Ganga, show that it is able to reduce BOD (biochemical oxygen demand)\nlevels much faster than in other rivers. Ganges cleans up suspended wastes\ntwenty times faster than other rivers on the planet. The power of breathing\nlies in its relationship with your energy source. The mind is intimately\nconnected to your breathing. Deep breathing triggers the lymph, your body\u2019s\nsewage system which will give your cells more efficiency. It keeps the blood\nfully oxygenated. Breathe in the ration 1/4/2.&nbsp;\n.The physical aspect of lack of oxygen in the body is not as important\nas the mental and spiritual aspect.&nbsp; Lack\nof oxygen always slows your reaction time. The more oxygen our brains receive\nthe better they function. Glial cells are mediators between the neurons and\nblood vessels of the brain. Oxygenating the brain can slow down constant die\noff of brain cells, and can activate areas of the brain which usually idle from\nlack of blood. The cells you use the least are the first to die off. 35000\nbrain cells die every day\u2014more when there is lack of blood. But don\u2019t worry,\nyou have a stock of 100 billion brain cells. Arterial blood is slightly more\nacidic in pH value ( 0.05 ) than the venous blood. Blood is an electrolyte.\nBlood is a carrier for oxygen and nutrients to the cells, but more\nfundamentally it is a carrier of electrical current. The movement of blood\nproduces EM waves through changes in the electrical charge (voltage) and\ncurrent (amperage) of the fluid.&nbsp; Because\noxygen is vital to life, the body and brain are extremely sensitive to even\nvery small reductions . This is why exercise must be done at least ONE hour\nafter a meal or oxygen required for digestion is used by muscles leading to\nindigestion and cramps. Stress, fear and anxiety causes muscles to contract and\nblood vessels to constrict. When blood cannot be transported freely through the\nbody to provide oxygen, and antibodies and to carry away and dispose toxic\nwastes, illness sets in. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human brain cells\ndegenerate and die when you do hyperventilation. This is irreversible. .\nHyperventilation leads to spontaneous and asynchronous firing of neurons . ..\nBrain diseases (or disorders of the central nervous system - CNS) are possible\nonly in conditions of chronic hyperventilation, chest breathing and mouth\nbreathing. . . Most brain diseases are characterized by chronic\nhyperventilation, there are additional effects due to low CO2 levels in the\nCNS. . .If excess ventilation cannot be compensated metabolically, it will lead\nto a rise in blood pH. This rise in blood pH is known as respiratory alkalosis.\n. .When hyperventilation leads to respiratory alkalosis, it causes dizziness,\ntingling in the lips, hands or feet, headache, weakness, fainting and seizures.\n. .In extreme cases it can cause carpopedal spasms (flapping and contraction of\nthe hands and feet). . .Your body relies on carbonic acid to regulate the\nacidity of the entire bloodstream. By hyperventilating you remove far too much\nCO2 from your blood. . .The acidity of your bloodstream falls as a result. This\nhas all sorts of nasty effects on your body if it is sustained, not least of\nwhich is an interference with nerve transmissions. . .Hypocalcemia, which\nresults from hyperventilation, can cause tingling sensations, spasms of the muscles,\nand even convulsions. . Hyperventilating DOES store extra oxygen. But you can't\nnecessarily use that extra oxygen, because with low CO2, your blood becomes too\nalkaline. . .Hemoglobin, in an alkaline environment, doesn't want to release\nthe oxygen bound to it. . .Hyperventilation leads to MARTINI EFFECT and\nNIRTOGEN NARCOSIS.. Nitrogen narcosis is a neurological impairment caused by\nexcess dissolved blood nitrogen . . Hyperventilation immediately causes a\nchanged state of consciousness albeit a FAKE one . Low GABA levels are\nassociated with depression and Alzheimer\u2019s disease. . .Hyperventilation is NOT\nyoga.&nbsp; Do NOT do too much kapabathi-- you\nwill get inguinal hernia!Swara Yoga is the science which is about the\nrealization of cosmic consciousness, through the awareness or observation, then\ncontrol or manipulation of the flow of breath in the nostrils. Shiva answers\nParvati's questions ( Vigyan Bhairava Tantra) patiently and fully and goes on\nthe tell her all about swara saying that \"for all beings, breath is only\nthe base.\" These include techniques for managing the planetary effects and\nthe moon's phases and avoiding the negative influence of the planets and astral\nforces, through altering the breath flow or swara in the nostrils, manipulating\nand controlling the breath or the breath flow through each nostril. By swara yoga\nyou can even choose the gender of the baby you want.&nbsp; I guess signs tell us what happens for the\nbest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can alter our\ndestiny by&nbsp; being more auspicious, and\nrealising, and eventually attaining the harmony and the Highest Consciousness.\nSwara yoga is an ancient tantric science which involves the systematic\nstudy&nbsp; of the breath flow through the\nnostrils (or swara) in relation to the prevailing phases of the moon, time of\nday and direction . Although we think of 'pranayama' when we think of\ntechniques associated with the breath, in Swara yoga, it is the association of\nthe breath in relation to the activities or phases or positions of the sun,\nmoon, planets, seasons, time of day, with the physical and mental conditions of\nthe individual and then taking the appropriate action according to these subtle\nrelations. It was kept as a closed secret by the ancient sages and saints who\nhad intuitively received this knowledge from the Divine. Swara yogi knows that\nduring the flow of left nostril or right nostril when favorable elements rises\ncertain things can be undertaken if you want to be successful. There are three\nmodes of breathing- flow from left nostril, flow from right nostril and flow\nfrom both the nostrils. The last mode is generally for a short duration when\nbreathing switches from left to right and vice versa.&nbsp; Mode of breathing can be checked by examining\nair flow while exhaling. All our actions can be classified into three main\ncategories; physical, mental and spiritual; which are respectively presided by\nthe above three modes of breathing.&nbsp;\nBreathing through the left nostril ( ida nadi ) stimulates the right\nhemisphere of brain, and breathing through the right nostril ( pingala nadi )\nstimulates the left hemisphere. Breathing through the left nostril is connected\nwith higher intraocular pressure and breathing through the right nostril lowers\nthat pressure Intraocular pressure&nbsp; is\ncreated by the continual renewal of fluids within the eye. The intraocular\npressure is increased in glaucoma. Breathing through the left nostril\nstimulates Ida which relates to the moon and the parasympathetic nervous\nsystem, breathing through the right stimulates Pingala, relating to the sun and\nsympathetic nervous system.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ida nadi is\nassociated with the rest and restorative system of the body, whereas the\npingala nadi is associated with the fight and flight response. Pranayama starts\nwith the left nostril always. The benefits of left nostril breathing are\nnumerous including sharper, clearer focus of the mind, and a deep, full\nrelaxation or sleep.&nbsp; In the Yogic\ntradition, left nostril breathing has been used to break vices and habits,\nwhich usually take 21 days&nbsp; . If you\nwatch your breath you will find that it is usually flowing more in one nostril\nthan the other. Again, if the left nostril has a greater flow of air, then ida\nnadi is predominant. When the flow is greater in the right nostril, then\npingala is predominant. If the flow is equal, then sushumna is ruling. When the\nright nostril is flowing, then vital energy is more active, allowing the\nindividual to do physical work, digest food and so on. The mind is extroverted\nand the body generates more heat. When the left nostril (ida) is flowing,\nmental energy is dominant, the mind is introverted, any kind of mental work;\nthinking concentration, etc., may be undertaken. Ida nadi also flows mainly\nduring sleep. The primary aim of hatha yoga is to bring about a balance of flow\nbetween the prana in ida and pingala, (ha = sun, tha = moon). To do this the\nbody is purified by the six techniques known as the shatkarmas.&nbsp; As per swara yoga, in a day the flow of air\nthrough the left nostril should predominate for about twelve hours and through\nthe right nostril for the other twelve hours. If pingala flows, the body will\nbe restless; if ida flows, the mind will tend to think too much. In human\nphysiology, the two nadis correspond roughly to the two halves of the autonomic\nnervous system - the sympathetic and parasympathetic. Pingala coincides with\nthe sympathetic nerves, responsible for the stimulation and acceleration of\nactivities concerned with the external environment and the deceleration of the\norgans which tend to utilize a lot of energy internally. The sympathetic nerves\nspeed up the heart, dilate the blood vessels, increase the respiration rate,\nand intensify the efficiency of the eyes, ears, etc. The parasympathetic nerves\ndirectly oppose the sympathetic nerves, for they reduce the heartbeat,\nconstrict the blood vessels, and slow the respiration so that the individual\nbecomes introverted. The flow of prana in ida and pingala is completely\ninvoluntary and unconscious until yogic practices control it. A Swara yogi\nrealizes cosmic consciousness through control and manipulation of breath. The\nancient 7000 year old Sanskrit texts mention 72,000 subtle channels through\nwhich prana flows, the dominant flow of prana occurs within the ida and pingala\nnadis, two channels that course upwards on either side of the spine from their\norigin within the kanda or \u2018bulb\u2019 in the sacral plexus. The ida and pingala\nnadis relate to the activities of the parasympathetic and sympathetic divisions\nof the autonomic nervous system, respectively. Surya Bhedana when breathing in\nthrough the right nostril and Chandra bhedana when breathing in through the\nleft nostril. Breathing in takes air down to the lungs which will produce\nsuction in the eustachian tube. Scientists have postulated that external forces\nset the biological clock by stimulating the pineal gland, which is affected by\ndark/light cycles.&nbsp; These rhythms which\nwere previously known to the ancient Rishis, so man is actually only\nrediscovering himself in relation to the cosmos. By the practice of Swara yoga\none&nbsp; can become the master of the nadis\nand elements, so as to adjust himself with&nbsp;\nthe universal forces which is the source of everything that gives birth\nto the experience of both&nbsp; material and\nspiritual life with heightened awareness.&nbsp;\nAs per Swara Yoga , different modes of breathing leads to different\ntypes of actions; physical, mental and spiritual.&nbsp;&nbsp; Swarodaya Yoga\u2019 has three types of breathing\nsystems \u2013 For a right hander&nbsp; Ida\n(Inhaling and exhaling from&nbsp; left nostril\n), Pingala (inhaling and exhaling from right side of the nostril) and Sushmana\n(inhaling and exhaling from both sides of the nostrils). We mostly breathe in\nand out from either Ida or Pingla but sometimes we breathe from both the\nnostrils.&nbsp; The Sushumna mode is generally\nfor a short duration when breathing switches from left to right and vice\nversa.&nbsp; Mode of breathing can be checked\nby examining air flow while exhaling. Compliance to the dictums of \u2018Swar\nShaastras\u2019 is more efficacious than omens, and a suitable time selected through\nastrology based on moon and planet phases. it was used to go beyond the\nlimitations of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One must change mode of\nbreathing suitably at the time of initiating specific desired activity.\nExample: When the left nostril is running (for righthanders ) , intitiation of\nmantras and consecration of deities in temples is done. When the right nostril\nis running certain deadly and destructive vashikaran mantras of Atharva Veda\nand psychic works are done.&nbsp; I will only\nsay so much. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">With this system, the British\ntax collectors were able to constantly enlarge the assessment, draining the\nvery life blood out of the peasants.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">It was RENT GRABBING , not even extortion &nbsp;\u2013 deceit of the highest order. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">All revenue officers were Jew Rothschild\u2019s\nagents who collected rent as per their whims and fancies . Individual\ncultivators were never allowed a chance of proving what total produce they\nobtained, what their expenses of cultivation were and what net income remained\nto them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">They\nhad even no right of appeal and had either to pay the assessed revenue or quit\ntheir ancestral fields. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>LAND\nGRABBING BY SLIMY DECEIT . <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">ARE WE\nSTUPID MONKEYS?</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>WHY\nARE WE SO THRILLED THAT A WHITE MAN WAS ABLE TO SPEAK TO RAGHAVENDRA SWAMYs\nAPPARITION AND GET PERMISSION FOR THIS SLIMY RYOTWARI SYSTEM ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>WAS\nTHERE NO INTELLIGENT MAN TO PROTEST AND DECLARE THAT THOMAS MUNRO MADE A CHOOT\nOUT OF SIMPLE TAMIL FARMERS &nbsp;?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">The\nincome of Rothschild in the province of Madras alone went skyrocketing.&nbsp; The income from land revenue increased from 29.8\nlakh pounds to 1860 to &nbsp;44.7 lakh pounds s\nin 1873.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">In those days this was big\nmoney. When ryots ( kisan / farmers ) could not generate enough cash by growing\nfood , the white invader forced him to grow cash crops like cotton , indigo etc\nwhich spoilt the top soil.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Famine was deliberately created forcing mass exodus\nto foreign lands on Rothschild\u2019s ships.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FLZE9jVNQg4/WZVHsEYfJtI/AAAAAAABVhI/xLcHOYJAffUTYhFP0fNglNzzKttuATleACLcBGAs/s1600/IndiaFaminAe1832ultonGetty.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"434\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"217\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FLZE9jVNQg4/WZVHsEYfJtI/AAAAAAABVhI/xLcHOYJAffUTYhFP0fNglNzzKttuATleACLcBGAs/s320/IndiaFaminAe1832ultonGetty.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">There\nare NIL Malayalis in the indentured labour descendant diaspora . Maximum were\nTamils, Telugus and Biharis. &nbsp; &nbsp; There can be NO famine in Kerala ever.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Till\nthis blogsite wrote about indentured labour ( euphemism for slaves ) nobody\naccepted it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">HOW DO\nI KNOW?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">I HAVE\nTRAVELLED TO THESE COUNTRIES AND TALKED TO PEOPLE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Today\nWikipedia accept this blogsite\u2019s figures<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Never\nin the history of mankind has there been a saga of such greed and injustice--\nwhere more than </span><span style=\"color: red;\">1.3 million</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> innocent humans were duped whole sale , given a\nlife sentence , dumped in far flung corners of the planet and forgotten for\never.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 17, 2017 at 6:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI don't think there is anything specially called kriya yoga. I think action/asana + words/mantra + pure intention in mind = kriya. I think Surya namaskar becomes kriya if all 3 happen simultaneously. Every posture has a mantra eulogizing surya associated with it, and you should also get the breathing right with clear mind, awareness as to what you are doing, moving from one pose to another with ease, etc.,</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1923072041\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_65B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2039678891691080572\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/rajnikanth-entry-into-politics-babaji.html?showComment=1502975888481#c2039678891691080572\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 17, 2017 at 6:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHERE IS THE BULL\u2014<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe Kriya Yoga which I am giving to the world through you in this nineteenth century,\u201d Babaji told Lahiri Mahasaya, \u201cis a revival of the same science which Krishna gave, millenniums ago, to Arjuna, and which was later known to Patanjali, and to Christ, St. John, St. Paul, and other disciples.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -<br />\n<br />\nPATANJALIs YOGA SUTRAs WERE WRITTEN DOWN IN 5000 BC<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA OF KRISHNA IS 4000 BC<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">JESUS CHRIST, ST PAUL, ST JOHN , KABIRDAS ETC NEVER EXISTED</span></b><br />\n<br />\n\u201cKriya Yoga is an instrument through which human evolution can be quickened,\u201d Sri Yukteswar explained to his students. \u201cThe ancient yogis discovered that the secret of cosmic consciousness is intimately linked with breath mastery. This is India\u2019s unique and deathless contribution to the world\u2019s treasury of knowledge. The life force, which is ordinarily absorbed in maintaining the heart-pump, must be freed for higher activities by a method of calming and stilling the ceaseless demands of the breath.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHEY BABAJI, LAHIRI, YUKTESHWAR, SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND PARTY-- WHY DID YOU ALLOW HYPERVENTILATION--WHICH IS NOT ALLOWED BY ANCIENT INDIAN YOGA?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI MADE MY WIFE PAY AND PARTICIPATE IN SRI SRI RAVISHANKARs SUDARSHAN KRIYA-- IN KNOW WHAT THIS ROGUE DOES TO FOOL THE PEOPLE BY HYPERVENTILATION.<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT YOGA OF PATANJALI ALLOWS ONLY DEEP DIAPHRAGMATIC BREATHIN<br />\n<br />\nTHESE IDIOTS DONT KNOW THAT BY HYPERVENTILATION ( CHEST BREATHING ) YOU DONT INCREASE THE OXYGEN LEVEL IN THE BODY--<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A PARADOX<br />\n<br />\nTHE REVERSE HAPPENS<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation excessively rids the body of carbon dioxide, low carbon dioxide causes blood vessels to constrict, and constricted vessels carry less blood and oxygen to the different parts of the body (including the brain.) This is a condition known as hypoxia, and cells starved of oxygen eventually die.<br />\n<br />\nThese rogues argue that the kriya is \u201ccontrolled hyperventilation\u201d and therefore not harmful.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_66B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_67B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3050478232329775768\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_67M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 17, 2017 at 6:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation is hyperventilation (no matter how you spin it)<br />\n<br />\nI WAS SURPRISED TO SEE THAT INDIAs NO 1 DOCTOR (PRESIDENTs DOCTOR ) WAS EXPLAING THE ECMO MACHINE- HE DID NOT KNOW THE BASIC</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">IF I HAD NOT WRITTEN THE ECMO POST BELOW--PROBABLY JAYALALITHAA WOULD STILL BE IN APOLLO HOSPITAL HOOKED ON TO THE ECMO MACHINE</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html</span><br />\nANCIENT INDIAN YOGA HAS BEEN POLLUTED BY THE STOOGES OF THE WHITE MAN --THE SAME WAY ART HAS BEEN DEGRADED<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/francis-newton-souza-birth-painting.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTODAY ON INDIA TV WE HAVE REMO DSOUZA AND HIS JUDGE PANEL APPRECIATING EVERY BULLSHIT OTHER THAN REAL DANCE.<br />\n<br />\nLAST I SAW WAS A \"RUBBER MAN\" WHO COULD BEND HIS LIMBS INTO GROTESQUE POSITIONS , AS IF THE BODY DID NOT HAVE SOCKETS FOR BONES--AND THEN HOPPING AROUND AS IT IT IS DANCE<br />\n<br />\nYOU SHOULD HAVE SEEN THE STUPID PICKLE JOHN AND CHUTNEY MARY JUDGES CRYING WOW !<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT PRANAYAMA USES NITROGEN (78% )IN THE AIR - NOT JUST OXYGEN ( 20.8%) TO GENERATE NITRIC OXIDE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI HAVE STOPPED WATCHING BABA RAMDEV.<br />\n<br />\nNDTV ASKED HIM TO DEMONSTRATE TWO YOGA EXERCISES-- THIS STUPID MAN DEMONSTRATED TWO ASANAS -- BOTH \"HYPERVENTILATION \"<br />\n<br />\nThe normal breathing rate is 14 to 18 breaths per minute. Carbon dioxide is the gas that normally regulates the rate of breathing.<br />\n<br />\nA rapid rate of breathing can occur normally after RIGOROUS exercise. In addition, panic states and high altitude climbs can also raise the respiratory rate. When these conditions occur, individuals may have a variety of symptoms related to pH changes in their bodies caused by the hyperventilation.<br />\n<br />\nIn the blood, much of the carbon dioxide produced is converted into an acid, carbonic acid. When this acid reaches the lungs, it is converted back to carbon dioxide and exhaled. Hyperventilation causes a fall in the body's carbon dioxide. As a result, the amount of acid produced is decreased, leading to a rise in the body's pH. This condition is known as alkalosis.<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide acts on certain respiratory centers in the brain and normally stimulates breathing. A fall in carbon dioxide levels therefore causes a fall in the rate of respiration, which then serves to normalize the levels of this gas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you do hyperventilation the carbon dioxide levels fall abnormally low. As a result, a mild level of alkalosis ensues. The alkalosis can cause a number of symptoms, such as a tingling sensation around the mouth and extremities.<br />\n<br />\nCHANTING OM LIKE AN IDIOT WHEN THIS TINGLING HAPPENS -IS NOT DIVINE REACTION<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA AND YOGA BANS HYPERVENTILATION .<br />\n<br />\nIN YOGA HYPERVENTLATION IS DONE FOR A FEW SECONDS ONLY TO CHANGE THE PREDOMINANT NOSTRIL. THERE ARE GREAT VEDIC SECRETS ATTACHED TO THIS INCLUDING HAVING A MALE BABY<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_67MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_67BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_67B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_68B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4029717331369037153\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/rajnikanth-entry-into-politics-babaji.html?showComment=1502975948569#c4029717331369037153\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 17, 2017 at 6:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe medical term for low serum carbon dioxide levels caused by hypverventilation is called hypocapnia.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHypocapnia reduces blood flow through vasoconstriction, or narrowed blood vessels. Reduced blood flow and bronchoconstriction, or narrowed bronchial tubes, reduces blood oxygenation. These characteristics of hypocapnia place excess pressure on the heart.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKARs SOHUM SUDARSHAN KRIYA HAS CAUSED DEATHS IN SOUTH AMERICA. HE WILL BE ARRESTED THE NEXT TIME HE GOES THERE AS PER MY OFFICERS . THIS ROGUE HAS FOOLED PEOPLE ENOUGH.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHypocapnia causes respiratory alkalosis, which is an elevation in blood pH. Respiratory alkalosis results in a reduction of serum calcium ions and arterial bicarbonate, which stimulates the sympathetic nervous system. Sympathetic stimulation caused by hypocapnia can result in numbness, dizziness, fainting, seizures, tingling sensations, paralysis, cold flashes and blurred vision, cumulatively known as neuronal irritability, or hyperirritability.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHypocapnia causes sharp reductions of blood serum phosphate ions, clinically known as hypophosphatemia. This aspect of hypocapnia increases the likelihood of cardiovascular and respiratory difficulties because hypophosphatemia results in the destruction of red blood cells, further reducing oxygenation and causing damage that may persist even after treatment for hypocapnia. Other direct effects of hypophosphatemia include confusion, muscle weakness, heart damage, anemia, disorientation and coma.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE NEED GURUS AND YOGA MASTERS WITH A TECHNICAL BRAIN-- INSTEAD WE HAVE ENGLISH LITERATURE GURUS LIKE SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_7.html?showComment=1483885255477#c8018976943596300153\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 8, 2017 at 7:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTIME TO PASTE THE WHITE MANs LIE \u2013WHO HAS CLAIMED THE ANCIENT KERALA ASTROLOGY GEAR FOR THEMSELVES .<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS WILL NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>25.5%</b></span>&nbsp;..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WROTE THAT ANCIENT KERALA NAVIGATORS TRADED WITH CRETE \u2013ALL RIDICULED AND ROLLED IN EXTREME SARCASM<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><b>Antikythera mechanism</b></span>&nbsp;is an astrological instrument and belongs to ancient Kerala Navigators. This instrument was found in the NW coast of Crete.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MqhuAnySPZ0</span><br />\n<br />\nIn ancient days only Kerala had the knowledge of astronomy and astrology.. The front dial has two concentric, circular scales that represent the path of the ecliptic through the heavens and only India knew of precession those days..<br />\n<br />\nThe outer ring is marked off with the days of the 365-days of the Indian calendar. .<br />\n<br />\nOn the inner ring, there is a second dial marked with the Vedic signs of the Zodiac and it is divided into degrees..The mechanism has a Rose wood casing with a front and a back door<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TO CLAIM THAT THE INVENTION IS GREEK THE ROGUES HAVE KICKED BACK THE INSTRUMENT IN TIME TO 200 BC. &nbsp; &nbsp; IT IS FAR OLDER TO THE TIME WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE &nbsp;.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBY THIS TIME THE GREEKS WERE STUDYING ASTRONOMY IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY BELONGING TO THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN ).<br />\n<br />\nURANUS ( SHWETA ) , NEPTUNE ( SHYAMA ) AND PLUTO (TEEVRA ) WAS NOT USED IN KERALA ASTROLOGY \u2013SAME WITH THIS INSTRUMENT.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INSTRUMENT CANNOT BE MADE WITHOUT DEEP KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere are 54 gears inside this instrument in Shiva Shakti format \u2013in consonance with the Hindu King Mantra 108\u2014this instrument was&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><b>meant to move perpetually</b></span>&nbsp;.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST\u2014THE ARANMULA MIRROR , THE RUDRAKSHA MALA , IVORY COMB AND NANDI HUMPED BULL BELONGS TO KERALA<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE WILL EXPOSE THE IMMORAL THEFTS OF THE WHITE MAN. I HAVE NOT EVEN STARTED SERIOUSLY .<br />\n<br />\nTHE ROMAN EMPEROR CREATED THE BIBLE IN 325 AD, WITH HELP FROM SAGES FROM KERALA.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE ROMAN SENATE WAS PAGAN ( HINDU THOSE DAYS )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_88MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; INDIRA GANDHI WAS POWERLESS TO STOP VV\nGIRI ..<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CONGRESS HAD NOMINATED SANJIVA REDDY... OPPOSITION HAD\nNOMINATED CHITPAVAN JEW CD DESHMUKH.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALL THOSE WHO THINK THAT AN INDEPENDENT MAN CAN WIN AN\nELECTION AGAINST THE MIGHT OF THE RULING PARTY AND THE COMBINED OPPOSITION\nPARTIES-- RAISE YOUR HANDS..</span></span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent Sarojini\nNaidu was also in London with Gokhale. &nbsp;Rothschild rewarded her. Sarojini baby would\nbe the president of the Indian National Congress in 1925 and the first woman in\nIndia to do so.&nbsp; She was awarded the\nKaisar-i-Hind Medal by Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Gandhi finally met\nGokhale in London on September 18, 1914. They proceeded the plan to sabotage\nIndia\u2019s freedom movement according to the design of the British\naggressors.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Gopal Krishna Gokhale,\nsaid that it is immaterial who rules the country </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">as long as its people have\nsecurity and reasonable freedom in their private life</span><span style=\"color: red;\">,&nbsp; as given to them by the British-- just like\nBR Ambedkar later.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi and BR Ambedkar recruited&nbsp; 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in\nthe second World war.&nbsp;&nbsp; Out of this\n243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; soldiers were\nkilled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BIG MISTAKE\u2014 &nbsp;BECAUSE WHEN\nTHE INDIAN NAVY MUTINIED IN 1946 ( JOINED BY AIRFORCE AND ARMY ) THERE WERE 23\nLAKH BATTLE HARDENED PISSED OFF INDIAN SOLDIERS ANGRY WITH TRAITOR GANDHI AND HIS <b style=\"background-color: white;\">SELECTIVE AHIMSA </b>BULLSHIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD DID NOT CARE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BECAUSE THE POLICE WERE\nWITH HIM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEN MALABAR SPECIAL\nREGIMENT ( 800 STRONG KALARI EXPERTS- KERALA POLICE ) REVOLTED \u2013&nbsp; ROTHSCHILD KNEW HIS GAME WAS UP. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MALABAR\nSPECIAL REGIMENT USED TO DO SURYANAMASKAR AT DAY BREAK IN CALICUT MANACHIRA\nMAIDAN WITH RSS . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY FATHER AS MEMBER OF\nCALICUT RSS SHAKA WOULD BE THERE DAILY \u2013 &nbsp;AS HIS OFFICE \u201c THE COMMON WEALTH TRUST LTD \u201c ( CALLED GERMAN BASEL MISSION BEFORE WW1 ) &nbsp;OWNED\nBY ROTHSCHILD WAS JUST ACROSS THE STREET -- 10 METRES AWAY.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">: Both my parents worked in the brown tiled office between the pool and the maidan.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The white GM of this office was the uncrowned king of Calicut. &nbsp; His bungalow \"Beach Bungalow\" was the best house in Calicut</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>All junior managers ( dozens of them ) were British . These white men lived in greater style than the Dukes, Earls and Lords back home .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
