font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/rajnikanth-entry-into-politics-babaji.html?showComment=1503115971627#c4042577597502051004\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 19, 2017 at 9:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_179MC\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nKNOWING THAT THIS \"IMMACULATE CONCEPTION \" WAS A BIT TO LARGE FOR ANYBODY TO SWALLOW--THE POPE HAS PUT A SPIN INTO IT<br />\n<br />\n##################<br />\n<br />\nThe official statement of the doctrine reads, \u201cThe blessed Virgin Mary to have been, from the first instant of her conception, by a singular grace and privilege of Almighty God, in view of the merits of Christ Jesus the Savior of Mankind, preserved free from all stain of <b><span style=\"color: red;\">ORIGINAL SIN</span></b> \u201d (Pope Pius IX, Ineffabilis Deus, December 1854). Essentially, the Immaculate Conception is the belief that Mary was protected from original sin, that Mary did not have a sin nature and was, in fact, sinless.<br />\n<br />\n############<br />\n<br />\n<i>Several centuries ago, the Pope decided that all the Jews had to leave the Vatican. Naturally there was a big uproar from the Jewish community.<br /><br />So the Pope made a deal. He would have a religious debate with a member of the Jewish community. If the Jew won, the Jews could stay. If the Pope won, the Jews would leave.<br /><br />The Jews realized that they had no choice. So they picked an elderly aged man named Moishe to represent them. Rabbi Moishe's Latin wasn't very good - in fact, he knew very little --- but he was a man of great faith and well respected in the Jewish community.<br /><br />The pope agreed. What could be easier than a silent debate?<br /><br />The day of the great debate came. Moishe and the Pope sat opposite each other for a full minute before the Pope raised his hand and showed three fingers. Moishe looked back at him and raised one finger. The Pope waved his fingers in a circle around his head. Moishe pointed to the ground where he sat.<br /><br />The Pope pulled out a wafer and a glass of wine. Moishe pulled out an apple. The Pope stood up and said, \"I give up. This man is too good. The Jews can stay.\"<br /><br />An hour later, the cardinals were all around the Pope asking him what happened. The Pope said: \"First I held up three fingers to represent the Trinity. He responded by holding up one finger to remind me that there was still one God common to both our religions.<br /><br />Then I waved my finger around me to show him that God was all around us. He responded by pointing to the ground and showing that God was also right here with us.<br /><br />I pulled out the wine and the wafer to show that God absolves us from our sins.<br /><br />He pulled out an apple to remind me of ze <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>ORIGINAL SIN.</b></span><br /><br />He had an answer for everything. What could I do?\"<br /><br />Meanwhile, the Jewish community had crowded around Moishe. \"What happened?\" they asked.<br /><br />\"Well,\" said Moishe, \"First he said to me that the Jews had three days to get out of here. I told him that not one of us was leaving.<br /><br />Then he told me that this whole city would be cleared of Jews. I let him know that we were staying right here.\"<br /><br />\"And then?\" asked a woman.<br /><br />\"I don't know,\" said Moishe. \"He took out his dang lunch and so I took out mine.\"</i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ElX2PjbuFoY/WZfF33uNSmI/AAAAAAABVkQ/xcOtZFdTgPQ9y37Fp_8rkOVRCsVrnrTIACLcBGAs/s1600/oAAriginalsin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"343\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ElX2PjbuFoY/WZfF33uNSmI/AAAAAAABVkQ/xcOtZFdTgPQ9y37Fp_8rkOVRCsVrnrTIACLcBGAs/s640/oAAriginalsin.jpg\" width=\"456\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Original sin &nbsp;is \u201cthat sin and its guilt that all Christians\npossess in God\u2019s eyes as a direct result of Adam\u2019s sin in the Garden of Eden.\u201d\n( eating an apple from the forbidden tree)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God hold Christians &nbsp;accountable for a sin they did not personally\ncommit?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Christ is gonna save them , right ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any form of fundamentalism starts by\nbrainwashing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">You cannot be a Hindu heretic , because there\nis no standard set of dogmas in Hindu faith , written or unwritten, from which\ndeviation could make you a heretic.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In Sanatana Dharma the greatest sin is to\ncall man a sinner and a CUNT priest asking him to repent..you see, only this CUNT wearing divine robes can save him .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Human acts without conscience which creates\nconflict is called Adharma.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The fundamentals of Dharma as per the Bhagwat Gita\nare-- respect, truth, grace, restraint, love, non-violence, restraint, lack of\njealousy and greed, knowledge of self and austerity. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The whole idea of Vaastu was to construct\nsomething without disturbing the flow of nature and interrupting natural flow\nof energy..&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Mata Bumih Putroaham prithviahah.--&nbsp;</i>\nEarth is my mother and I am her son.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;Hindu\nVedas and mantras revere,&nbsp; nay , worship\nnature , and its flora and fauna. Many animals and birds were vehicles of god.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The deities of Hinduism permeate the world of nature.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma has no founder or a Supreme\nhead or supreme holy book . <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hindu scripture, based on the insights of\nHindu sages and seers, serves primarily as a guidebook.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">There is NO supreme middleman like the Pope\nwho can canonise a human into a saint, by hoodwinking the unsuspecting masses.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hinduism\ndoes NOT care for individual leadership or hierarchy.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Our gods are cosmic allegories except Vishnu\nhuman avatars .. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hinduism has neither a beginning or founder,\nnor a central authority, hierarchy, or organization.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">ROGUE GURUS WHO HAVE WRANGLED PADMA VIBHUSHAN\nFROM PM MODI &nbsp;MUST KNOW THIS <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;This\nis the reason why Sanatana Dharma cannot be destroyed<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It is a movement based on principles or\nevolved over time code of Dharma. It is a relentless pursuit of truth, flexible\nto suit all situations.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This is a religion without fundamentals or lack of\ncompulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the line.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hinduism\nhas never converted , by guile ( Christian missionaries ) or force ( Muslim )\n-- nor has a army of missionaries , ramming it down unwilling throats.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The eternal truths in the Vedas were written\nby our great seers without junk DNA in their bodies and king sized resonating\npineal glands. It is NOT mere speculation of guesswork.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hinduism is based on reason and NOT\nfaith--unless the faith is an extension of reason. It has its own beliefs,\ntimeless traditions, ethics, rituals, philosophy and theology.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I once read a thick book written by a white\nCollector of Malabar about superstitions in Malabar ( North Kerala ).&nbsp; The whole idea was to tell the world that we\nare monkeys . Every sentence was a WHITE LIE<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THERE IS ZERO SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA\nIF YOU UNDERSTAND QUANTUM PHYSICS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WE DON\u2019T\nBELIEVE IN GHOSTS OR TRAPPED SOULS RESIDING IN GRAVES<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">At the heart of Hinduism remains mans'\nessential quest for union with the Absolute supreme.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">For Sanatana Dharma , time is cyclic-like\nseasons. It is NOT linear like the concept of other religions, which made them\nfocus on death rather than life and NOW..&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hindus believe in the doctrine of\nreincarnation. This is the belief that each of us has a soul and that our souls\nare involved in a cycle of birth, death and rebirth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Reincarnation is tied closely to the doctrine\nof karma. Karma is the belief that the actions during the previous life\ndetermine the conditions of each person's birth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This is the only religion that&nbsp; has NOT reduced itself to one man, one book,\none faith.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Sanatana as \u201ceternal moral order\u201d encourages\nHindus to seeks and moral truth wherever it might be found, each individual\nmust realize this truth through his or her own systematic effort.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hindu scripture, based on the insights of\nHindu sages and seers, serves primarily as a guidebook. But ultimately truth\ncomes to us through direct consciousness of the divine or the ultimate reality.\nas GOD. Hindus refer to it as Brahman..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I have read every single holy book of other\nreligions\u2014I have them in my library. I know !<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In many religions truth is delivered or\nrevealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for\nexample, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in\nIslam.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In the Hindu tradition, by contrast, there is\nno single revelation,&nbsp; by which people\nmay achieve knowledge of the divine or lead a life backed by religious law.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Hindu tradition acknowledges that there\nare many paths by which people may seek and experience religious understanding\nand direction<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Hindu tradition , unlike other religions\n--has always concerned itself with the human situation rather than the Hindu\nsituation.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Instead of basing its identity on separating Hindu from non-Hindu or\nbeliever from non-believer, Hinduism has sought to recognize principles and\npractices that would lead any individual to become a better human being and\nunderstand and live in harmony with dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Dharma is an all-important concept for Hindus.\nIn addition to tradition and moral order, it also signifies the path of\nknowledge and correct action.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Under the doctrine of karma, the ability to\nmake choices remains with the individual. We don\u2019t carry somebody else\u2019s\nbaggage called ORIGINAL SIN.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">A further characteristic of Hinduism is the\nideal of ahimsa. Ahimsa, \u201cnon-injury\u201d or the absence of the desire to harm, is\nregarded by Indian thinkers as one of the keystones of their ethics.\nHistorically, ahimsa is unrelated to vegetarianism<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Openness is the essence of Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">India is the only place on this planet where\nJews have never been persecuted . There has never been an episode of anti\nSeminitism in India.&nbsp; Jews have been\ngetting royally screwed all over the world, by all the people, all the time,\nfor their inherent greed and selfishness. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">What more proof is required ? <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The ungrateful Jews have never ever\nacknowledges this. I don\u2019t like ungrateful people. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Gratitude is inherent, which makes Sanatana\nDharma noble . Example: A Hindu will never ever neglect his aged and vulnerable\nparents.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Divorce rate within Hindus is the lowest in\nthe world--it is a mindset . Marriage is NOT based on lust, but by sacred\ncommitment of 7 pheras&nbsp; around a holy\nfire. The sacred fire serves as a witness to the vows exchanged between the\nbride and the bridegroom. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">No Hindu woman will go for silicon implants\nto save her marriage.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The sacrament of death calls for cremation\n(burning of the dead body), at the end of which the ashes are collected and\ndeposited, usually by the sea side of or in a river<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">A true Hindu will not exploit vulnerability.\nHinduism does not allow you to breach a trust. When a Hindu says \"thank\nyou\", he really means it. When a Hindu greets you with a Namaste, he bows\nto the greatness in you\u2014the soul\u2014the part of Brahman <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Hinduism\u2019s universal world-view and its\nwillingness to accept and celebrate diverse philosophies, deities, symbols, and\npractices, makes it a religion that emphasizes similarities and shared\ncharacteristics rather than differences.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">We Hindus are proud of the diversity, the\nrange, and the lofty metaphysical aspirations of Vedanta.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; John Bernardone Morosini ( Francis of Assisi ) was born in Paris to a rich Jewish banking family -- a family of Sephardic Jewish Venetian traders. His father was a banker JEW Peter Bernardone Moriconi . The name \"Francis\" is a nickname anomic \u2013just means born in France.<br />\n<br />\nThe Morosini family stretched from England to Constantinople. The Mosrosini ships took in Kerala spices from Constantinople and sold it all over Europe.<br />\n<br />\nDongaressa Morosina Morosini-Grimani was the daughter of Andrea Morosini, who married Marino Grimani in 1560. Shakespeare\u2019s \u201cMerchant of Venice\u201d is inspired by this family\u2014Shylock the JEW is from this play.<br />\n<br />\nJOSE BEN JOEZER WAS THE FIRST NAZI\u2014HE WAS A DISGRACED KERALA NAMBOODIRI . HIS SON WAS A HOMOSEXUAL<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS A NASI<br />\n<br />\nAFTER HITLER CHAIM WEIZMANN BECAME NASI<br />\n<br />\nNASI IS A HEBREW TERM FOR LEADER OF JEWS OR PRESIDENT OF THE SANHEDRIN . NAZI IS DERIVED FROM NASI<br />\n<br />\nThe Sanhedrin trial of Jesus Christ is a cooked up story \u2013as Jesus never existed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBAR KOKHBA WAS A NASI\u2014SECOND<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</span><br />\n<br />\n\u201cBabaji, Lahiri Mahasaya, and Sri Yukteswar,\u201d Yogananda announced, \u201cwere the three wise men who came to visit the Christ child in the manger\u201d (Kriyananda, 1979).-SIC<br />\n<br />\nTHE BIBLE WAS EDITED BY KERALA NAMBOODIRIS - USING COSMIC ALLEGORIES LIKE FOR HINDU GODS<br />\n<br />\nJESUS NEVER EXISTED<br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW , READ THE <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>\"APUN BHI COSMIC ALLEGORY\" </b></span>FUNDA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\nThe Bible has amazing similarities with 7000 year old Indian Vedic Astronomical texts.<br />\n<br />\n3 wise kings sitting on 3 camels follow the eastern star\u2014The 3 stars of \" belt of orion constellation\" ( alnitak/ alnilam/ mintaka ) aligns with the brightest star in the heavens , Sirius ( canis major constellation ) on 25th Dec. Draw a straight line through theses 4 points-- and the sun rises there.<br />\n<br />\nThe annual eclipses of the Sirius system by the Sun are extremely precise. Sirius (Mrgavyadha \"deer hunter ) rises just before the Sun on the morning of June 19th, exactly 365 days, 6 hours, 9 minutes, and 9.54 seconds after its last rising.<br />\n<br />\nIn the past the new year has been celebrated by most people on the planet on the morning of June 19th, at the rising of Sirius.<br />\n<br />\n3 wise men sitting on camels reach Bethlehem and see Jesus born in the stable delivered by virgin Mary.<br />\n<br />\nWhy a strange place as a stable?<br />\n<br />\nThe stable is to be construed between the Makara Capricon goat and Dhanu Sagittarius horse constellations.<br />\n<br />\nConstellation Virgo which has Spica star is house of bread. ( Virgin girl holding bread corn ) . HE IS SUSTAINED BY EVIL CRIMINALS WHO LAUNDER MONEY AND CREATE VOTEBANKS.<br />\n<br />\nRAMPAL WHO IS IN JAIL IS JUST AN EGOLESS CREATURE WHO IS CONTROLLED BY EVIL FORCES<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THERE ARE GURUS WHO ARE JAILED BY FALSE CASES , JUST TO SHOW THAT HINDU GURUS ARE SEX MANIACS --NOT JUST CATHOLIC PADRES IN CHURCHES<br />\n<br />\nEVERY GODMAN CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS FALSE JUICY STORIES OF THEIR SUPERNATURAL POWERS<br />\n<br />\nJUST AN EXAMPLE--ONE OF MY READERS WANTED IT.<br />\n<br />\nSri Ramanuja, the foremost exponent of Vishishtadwaita, went on foot in search of his guru Yamunacharya at Srirangam to take over the mantle of leadership from him, as Yamunacharya was almost nearing his end. By the time he reached Srirangam, Yamunacharya had passed away and arrangements were being made for his Samadhi.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Ramanuja went to have darshan of the dead body of his Guru, he was amazed to find that the three fingers of the right hand of the dead Swamiji were tightly folded in RIGOR MORTIS .<br />\n<br />\nThere was a sudden intuitive flash in the heart of Ramanuja and he felt that the phenomenon of closed fingers signified three tasks which were close to the heart of the dead Acharya and which he could not take up while alive.<br />\n<br />\nThese works were: --<br />\n1 To write a commentary on the Brahma Sutras of Badarayana<br />\n2. To write a commentary on the Divya Prabandham, the Sookthis of the divine Alwars in Tamil.. Compose a commentary on Tiruvaymozhi of Nammalvar the most prolific of Alvars ( Saint \u015aa\u0163hakopa)<br />\n3. Firmly establish and spread the name of Sage Parashara, the author of Sri Vishnu Puranam, by creating Visishtadvaita Bhashya.<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYY !!<br />\n<br />\nRamanuja openly took a pledge to perform these three desired tasks. Immediately the three fingers of the dead Acharya returned to their normal positions like magic. Of course only Ramanuja has the powers to see this happening .<br />\n<br />\nBRRAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY !!<br />\n<br />\nSaint Ramanujacharya was by Jew Rothschild used to created VIOLENT conflict between Vaishnavites and Shaivites--DIVIDE AND RULE..<br />\n<br />\nNOW THIS IS A DIVINE INDICATION THAT SAINT RAMANUJACHARYA IS CHOSEN BY LORD VISHNU HIMSELF ( and his works must be treated as gospel ) RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\nTEEE HEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU CANNOT EXISTS WITHOUT SHIVA , AS THE TRINITY OF SANATANA DHARMA IS COMPLIMENTARY FIELD -- SO THERE GOES THE DEBATES OF SAINT RAMANUJACHARYA INTO THE GARBAGE BIN.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Vishnu are cosmic allegories.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\nRothschild ensured that major temples were dedicated to Ramanuja. This is NOT allowed in Sanatana Dharma. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u3WPJ9xrZH4/WZGcAhbbTJI/AAAAAAABVcQ/hXSzpnpb20cOC--_LNjOvxc_gU6ts93bQCLcBGAs/s1600/dow0nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"195\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u3WPJ9xrZH4/WZGcAhbbTJI/AAAAAAABVcQ/hXSzpnpb20cOC--_LNjOvxc_gU6ts93bQCLcBGAs/s400/dow0nload.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nRights Commission (NHRC) of India is an autonomous public body constituted on\n12 October 1993 under the Protection of Human Rights Ordinance of 28 September\n1993.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was\ngiven a statutory basis by the Protection of Human Rights Act, 1993 (TPHRA). The\nNHRC is the National Human Rights Commission of India, responsible for the\nprotection and promotion of human rights, defined by the Act as \"rights\nrelating to life, liberty, equality and dignity of the individual guaranteed by\nthe Constitution or embodied in the International Covenants\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Human\nRights\" means the rights relating to life, liberty, equality and dignity\nof the individual guaranteed by the constitution or embodied in the\nInternational covenants and enforceable by courts in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TPHRA\nmandates the NHRC to perform the following functions:---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">proactively\nor reactively inquire into violations of human rights or negligence in the\nprevention of such violation by a public servant<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">by\nleave of the court, to intervene in court proceeding relating to human rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to\nvisit any jail or other institution under the control of the State Government,\nwhere persons are detained or lodged for purposes of treatment, reformation or\nprotection, for the study of the living conditions of the inmates and make\nrecommendations<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">review\nthe safeguards provided by or under the Constitution or any law for the time\nbeing in force for the protection of human rights and recommend measures for their\neffective implementation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">review\nthe factors, including acts of terrorism that inhibit the enjoyment of human\nrights and recommend appropriate remedial measures<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to\nstudy treaties and other international instruments on human rights and make\nrecommendations for their effective implementation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">undertake\nand promote research in the field of human rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">engage\nin human rights education among various sections of society and promote\nawareness of the safeguards available for the protection of these rights through\npublications, the media, seminars and other available means<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">encourage\nthe efforts of NGOs and institutions working in the field of human rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">such\nother function as it may consider it necessary for the protection of human\nrights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">requisitioning\nany public record or copy thereof from any court or office<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nNHRC consists of:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nChairperson, should be retired Chief Justice of India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One\nmember who is, or has been, a Judge of the Supreme Court of India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One\nmember who is, or has been, the Chief Justice of a High Court<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Two\nmembers to be appointed from among persons having knowledge of, or practical\nexperience in, matters relating to human rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\naddition, the Chairpersons of four National Commissions (Scheduled Castes,\nScheduled Tribes, Women and Minorities) serve as ex officio members.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nsitting Judge of the Supreme Court or sitting Chief Justice of any High Court\ncan be appointed only after the consultation with the Chief Justice of Supreme\nCourt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nChairperson and members of the NHRC are appointed by the President of India, on\nthe recommendation of a committee consisting of:---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nPrime Minister (Chairperson)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nHome Minister<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nLeader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha (Lower House)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nLeader of the Opposition in the Rajya Sabha (Upper House)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nSpeaker of the Lok Sabha (Lower House)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nDeputy Chairman of the Rajya Sabha (Upper House)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nNHRC has been accredited with \"A status\" by the International\nCoordinating Committee of National Human Rights Institutions (the ICC),\nindicating that it is in conformity with the Paris Principles \u2013 a broad set of\nprinciples agreed upon by a conference of experts on the promotion and\nprotection of human rights, in Paris in October 1991, and subsequently endorsed\nby the UN General Assembly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Commission is thus entitled to participate in\nthe ICC and in its regional sub-group, the Asia Pacific Forum, and may take\npart in certain sessions of the UN human rights committees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE THE\nPEOPLE WARN THE JUDGES IN NHRC.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE DON\u2019T\nCARE IF YOU ARE PART OF JEW ROTHSCHILDs PARIS PRINCIPLES <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE\nWANT THE FALIS AND SOLIS OF NHRC ( JUDGES OR LAWYERS ) TO SHED THEIR MINDSET OF\nROTHSCHILDS \u201cJUSTICE IS BLIND\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE\nWANT YOU TO DELIVER \u201cNATURAL JUSTICE \u201c WITHIN THE \u201cPERIMETER OF CONTEXT\u201d</b><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE THE\nPEOPLE ASK YOU TO REMEMBER \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE THE\nPEOPLE ARE ON TOP OF THE CONSTITUTION<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WATAN\nIS ON TOP OF WE THE PEOPLE ( FUCK THE COMMIE IDEOLOGY )<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>DHARMA\n( NATURAL JUSTICE ) IS ON TOP OF THE WATAN<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO FAR\nNHRC HAS FUCKED IT UP EVERY SINGLE TIME.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;WE THE PEOPLE WATCH.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY\nDOES JEW NOAM CHOMSKY EXERT SOME SORT OF DIVINE RIGHT OVER NHRC?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE\nKNOW WHY!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE&nbsp; THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW NHRC TO TREAT UNIFORMED\nJAWANS AS THEIR NATURAL ENEMIES\u2014BE WARNED !&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JAWANS ARE HUMANS TOO-- THEY TOO HAVE FAMILIES</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I ONCE ASKED A ITF MAN-- <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" YOU CUNT, &nbsp;IN YOUR OPINION IS THE SHIPCAPTAIN &nbsp;A SAILOR OR A LANDLUBBER ?\"</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TNfkYOwK6LM/WZJuU-IUhfI/AAAAAAABVc8/oNjvpwFMQ7sjv9r7rr1OGFrYyrWg0dWZwCLcBGAs/s400/im7ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma broadly means\nrighteousness.. Hinduism is a spiritual code based on dharma.&nbsp; Hindusim has core values like integrity,\nethics, compassion , fairness, transparency, respect , tolerance for culture, sense\nof responsibility, spirit of inclusion etc .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We temper all technical judgments\nby the need to support and maintain human values. Human acts without conscience\nwhich creates conflict is called Adharma.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the Bhagawat\nGita , the fundamentals of dharma are-- truth, grace, restraint, love,\nnon-violence, restraint, lack of jealousy and greed, knowledge of self and\nausterity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Bhagwat Gita,\nLord Krishna declares to Arjuna 6000 years ago:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharmenaavirodheshu\nKaamosmi Bharatarshabha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI am those desires\nthat are not against the Dharma\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is a concept of\ncentral importance in Indian philosophy and religion. However dharma is not the\nsame as religion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Law in the universal or\nabstract sense, dharma designates those behaviours considered necessary for the\nmaintenance of the natural order of things. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma governed by\nhuman conscience is 'the path of righteousness', the way of 'correct',\n'appropriate', 'decent', or 'proper' behavior.&nbsp;\nDharma is the moral law combined with spiritual discipline that guides\none's life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus consider dharma\nthe very foundation of life. It means \"that which holds\" the people\nof this world and the whole creation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is the \"law\nof being\" without which things cannot exist\u2014 even the WATAN <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Rigveda, there\nis this belief (and observation) that a natural justice and harmony pervades\nthe natural world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma does\nnot allow you to exploit vulnerability. &nbsp;Jew Rothschild\u2019s JUSTICE IS BLIND system is\noutside the perimeter of DHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism does not allow\nyou to breach a trust. When a Hindu says \"thank you\", he really means\nit.&nbsp; We dont use FAKE meaningless thank\nyou and \u201cdomo arigato gozaimasu\u201d with every breath-- in a ridiculous manner .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana as \u201ceternal\nmoral order\u201d encourages Hindus to seeks and moral truth wherever it might be\nfound, each individual must realize this truth through his or her own\nsystematic effort. Hindu scripture, based on the insights of noble and graceful\nHindu sages and seers, serves primarily as a guidebook.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cDharma\u201d is that which\nupholds, nourishes or supports the stability of the society, maintains the\nsocial order and secures the general well-being and progress of mankind\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate goal for\nSanatana Dharma is material and spiritual well-being of the mankind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consumption of food,\nsleep, fear, and enjoyment of sex are common to man and animal.&nbsp; But, 'Dharma' is a special attribute of the\nconscious man . Bereft of 'Dharma', man is equal to anima1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whether the rules of\nDharma that :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Everyone should tell\nthe truth;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. No one should\nindulge in violence against other living beings;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. No one should acquire\nillegitimate wealth;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Every one should\nestablish control over his senses;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. There should be\npurity in thought, speech and deed;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Everyone should\nrender service to other individuals;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Every one should\neschew selfishness and greed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. The world should be\nregarded as one family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples of dharma that\napply to day-to-day life:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vyakti dharma - the\ndharma of an individual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parivarika dharma -\nfamily dharma (also called kutumba dharma)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samaja dharma -\nsocietal dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rashtra dharma -\nnational dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manava dharma - the\ndharma of mankind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varna dharma -\nprofessional dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apad dharma -\nexceptional/abnormal situational dharma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yuga dharma - dharma\napplicable for an age<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashrama dharma - dharma\nfor stage of life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Ayam Nijah Paroveti\nGanana Laghu Chetasaam<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Udaara Charitaanaam tu\nVasudhaiva Kutumbakam</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSmall and\nnarrow-minded people look at the reality in terms of \u2018this is yours and this is\nmine\u2019; for those of higher consciousness the whole world is a family\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT INDIA DID NOT\nNEED A CONSTITUTION <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Tqj3NHVOngI/WZJu9qSeZcI/AAAAAAABVdE/_MBTK5WVZ2IkbPR9qG0ioCKvtLWC1ZhVwCLcBGAs/s1600/imEDages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
