line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the white\nChristian man first stepped into India in 1498, India was the world\u2019s richest\ncountry. India held 40% of the world's GDP.&nbsp;\nIndia and China together held 58% of the world's GDP in 1498-the year\nVasco Da Gama landed in Calicut .&nbsp; These\nare conservative estimates by the white man himself , like how Alexander\ndefeated Porus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the British\nfinally left in 1947, India was converted to one of the poorest countries on\nthe planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In such a short time\nthey built roads, railway, harbors , airports and bridges to rob India\nblind.&nbsp; After that these immoral people\nridiculed us as being beggars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WHITE INVADER WAS\nABLE TO DO THIS ONLY BECAUSE THEY ENFORCED \u201c</span><span style=\"color: red;\">JUSTICE IS BLIND</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201d SYSTEM</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 17.6px; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nSeptember 22, 2015 at 9:11 AM<br />\n<br />\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nI just had a HUGE laugh.<br />\n<br />\nI was reminded of the spokesman for the waitress , Manish TiwariJI.<br />\n<br />\nHe would literally throw this word <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DICHOTOMY</span></b> around \u2014 along with \u201c cart before horse\u201d, \u201c hunt with hounds and run with hare\u201d etc --<br />\n<br />\nBLAH BLAH fuckin\u2019 BLAH.<br />\n<br />\nHey Tiwari JI\u2014suno \u2013<br />\n<br />\n-the uninitiated too \u2013listen up-<br />\n<br />\nDichotomy is a fork into two equal parts\u2014 different .<br />\n<br />\nIt is NOT the difference between two opposite things or a division into two opposite groups<br />\n<br />\nA \"false dichotomy,\" occurs when a situation is unfairly represented as an \"either/or\" scenario.<br />\n<br />\nI never permitted a dichotomy to rule mE life.<br />\n<br />\nI treated mE life as an adventure.<br />\n<br />\nFor me work was play.<br />\n<br />\nMy spare time was less exciting than my work time.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\n########################<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN THESE POSTS FOR THE SOLIs AND FALIs OF THIS PLANET\u2014 SUB KO CHOOTIYA BANAYA BADA BADA SHABDH BOLKE !<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice_9.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFALSE DICHOTOMY ?<br />\n<br />\nI AM IMPRESSED \u2013WHAT A LEARNED SAGE !</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: xx-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">MANISH TIWARIJI AAPKA CHARAN KAMAL KITHE ?</span></b></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit VadakayilFebruary 18, 2017 at 7:07 PM<br />\nEVERY WRITER ON THIS PLANET MADE MONEY<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WILL SAY ( LIKE RAJIV MALHOTRA ) THAT HE IS SAVING INDIA ( IT IS APPRECIATED TOO ) -- BUT HE SELLS HIS BOOKS TO MAKE MONEY<br />\n<br />\nYOU HAVE NO IDEA HOW MUCH MONEY I CAN MAKE BY JUST THROWING MY BLOGSITE OPEN JUST TO COMMERCIAL ADS<br />\n<br />\nTHE MISSION OF THIS BLOGSITE IS TO SAVE MY MOTHER ( WATAN ).<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS TOO MUCH OF PERSONAL SACRIFICE INVOLVED, I WILL BE HONEST .. WITHOUT THE SUPPORT OF MY WIFE THIS SACRIFICE IS IMPOSSIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nTRY TYPING WITH TWO FINGERS THE BILLIONS OF WORDS IN THE POSTS ( 1120 LONG POSTS ) AND THE COMMENTS ( 1.2 LAKH COMMENTS ) .<br />\n<br />\nI WONDER HOW MANY BASTARD INDIANS WILL CHARGE MONEY TO SAVE THEIR OWN MOTHERS<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WAS A YOUNG MAN , WE HAD A SEVERELY INJURED SAILOR -- IN USA THE HELICOPTER CAME TO MID SEA TO AIRLIFT HIM<br />\n<br />\nIN BETWEEN THE INDIAN CAPTAIN ASKED THE PILOT--WHAT WILL BE THE CHARGE<br />\n<br />\nTHE US PILOT ( A WHITE MAN ) REPLIED ANGRILY \" TO SAVE LIFE--WE DONT CHARGE \"-- WE WERE IN MID CRISIS WITH BAD SEAS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS CONVERSATION HAS BEEN ETCHED ON MY SPLEEN<br />\n<br />\nMY CHARACTER WAS MOLDED BY A SINGLE SENTENCE<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE VALUE OF A LIFE?<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/unquantified-holocaust-and-genocide.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">if anybody sneaked ( snitched about ragging/ hazing ) --they were given \"blanket party - </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE RED</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> \" &nbsp;by their own batchmates . &nbsp; when he sleeps at night he would be covered by a blanket in pitch darkness --and beaten up badly. &nbsp;he wont be able to eat for the next 2 days -his face will be swollen</span></span><br />\n<br />\nhave you seen the movie A FEW GOOD MEN ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p>\n\n</o:p>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 355 of the\nConstitution enjoins upon the Central Govy&nbsp;\nto protect every state against external aggression and internal\ndisturbance. It also imposes the duty upon the Union Government to ensure that\nthat government of every state is carried on in accordance with the\nConstitutional provisions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Besides the Indian Penal Code, 1862, the\nIndian Evidence Act, 1872 and the Criminal Procedure Code of 1973 also govern\nthe functioning of the police. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Code of Criminal\nProcedure (CrPC ) is the main legislation on procedure for administration of\nsubstantive criminal law in India. It was enacted in 1973 and came into force\non 1 April 1974.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It provides the machinery for the investigation of crime,\napprehension of suspected criminals, collection of evidence, determination of\nguilt or innocence of the accused person and the determination of punishment of\nthe guilty. Additionally, it also deals with public nuisance, prevention of\noffences and maintenance of wife, child and parents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Rebellion of\n1857, the British&nbsp; crown took over the\nadministration in India\u2014 just a front for German Jew Rothschild<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Criminal Procedure\nCode, 1861 was passed by the British parliament. The 1861 code continued after\nindependence and was amended in 1969. It was finally replaced in 1972.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Criminal Procedure\nCode is applicable in the whole of India except in the State of Jammu and\nKashmir. The Parliament's power to legislate in respect of Jammu &amp; Kashmir\nis curtailed by Article 370 of the Constitution of India.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY AFSPA MUST\nREMAIN IN PLACE IN KASHMIR AS LONG AS PAKISTAN SENDS TERRORISTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<o:p><br /></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; line-height: 150%;\">Functionaries under the\nCode:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magistrates and judges\nof the Supreme Court and High Court<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public prosecutors<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Defence Counsels<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Correctional services\npersonnel<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sentences which\nMagistrates may pass:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court of a Chief\nJudicial Magistrate may pass any sentence authorised by law except a sentence\nof death or of imprisonment for life or of imprisonment for a term exceeding\nseven years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Courts of Judicial\nMagistrate of First Class may pass a sentence of imprisonment for a term not\nexceeding three years, or of fine not exceeding ten thousand rupees (sub by act\n25 of 2005 for rupees five thousand), or of both.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Courts of Judicial\nMagistrate of Second Class may pass a sentence of imprisonment for a term not\nexceeding one year, or of fine not exceeding five thousand rupees(sub by act 25\nof 2005 for rupees one thousand), or of both.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court of a Chief\nMetropolitan Magistrate shall have the powers of the Court of a Chief Judicial\nMagistrate and that of a Metropolitan Magistrate, the powers of the Courts of\nJudicial Magistrate of First Class<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court of\nIndia can and has from time to time made certain bailable offences,\nnon-bailable or vice-a-versa by special directions, to curb increasing menace\nof certain crimes in the society. The State Government has the power to make\ncertain offences bailable or non-bailable in their respective States<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS RIDICULOUS TO\nSEE THE WAY MCOCA WAS APPLIED ON SREESHANT AND BLACK BAGGED . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO THAT BIG IPL FISH (\nRUNNING HUNDREDS OF SHELL COMPANIES ) &nbsp;WHO\nBRIBED ALL AND SUNDRY CAN REMAIN OFF THE RADAR. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS WILL REMAIN A BLOT\nFOR EVER-&nbsp; A DEEP ROOTED STIGMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">PEOPLE LIKE MOHAMMAD\nSHAHABUDDIN WHO HAVE KILLED SEVERAL POLICEMEN , DON\u2019T GET BLACKBAGGED LIKE\nSREESHANT. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE POLICE DON\u2019T HAVE\nTHE BALLS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohammad_Shahabuddin\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohammad_Shahabuddin</a><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharashtra Control of\nOrganised Crime Act, 1999 (MCOCA) is a law enacted by Maharashtra state in\nIndia in 1999 to combat organised crime and terrorism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The preamble to MCOCA\nsays that \"the existing legal framework, i.e. the penal and procedural\nlaws and the adjudicatory system, are found to be rather inadequate to curb or\ncontrol the menace of organised crime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government has,\ntherefore, decided to enact a special law with stringent and deterrent\nprovisions including in certain circumstances power to intercept wire,\nelectronic or oral communication to control the menace of organised\ncrime.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike normal law the\nconfessions before senior police officers are admissible, not only against the\naccused giving the confession but also against the other accused in the same\ncase. There is no provision for granting anticipatory bail for 6 months to the\naccused<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Why have people taken\nlaw into their&nbsp; own hands?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>There is NO Melord\nJudge in India intelligent enough to answer this question.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">It is because justice\nis always delayed --with only </span><span style=\"color: red;\">20%</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> chance of getting a fair decision.&nbsp; </span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today India is facing a\ngrave crisis of governance . One pillar ( Judiciary ) of our democracy is\nrotten and hollow. Another pillar the main stream media is benami and desh\ndrohi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manifestation of\nthis crisis is \u2014the all pervasive, inefficient state, increasing lawlessness,\ncompetitive populism, criminalization of polity, ever-growing nexus between\nmoney power, crime, and political power, excessive centralization, serious\nerosion of legitimacy of authority and extremely tardy and inefficient justice\nsystem\u2014all these are only too evident to all of us. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">JUST A FEW DAYS AGO WE\nHAD THE CEC ALLOWING RABID ANTI-HINDU , THE POODLE OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS ,\nAHMED PATEL TO WIN HIS RAJYA SABHA SEAT BY NOT ALLOWING TWO MLAs TO EXERCISE\nTHEIR FREE WILL AND FREE CHOICE GUARANTEED BY THE CONSTITUTION.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: large;\"><b>\" YOU KNOW WHAT I WANT--UNSCREW IT AND THROW IT DOWN\"</b></span><br />\n<br />\nLAST WE HEARD WAS THAT NCW HAD \"SUMMONED\" PICKLE JOHN AND DEMANDED AN \"APOLOGY\" FOR OGLING AT A BRAVEHEART<br />\n<br />\nSO WHAT ELSE IS NEW ?<br />\n###############<br />\n<br />\nJOKE:<br />\n<br />\nPICKLE JOHN NOTICED THAT GIRLS WEAR PADDED BRA AND PLASTIC CAMEL TOE AT THE CROTCH OF TIGHT JEANS TO ATTRACT MEN<br />\n<br />\nSO HE GOT A BRILLIANT IDEA<br />\n<br />\nHE BOUGHT A HUGE KERALA NENDRA BANANA AND SHOVED IT INTO THE CROTCH OF HIS JEANS<br />\n<br />\nHE THEN STOOD AT THE GATES OF THE WOMENs COLLEGE -- PRETENDING TO TALK ON HIS MOBILE<br />\n<br />\nWHEN CLASSES STARTED ,THE TEACHER SOON NOTICED THAT THE GIRLS IN THE CLASSROOM WERE NOT PAYING ATTENTION<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ALL HAD FLUSHED FACES AND BED ROOM EYES --WITH DILATED PUPILS-- ALL CHEWING THEIR LIPS TO PULP . THIS IS LIKE THE MONKEYs ASS GETTING RED .<br />\n<br />\nTHE TEACHER CALLED THE \"OFFICIAL SNITCH\" GIRL AND DEMANDED WHAT IS HAPPENING<br />\n<br />\nTHE TEACHER CAME TO KNOW OF THE PICKLE JOHN WITH A HUGE PRICK AT THE GATES<br />\n<br />\nSHE WENT TO THE PRINCIPALs ROOM AND THEY CALLED THE POLICE,<br />\n<br />\nTHE POLICE NABBED PICKLE JOHN AND TOOK HIM TO THE POLICE STATION<br />\n<br />\nTHEY TOO WERE IMPRESSED BY THE SHEER GARGANTUAN SIZE OF HIS PRICK<br />\n<br />\nSO THEY MADE HIM REMOVE HIS JEANS--TO HAVE A BETTER DEKHO<br />\n<br />\nTHE POLICE DEMANDED POINTING AT THE HUGE BANANA \"WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS?\"<br />\n<br />\nPICKLE JOHN SAYS -- <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>\"THAT IS Me DECOY \"</b></span><br />\nLAST WE HEARD WAS NCW HAS \"SUMMONED\" PICKLE JOHN AND DEMANDED AN \"APOLOGY\" FOR GIVING REVERSE KLPD ( KHADE LUND PEH DHOKA ) TO BRAVEHEART GIRLS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; CANT THEY SEE THE PROTESTS OF WOMEN WHO SAY WE DONT WANT TO GO TO SARARIMALA TILL WE REACH MENOPAUSE?..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">COMPARING WEE SHANI SHIGNAPUR TEMPLE WITH THIS PLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE SABARIMALA IS LIKE COMPARING AN ANT WITH AN ELEPHANT..</span></div>\n<br />\nIS DEMOCRACY ALL ABOUT CRUSHING DHARMA ,PRICELESS CULTURE AND THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE? ..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN-- WHY HAVE YOU SQUANDERED THE GOOD WILL OF THE PEOPLE YOU SECURED AFTER THE EXCELLENT EFFORTS OF THE GOVT DURING THE KERALA FLOODS?..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN --WHAT IS ALL THIS GHADI GHADI THREATENING THE PEOPLE WITH \"<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KARSHANAMAYA NADAPADI</span></b>&nbsp;\" ( STRICT ACTION WITH DIRE CONSEQUENCES ) .. I HAVE BEEN A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS , NEVER DID THIS...<br />\n<br />\nIS THIS DEMOCRACY ?<br />\n<br />\nDEMOCRACY IS DEFINED AS RULE OF THE PEOPLE BY THE PEOPLE AND FOR THE PEOPLE..<br />\n<br />\nRIGHT NOW WE HAVE A STALIN TYPE OF SITUATION -- NEXUS BETWEEN JUDICIARY/ ELECTED EXECUTIVE AND BENAMI DEEP STATE OWNED MEDIA...WITH DEEP STATE CONTROLLED UN DOING WAH WAH..<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THE ONLY NATION ON THIS PLANET WITH A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM , WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES .. THIS SYSTEM IS ILLEGAL AS PER THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026 NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c OF COURTS WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DECISIONS WHICH AFFECT THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE NATION IS THE SOLE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS..WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE AND THE WATAN\u2026. THIS IS THE MEANING OF DEMOCRACY..<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT IMMEDIATE POLICE REFORMS ..<br />\n<br />\nWE DONT WANT TO SEE DGP OF POLICE DANCING TO THE TUNE OF THE STATE CM..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DGP HAS A RESPONSIBILITY TO ENSURE NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) WHEN THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE / JUDICIARY GOES ROGUE .. DGP OF STATE MUST KNOW THAT WE THE PEOPLE ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION...<br />\n<br />\nDGP OF STATE IS NOT A PUPPET OF SOME ROGUES IN THE PAYROLL OF THE DEEP STATE .. class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need a working Police\nComplaints Authority ( PCA ) to looks into complaints against police officials\nbelow the rank of DGP &nbsp;/ IG ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, police officers\ncan make complaints to the PCA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PCA must investigate\ncriminal offences involving police officers, police corruption and serious\npolice misconduct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Police Complaints\nAuthority (PCA) were to be established at the state and district levels\nfollowing the judgement by the Supreme Court of India, in the Prakash Singh and\nOrs. v. Union of India and Ors. AIR 2006 SCC 1 Case, in response to the huge\nvolume of complaints against the police and the endemic lack of accountability<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians have kept\nthis in abeyance for selfish reasons . Even if a PCA exists , nobody knows.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Police Complaints\nAuthority (PCA), must be an independent body with the power to investigate\npublic complaints against the Police- as well as related matters of public\nconcern.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PCA must have no\npower to fine or suspend guilty police personnel.&nbsp;&nbsp; . The PCA must present the report to the\ngovernment and recommend the action to be taken based on NATURAL JUSTICE .&nbsp; The orders are to be issued by the government\n. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A respected member from\ncivil society must be appointed to the PCA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A woman IPS officer not\nbelow the rank of Deputy Inspector General of Police as member<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Additional Director\nGeneral of Police (grievance) nominated by the state government as ex-officio\nmember and member secretary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Retired civil service\nofficer not below the rank of Joint Secretary to Government<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don\u2019t want any\nSoli\u2019s and Fali\u2019s or any Collegium judge or lawyer</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u2013 unless the Judges and\nlawyers learn the meaning of DHARMA ( Natural Justice ) and PERIMETER OF\nCONTEXT , we don\u2019t want them in PCA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Police Complaints\nAuthority will submit its findings in a case within a period of 60 days from\nthe date of receipt of the complaint and in case of inability to meet the\ndeadline, the Authority must submit a report showing reasons therefor to the\nadministrator<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSerious\nmisconduct\" shall mean any act or omission of a police officer that leads\nto or amounts to:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">death in police\ncustody;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">grievous hurt, as\ndefined in Section 320 of the Indian Penal Code, 1860;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">rape or attempt to\ncommit rape;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">arrest or detention\nwithout due process of law;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">extortion;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">land/house grabbing; or</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">any incident involving\nserious abuse of authority<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">being an attack dog of a corrupt politician&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no time limit\nfor making a complaint, although you should try to do it as quickly as\npossible.&nbsp;&nbsp; The police force or relevant\norganisation can decide not to deal with a complaint if it is received more\nthan 12 months after the incident.&nbsp; If you\nare complaining more than 12 months after an incident you should explain why\nyour complaint has been delayed. The police force will need to consider your\nexplanation when they decide whether to deal with the complaint.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These duties of PCA are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To investigate criminal\noffences involving police officers, police corruption and serious police misconduct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To undertake inquiries\ninto or audits of police activities to ascertain whether there is police\ncorruption or serious police misconduct or circumstances that may apply to\nboth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To monitor an\ninvestigation being conducted, in relation to criminal offences involving\npolice officers, police corruption and/or serious police misconduct and to\nundertake audits of these investigations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To advise and make\nrecommendations to the Police Service and other authorities, for e.g., the\nPolice Service Commission, on ways in which police corruption and serious\npolice misconduct may be eliminated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To gather evidence\nwhich may be admissible in the prosecution of a person, who is NOT a police\nofficer ( many police officers use agents and shell companies ) , for a\ncriminal offence in relation to the Police Service and to furnish that <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To gather evidence that\nmay be used in investigating serious police misconduct and furnish such\nevidence for appropriate action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To gather evidence that\ncan be used in the prosecution of a police officer involved in a criminal\noffence and furnish such evidence.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To perform any other\nfunctions that may be conferred on the Authority by any other written law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objective of the\nPCA is to ensure that complaints received, which fall within its remit, are\ndealt with fairly and thoroughly and to increase public confidence in the\nPolice Service.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF THERE IS ANY\nCOMPLAINT AGAINST THE DGP OR IG THEY SHALL RECUSE THEMSELVES FROM THE\nINVESTIGATIONS ( PRIME EXAMPLE:&nbsp; &nbsp;DIG D ROOPA CASE OF VVIP PRISONER VK SASIKALA\nIN BANGALORE JAIL )</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PCA must be accountable\nand transparent. At the&nbsp; end of every\nfinancial year PCA must submit reports about the activities for that year and\nalso audited financial statements<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A check list must be\nmade for PCA. Nothing can be done on whims and personal fancies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Excessive transfer of a police officer shall be\ninvestigated by PCA without complaint. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Records must be maintained .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>DIG D Roopa was transferred 27 times in 16\nyears by corrupt politicians , superior police officers &nbsp;. &nbsp;She\nis unwilling even to talk about it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALONG WITH PRESIDENT XI THE EDITOR OF GLOBAL TIMES HU XIJIN AND HIS COMMIE JOURNALIST STOOGES WILL ALSO BE HUNG FOR MISLEADING THE PEOPLE .</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u201cSuccess breeds a disregard of the possibility of failure.\u201d--\u2013 Hyman Minsky</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Minsky baby wasn\u2019t around to see the 2008 crisis that fit right into his theory.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">According to economist Hyman Minsky, the financial cycle typically follows three stages of financing; these are:--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hedge financing</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Speculative financing</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ponzi financing</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hedge financing is the most stable of the three.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It's when the economic actor relies on its own stable cash flows to repay any borrowings. It's when the actor's earnings far outweigh its limited borrowings.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Speculative financing is when the actor uses its own cash flow to pay the interest on its debt, but must assume more debt to repay the principal, thus rolling its debt over. This stage of financing is less stable than hedge financing.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And lastly, there's Ponzi financing, which is the most unstable of the three stages of financing. Ponzi financing is where the actor's cash flows do not cover either the principal or interest payments on its debts. The actor is completely reliant on the appreciation of the underlying asset in the hopes that it'll be enough to cover its liabilities.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Minsky argued that financial cycles naturally progress from each stage of financing to the latter, driven by human greed and carelessness. When economies enter the Ponzi stage, they become increasingly unstable and eventually experience a \"Minsky Moment\" which is a sudden collapse in asset values, leaving both lenders and borrowers exposed.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Minsky moment is a sudden major collapse of asset values which is part of the credit cycle or business cycle. Such moments occur because long periods of prosperity and increasing value of investments lead to increasing speculation using borrowed money.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The spiraling debt incurred in financing speculative investments leads to cash flow problems for investors. The cash generated by their assets is no longer sufficient to pay off the debt they took on to acquire them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Losses on such speculative assets prompt lenders to call in their loans. This is likely to lead to a collapse of asset values. Meanwhile, the over-indebted investors are forced to sell even their less-speculative positions to make good on their loans.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">However, at this point no counterparty can be found to bid at the high asking prices previously quoted. This starts a major sell-off, leading to a sudden and precipitous collapse in market-clearing asset prices, a sharp drop in market liquidity, and a severe demand for cash</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ZgQ-7uNmSU</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">History has proven that credit bubbles always burst. China by far is the biggest credit bubble in the world today-- unsustainable credit growth relative to gross domestic product (GDP) in the household and (non-financial) corporate sector.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Once-prudent practices give way to Ponzi schemes. At some point, asset values stop going up. They don\u2019t have to fall, mind you, just stop rising. That\u2019s when the shit hits the fan.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The continuation of the Ponzi stage relies on the appreciation of underlying assets. For the Chinese MAD MEN , this is primarily the housing sector where much of their worth is stored</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The China growth story is not likely a miracle of MAD communist government central planning; it\u2019s a massive credit bubble, the largest ever.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_177BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_175T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_175TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_175TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_175TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_175TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_175TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_175TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_175TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_175TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_175B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1438014535078819640\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with.html?showComment=1502277550553#c1438014535078819640\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 9, 2017 at 4:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s impressive growth has come overwhelmingly and almost exclusively from unsustainable credit expansion combined with extensive, largely unprofitable domestic infrastructure expansion\u2014building of GHOST CITIES.<br />\n<br />\nKUMAARI MAYAWATIs WHITE ELEPHANT STATUES ARE BETTER.<br />\n<br />\nThis has been a centrally planned misallocation of capital into white elephant, unproductive fixed-asset infrastructure projects that on balance will likely not ever generate sufficient return on investment to justify their cost. The penalty will come from China\u2019s future economic growth.<br />\n<br />\nIn more than 65% of the infrastructure investments in China made in the last three decades, the costs were larger than the benefits they generated, which means the projects destroyed economic value.<br />\n<br />\nIT ALL STARTED WITH CHINA BUYING UP LARGE SHIPS DURING THE GLOBAL RECESSION IN 1985 AND MOTHBALLING THEM .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE RECESSION LIFTED IN 1987 END , IT WORKED FOR CHINA.<br />\n<br />\nBUT THIS IS A DIFFERENT KETTLE OF FISH ALTOGETHER AND THE CHINESE DONT HAVE THE FUCKIN' BRAINS TO SAVVY THIS.<br />\n<br />\nInvesting in unproductive projects results in a boom only while construction is ongoing. The boom turns to bust when forecasted benefits fail to materialize and the projects become a DRAG on the economy. Because of the large build-up of debt associated with past projects,is is cock sure that China is headed for an infrastructure-led national financial and economic crisis.<br />\n<br />\nOBOR WONT SAVE CHINA<br />\n<br />\nIn a market economy, investment must create enough additional productive capacity to justify the expenditure. If it doesn't, it must be written down to its true economic value. This is why GDP is a reasonable proxy in a market economy for the value of goods and services produced.<br />\n<br />\nLoss-making investments can be carried for decades before they're amortized, and insolvency can be ignored. This means that GDP growth can overstate value creation for decades<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCUNTS LIKE AMARTYA SEN HAVE NEVER UNDERSTOOD ECONOMICS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html</span><br />\nThe insolvency problem has been building up for decades in China. It can\u2019t go on forever, because it has led to a massive credit bubble that is doomed to burst. When a country piles more and more credit onto a faulty underlying economic model, it becomes a Ponzi finance scheme that has no other possible outcome but to implode on itself.<br />\n<br />\nIn a MAD Chinese Ponzi-financed economy, lenders lend more and borrowers borrow more based on the greater CHINK theory, the idea that asset prices will keep rising.<br />\n<br />\nPonzi financing works in upward spiraling, self-reinforcing fashion until it simply cannot go on any longer and then asset prices suddenly drop, to the surprise of the vast majority, and then there is a self-reinforcing unwinding of the bubble, a financial crisis. The onset of the crisis is marked by a grab for liquidity, freezing credit markets, and a MAD collective rush for the exits.<br />\n<br />\nThis is what has come to be known as the \u201cMinsky moment\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe initial asset-price downturn is usually sharp, but it can also be protracted. The downward impact to future GDP growth can be especially prolonged after a credit bust as the experience of Japan\u2019s lost two decades shows.<br />\n<br />\nCHINESE ECONOMY IS A BUBBLE WITHIN A BUBBLE. &nbsp; &nbsp;THE COMMIE RULERS ARE NOT SO BRIGHT AND THEY WONT UNDERSTAND IT. &nbsp; FAYE SORPOTEL DSOUZA MIGHT BE BETTER .<br />\n<br />\nAt the center of China\u2019s credit bubble is its massive and opaque financial sector. The China Banking Regulatory Commission reports that the Chinese banking system had USD 35 trillion in on-balance-sheet banking assets through the first quarter of 2017.<br />\n<br />\nThis is an incredible more-than-fourfold bank-credit expansion since 2008 As a result, based on the ratio of on-balance-sheet banking assets to GDP, China\u2019s banking bubble today is more than 3.3 times larger than the US banking bubble prior to the global financial crisis!<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_175MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_175B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_176B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1663974094657878062\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_176M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with.html?showComment=1502277613142#c1663974094657878062\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 9, 2017 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_176MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nJust as alarming as China\u2019s on-Chinese banks have built up exposure to assets equal to 650 % of GDP. balance-sheet banking assets are China\u2019s shadow banking assets.<br />\n<br />\nThe reason that China\u2019s shadow bank asset growth is a concern is that these assets have long been regarded by credible analysts, bankers, and regulators as China\u2019s least liquid and poorest quality loans.<br />\n<br />\nIn many cases, these are non-performing loans once held on bank balance sheets that have been rolled over, taken off balance sheet, and newly funded through wealth management products (WMPs) and other shadow banking vehicles for the banks\u2019 off-balance-sheet activities.<br />\n<br />\nThere are platforms for Chinese depositors to easily buy WMPs on their smart phones and indeed Chinese depositors are doing just that. It makes sense that shadow credit is exploding. The problem is that the idea of funding China\u2019s rapidly growing long-term, illiquid, and heavily non-performing assets with rapidly growing short-term, liquid liabilities, all facilitated by the banks and tech companies, and all kept off balance sheet, is a formula for a systemic banking crisis.<br />\n<br />\nMinsky spAke - an extraordinary acceleration in credit would be needed just to maintain a constant growth rate during the late stages of a credit bubble, just before the bust.<br />\n<br />\nCredit growth naturally accelerates as the \u201cMinsky moment\u201d is arriving in a Ponzi finance-style banking system.<br />\n<br />\nIn a Ponzi finance-styled economy, the scheme goes on until it goes bust because that is the model they have committed to. &nbsp; Only the bust can force a CHINKY change.<br />\n<br />\nAND WHEN THIS COMES THERE WILL BE A REVOLUTION IN CHINA. THERE IS NO NEED TO GO TO WAR WITH INDIA<br />\n<br />\nChinese leaders have likely been implicitly sanctioning the acceleration of credit growth this year in their shadow banking markets to keep growth going at all costs even while publicly admonishing-- and this is their UNDOING !<br />\n<br />\nBank earnings are vastly overstated the Chinese commies. By rolling over non-performing loans facilitated by new short-term credit, such as WMPs, banks have continued to report strong earnings and appear cheap. &nbsp; This is SAME SAME as how US banks looked in 2007 before shit hit the fuckin\u2019 fan<br />\n<br />\nThe difference is that Chinese banks are much bigger and likely much more insolvent.<br />\n<br />\nThe Chinese currency is also highly overvalued and headed for a crisis-- Chinese yuan is currently the most expensive currency<br />\n<br />\nPOOR CHINKS .. THROW SOME BREAD CRUMBS IN THEIR GENERAL DIRECTION<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>LODA ZAROOR LAGNE WAALAH HAI !</b></span><br />\n<br />\nINTEZAAR KARNA !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_177b+seedzQsD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2024071331844222182\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>IT IS NOT APPRECIATED.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nSeptember 13, 2015 at 3:46 PM<br />\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nAmartya Sen, SA Aiyar and Mani Shangaran Aiyaran went for dinner at a posh restaurant .<br />\n<br />\nThe soup arrived .<br />\n<br />\nSlimy Mani took the pepper shaker ( which said pepper on its cap ) and shook \u2013and what came out was salt\u2014making his soup too salty..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Slimy Mani put all the blame on Narendra Modi and his ACHECHE DIN..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nSo the SA Aiyar and Amartya Sen, the world famous Rothschild stooge economists took it upon themselves to correct the situation.<br />\n<br />\nThey debated for half an hour\u2014with Mani Shangaran Aiyaran offering this two paise worth every few seconds..<br />\n<br />\nEvery sentence would start with I BELIEVE \u2013we must do this I BELIEVE we must do that.<br />\n<br />\nAlmost like OM at the beginning of a mantra.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPretty soon they came up with a brilliant solution involving a napkin, 2 spoons, a straw, and an empty saucer. They called the waitress over to dazzle her with their brilliance.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u201cMa'am,\" Amartya Sen cried , frothing from the corner of his moth ( as usual )- \" WE BELIEVE that the pepper shaker contains salt . WE BELIEVE that the salt shaker contains pepper.\"<br />\n<br />\nBut before his could finish his stammering , the waitress leant over and in a smart movement interchanged the caps of the shakers. She just walked away.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_153M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
