font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5001973479494635782\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_38M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529836889823#c5001973479494635782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1---</span></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">The&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><b>constitution</b></span><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;of JOHN DEWEY</b></span><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;( with BR Ambedkar as a front ) was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950..</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Judiciary interprets the Constitution as its final arbiter.. judiciary cant create laws.. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD AUR USKA DEEP STATE AGENTS KEE JAI !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NOHIN POTHA !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Election Commission\nof India has declared that a huge number of MPs and MLAs have criminal records .The\n16th Lok Sabha has the highest number of MPs with criminal cases against them.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nAssociation for Democratic Reforms (ADR), which analysed the election\naffidavits filed before the Election Commission,&nbsp; of the total number of MPs and MLAs, 33 per\ncent members have declared criminal cases against themselves in a self-sworn\naffidavit filed with the ECI before their most recent elections.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">34% of Lok Sabha MPs,&nbsp; 19% of Rajya Sabha MPs and 33% of MLAs (all\nstate assemblies/ UTs) analysed have declared criminal cases against\nthemselves.&nbsp;&nbsp; The analysis further states\nthat 20 per cent members have serious criminal cases against themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">As the nexus between\nthe criminals and politicians becomes stronger, it is able to subvert the\nloyalty of the functionaries at different levels in the government, including\nthe police.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is not incentive of\nmoney any more\u2014it is fear of instant death <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminalisation of\npolitics has gradually led to undermining the authority of the police\nleadership and consequently the discipline of the force.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police are a\nhierarchical organisation. If the effectiveness of the leadership is\nundermined, the entire force becomes vulnerable to wrong influences, with the\nfunctionaries at different levels looking elsewhere for protection and rewards.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Besides breeding\nindiscipline in the force, it promotes a climate in which impunity flourishes.\nIt ultimately shakes the confidence of the public in the police..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WHEN I WROTE THAT THE ENTIRE WORLD MAIN STREAM MEDIA IS OWNED AND MONOPOLIZED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD AND HIS COMMIE AGENTS, &nbsp;SEVEN YEARS AGO , NOBODY BELIEVED IT&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRIMINAL POLITICIANS\nLIKE MOHAMMAD SHAHABUDDIN HAVE BEEN ABLE TO SUBVERT THE SYSTEM ONLY WITH MEDIA\nHELP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 2001 the\npolice were executing a warrant on Mr. Manoj Kumar \"Pappu\", the\npresident of the local RJD unit, when Shahabuddin objected and slapped the\narresting officer Sanjiv Kumar,[7] while his men beat up the police. The police\nthen re-grouped in strength and a pitched battle was launched on Shahabuddin's\nhouse, with help being sought from other police units in the vicinity,\nincluding one from Uttar Pradesh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the extensive fire\nexchange that followed, two policemen and eight others were killed,[7] with\nthree AK-47s and other weapons being found near several of the deceased.\nShahabuddin and his men escaped, setting fire to three police jeeps, and firing\ncontinuously to cover their movements. Neither Shahabuddin nor Manoj Kumar\ncould be arrested. After this episode, several more cases were filed against\nShahabuddin; however he could not be arrested.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the early 2000s,\nShahabuddin was running a parallel administration in Siwan, holding\n\"kangaroo courts\" to settle family and land disputes, fixing doctors\u2019\nconsultancy fees, and arbitrating on marital problems.[8]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2005, a police\nraid led by then Siwan S.P. Ratna Sanjay with the support of D.M.Siwan C. K.\nAnil on Shahabuddin's house in Pratappur helped recover illegal arms such as\nAK-47s, and other military weaponry authorized for possession only by the army,\nincluding night-vision goggles, Laser-guided guns, etc.[12] <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the arms had\nthe markings of Pakistan ordnance factories, and the then Chief of Police\n(DGP), Bihar, D.P. These include a\nlarge number of \"disappearances\" from Siwan; reports in the media\nallege that as many as a hundred bodies may be buried on the grounds of\nShahabuddin's well-fortified Pratappur palace,[19]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CHECK LIST CAN SERVE\nAS A MEMORY JOGGER\u2014&nbsp; BUT ALSO IS A SYSTEM\nWHERE SOME MINIMUM QUESTIONS MUST BE ASKED TO THE HIGH AND MIGHTY POLITICIANS \u2013AND\nRECORDED <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Checklists I created at\nsea are now being used all over this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/chemical-tanker-loading-operations-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/chemical-tanker-loading-operations-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE WILL NO LONGER HAVE\nA POLICE SYSTEM WHERE THEY SERVE AS ATTACKS DOGS FOR THE CRIMINAL POLITICIANS WHO\nHAVE NO SCRUPLES\u2014 &nbsp;SOME OF WHOM ARE IN FOREIGN PAYROLL.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">POLITICIANS MUST BE\nAFRAID OF POLICE AND NOT VICE VERSA</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT IS ALL THIS\nBULLSHIT SYSTEM OF AN IPS &nbsp;POLICE OFFICER NEEDING TO TAKE PERMISSION FROM A MAGISTRATE\nEVEN BEFORE HE CAN </span><span style=\"color: red;\">FART</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ?</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALMOST ALL THE &nbsp;MAGISTRATES AND JUDGES DURING BRITISH RULE WAS\nIN THE PAYROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN 1857 JEW ROTHSCHILD\nSTOPPED ALL PRETENSES OF BEING A SPICE TRADER AND TOOK OVER INDIA.&nbsp; THIS GERMAN JEW RULED INDIA\u2014NOT THE QUEEN OR\nTHE BRITISH PARLIAMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild realized\nthat to rule India easily he must have a police force that was totally subservient\nto the executive.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He also had his agent\nGandhi sing the praises of AHIMSA ( non-violence ).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi was giving\naway&nbsp; AHIMSA with his left hand and with\nhis right hand he wielded a Rothschild German steel sword to kill Indians.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>Bhagawad Gita taught us to give MOONH TODH JAWAAB !</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6LpNEZQ3vvw/WYgZLzI3GmI/AAAAAAABVW0/smgx4rSYh6gYNTzzlgRUP4BAXpxxsGLmwCLcBGAs/s1600/xi-charkhw2a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"376\" data-original-width=\"620\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6LpNEZQ3vvw/WYgZLzI3GmI/AAAAAAABVW0/smgx4rSYh6gYNTzzlgRUP4BAXpxxsGLmwCLcBGAs/s640/xi-charkhw2a.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 1857 First war of\nIndependence , Jew Rothschild created his POLICE ACT of 1861&nbsp; ( a Hegleian Dialectic again ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 3 of the 1861\nPolice Act vested the superintendence of the state police forces in the state\ngovernments.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same Act introduced a\nsystem of dual control at the district level.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It put the police forces under the command of the District\nSuperintendents of Police, but <span style=\"background-color: white;\">subject to the \u201cgeneral control and direction\u201d\nof the District Magistrates.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This was\ndone deliberately because the functioning of the WHITE SKINNED stooge&nbsp; District Magistrate as the chief officer of\nthe district was considered essential for the maintenance of British rule in\nIndia.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the system of police\ngovernance established by the 1861 Act, the police forces in India were\nunaccountable to anyone except their own hierarchy and the colonial political\nand administrative executive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Making the police accountable to the community or\nother democratic or local indigenous institutions did not fit into the British\ncolonial ( Rothschild\u2019s ) model of control.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British structured\nthe organisation in a way so that the senior positions in the police force\nwould be occupied by white skinned men them and the junior slots would be kept\nfor brown skinned&nbsp; \u201cnatives.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 7 of the Police Act of 1861 uses the\nwords \u201cinferior officers\u201d for those occupying the lower ranks in the police.\nEven when the senior posts were Indianised in due course, the elitist bias was\nnot forsaken.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Family background always\nweighed heavy in picking candidates for senior vacancies and most were mere\nstooges .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They realised that a system\nbased on feudal values prevalent in the Indian society would work effectively\nin ensuring that the rank and file, which constituted the bulk of the force,\nremained loyal, subservient and accountable to their seniors within the\norganisation and government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, under\nSection 162 of the Criminal Procedure Code, the statement of a witness recorded\nby the police during investigation is not to be signed by the person making the\nstatement and it can not be used during trial for any purpose other than that\nof contradicting the witness if he differs from it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly, Section 25\nof the Indian Evidence Act, 1872 says that confessions recorded by a police\nofficer shall not be admissible in evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police was raised\non a militaristic and authoritarian pattern. There was tremendous emphasis on\nmaintenance of a type of discipline, which bordered on regimentation, requiring\nthe lower ranks to obey orders blindly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The system did not require the\nconstabulary to put on their thinking caps while performing their duties. They\nin fact were not required to have any-- they were mere monkeys .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE NEW SMART POLICE\nMUST NOT BE BASED ON <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT&nbsp;</span></b>\nMARCHES ( NEEDED THOSE DAYS WHEN THERE WERE NO CARS AND TRAINS ) BUT ON\nCEREBRAL CAPABILITIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is why recruitment\nto constabulary stressed on the requirements of brawn and not brain.&nbsp; The taller and heftier the recruit, the\nbetter. During training, his physical fitness and endurance must improve.&nbsp; It was for this reason that the training\nprogrammes in the police were biased heavily in favour of outdoor activities,\nlike drill.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He need not be educated, but\nhe must have an intimidating presence, that should deter not only the criminals\nbut also ordinary citizens. In his presence, nobody should raise questions or\ndemand answers. And he could be manipulated like a monkey by his bosses who\nwere attack dogs for politicians.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From hence forth SMART POLICE must be\nsubjected to an exam. &nbsp;If he fails just\nretire this stupid <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">RADAKE KHAINI MOONH MEIN DHAAL </span></b>policeman with benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don\u2019t want monkeys who cant think or even\nlearn the code of police&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/a8xbtrLvFHc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/a8xbtrLvFHc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 1861 Act\nDELLIBERATELY failed to produce an efficient, professional and an accountable\npolice force in the country. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The advent of\nIndependence changed the political system, but the police system remained more\nor less unaltered.&nbsp; The Police Act of\n1861 continued to govern it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its managerial\nphilosophy, value system and ethos remained what they were. The powers granted\nto politicians and bureaucrats to exercise control and superintendence over the\npolice remained the same. They were a ruler or establishment supportive police\nforce, considerably distant from the community and they continued to remain so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DON\u2019T WANT\nPOLITICIANS OR MAGISTRATES / JUDGES TO CONTROL THE POLICE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ONLY CONTROL MUST REMAIN WITH THE\nNATIONAL CENTRAL POLICE COMMISSION ( WHICH MUST NOT HAVE A SINGLE <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>SOLI LAWYER\nOR&nbsp; FALI &nbsp;JUDGE</b></span> )&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PM AND CENTRAL\nHOME MINISTER MUST HAVE CONTROL OVER THE POLICE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is an\nupsurge in criminal activities or a particularly heinous crime is committed,\nthe public tend to blame the police. The general tendency is to hold the police\nsolely responsible for any increase in crime. This attitude is reinforced by\nthe manner in which the police react to public criticism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crime statistics in any\ncase are not very reliable and controlled by Benami media. Most media barons\nrun their own NGOs who CREATE&nbsp; news for\nthem for leverage ..&nbsp; A common complaint\nagainst the police is that they do not register crime fully.&nbsp; Concealment of crime is quite common. One\nmajor reason for this is that police performance is evaluated on the basis of\ncrime statistics. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BY THE WAY\u2014SINGAPORE IS\nSUPPOSED TO BE A CRIME FREE COUNTRY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS !&nbsp; THEY KICK CRIMES UNDER THE CARPET!!</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SINGAPORE BUNKER MAFIA\n( FUEL FOR SHIPS ) IS THE WORST ON THIS PLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">ON SHIP THE BLOOD ALCOHOL CONTENT LIMIT IS 0.04% BAC&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tuPSNCM1ki8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/tuPSNCM1ki8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; &nbsp;WELL THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS TO SHIP CAPTAINS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">On chemical\ntankers we measure every type of gas <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/toxic-gas-detector-tubes-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/toxic-gas-detector-tubes-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/draeger-tube-list-on-chemical-tankers.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/draeger-tube-list-on-chemical-tankers.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN I JOINED A CHEMICAL TANKER--I GOT A CALL FROM MY SHORE BOSS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SACK THE INDIAN SECOND ENGINEER WHOSE ALCOMETER READING WHICH WAS TAKEN BY THE RUSSIAN CAPTAIN ( EXCEEDED COMPANY LIMIT AFTER HE CAME BACK FROM ASHORE AT AMSTERDAM &nbsp;)</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN I SAW THE READING , &nbsp;I FOUND THAT WITH THAT TYPE OF FIGURE THE SECOND ENGINEER WOULD BE IN COMA .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SO-- INSTEAD I RECOMMENDED THE RUSSIAN CAPTAIN BE SACKED&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BEFORE THE RUSSIAN CAPTAIN GOT OFF THE SHIP AFTER HANDING OVER COMMAND TO ME , &nbsp;I TOLD HIM &nbsp; &nbsp; \"DONT WASTE YOU VACATION HOLIDAYING -- &nbsp;LOOK FOR ANOTHER JOB, YOU WILL NOT BE RE-EMPLOYED BY THE COMPANY \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.lionlaboratories.com/testing-for-alcohol/alcohol-measurement-units/\">http://www.lionlaboratories.com/testing-for-alcohol/alcohol-measurement-units/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.lionlaboratories.com/testing-for-alcohol/the-lion-units-converter/\">http://www.lionlaboratories.com/testing-for-alcohol/the-lion-units-converter/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, the Indian\nPolice Act (IPA) of 1861 is the current basic governing instrument of the\nIndian police force. It lays down the structure and functions of the police\ndepartments in the country. The IPA was drafted by the British colonisers as a\ndirect consequence of the first war of independence to ensure the police\nsystem\u2019s subservience to the executive and to remain authoritarian in its contact\nwith the public. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MUST BE STOPPED ..\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE POLICE CANNOT BE\nTHE ATTACK DOG OF A CORRUPT POLITICIAN -- WHO WILL GIVE HIM PLUM PROMOTIONS AND\nTRANSFERS AS A REWARD</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">According to section 4 of the IPA the police\nfalls under the control of not only their superior&nbsp; but also of the executive. This was created\nwith the intent to maintain the British rule in India.&nbsp; Needless to say, the police was not accountable\nto the people . <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW THIS AGAIN \u2013 WE\nPUT A DEADLINE OF AUG 15th 2018 . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">DO\nBRAINSTORMING \u2013 CREATE REFORMS . MAKE CHECKLISTS .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AND\nPLEASE , WE DON\u2019T NEED BENAMI MEDIA DARLINGS , </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">FALI BABY AND SOLI BABY </span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">( LAWYERS / JUDGES ) IN THIS EFFORT. &nbsp;
