, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police reforms cannot\nstand on their own; there has to be a reform of the whole criminal justice\nsystem.&nbsp;&nbsp; Police certainly have to\nreform, but the laws and courts also have to reform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A statement made by a\npolice officer is not admissible in the court of law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The statement\nconsidered valid is that of the \u201cpanch\u201d present at the crime scene through whom\nthe panchanama is made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">If you go to police\ngive your FIR they record it and it is acceptable as a legal document. The\nmoment&nbsp; the police completes writing the\nFIR, whatever he does after that, for example, recording statements - is not\nadmissible. The roles change immediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">When the case comes up\nafter eight years, the court will accept a tutored statement of the FAKE\nwitness produced out of thin air&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How\ncan someone possibly recollect what exactly happened eight years ago.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">This is a DELIBERATE game .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Basically, you are okay\nwith accepting tutored FAKE statements but not fresh statements of the officer\nimmediately after the crime.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once FIR is lodged by\ncomplainant or any information&nbsp; is\nreceived&nbsp; by the Station House officer by\nan anonymous caller or friend of police, criminal law sets into motion with\nlodging of FIR ,the work of police officer begins.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First and foremost duty\nof Investigating officer is preceding to the scene of offence or crime&nbsp; with his team consists of Photographer,\nForensic team ( clues team)&nbsp; or Dog Squad&nbsp; (if necessary ) and keenly survey the scene\nof offence to draft the mediators report mentioning all details without missing\nvital clues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The good and\nintelligent&nbsp; I.O diligently observes the\nscene of offence and meticulously prepare the Panchanama with a drawing sketch,\nspeaking to all people present at the scene of the offence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very important to\nknow to whom I.O is interacting, more often than not suspects or supporters of\naccused, themselves may mislead the police to divert the attention of the\nPolice team and dilute the case.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The possibility of&nbsp; wining the prosecution case depends upon the\ndrafting of good panchanama with all minute details without missing vital clues,\nwhich can decide the outcome of the prosecution case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If loose ends or\ndiscrepancies or inaccuracy exists in panchanama, it will invariably helps the\naccused to escape the law and prosecution case ends in acquittal and hard work\nof I.O goes waste.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Panchanama is also prepared during search\nand search operations for various crimes or investigations after obtaining\nsearch warrant from trial courts under Sections 94, 97 and 100 of Criminal\nProcedure code ,search can be conducted with out search warrant from the courts\nunder Section 165.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is duty of I.O pick\nup all vital clues/documents ,which will only helps the case,&nbsp; It is prudent for I.O&nbsp; to avoid scrap material (insignificant\ndocuments/material ), which won't help the prosecution case.&nbsp;&nbsp; Panchanama is also called Mediators report. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">'Panch' means in\nSanskrit respectable persons.&nbsp; This is\nNOT panch or number FIVE in Hindi\u2014as almost all police officers and judges/\nlawyers&nbsp; think .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panchanama is statement of persons\npresent at the time of arrest, search and seizure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panchanama\nstatement will be recorded&nbsp; at the scene\nof crime /offence with presence of Investigating officers , prosecuting\nwitnesses, accused and two mediators, who should be unbiased, independent and\nhonest persons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panchanama is very\nimportant document in criminal cases because it will be send to trial court\nlong with FIR and CD/ CR&nbsp; and\ncontraband materials/weapons or Exhibits recovered recovered from scene of\noffence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchanama is a\nstatement of a person who is present at the time of investigation of the crime\nby the police officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchanama is\nessentially a document recording certain things which occur in the presence of\nthe Panchas and which are seen and heard by them.&nbsp; Panchas are taken to the scene of an offence\nto see and hear certain things.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchas are taken to\nthe scene of an offence to see and hear certain things. Therefore, panchas are\nliable to be examined at the trial to depose to those things and their evidence\nis relied upon in support of the testimony of an investigating officer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A panchanama of this\nkind recorded and relied upon in support of evidence from the panchas is akin\nto a statement previously made by him under Section 157 of the Indian Evidence\nAct<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A panchanama is an\nessential document not only influencing the course of proper investigation but\na record of memory and refresher of memory so that important details are not\nforgotten. Section 159 of the Evidence Act,&nbsp;\nsays a witness may refresh his memory by referring to any writing made\nby himself and even written by anyone else. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accordingly the\npanchanama must be factual incorporating what was actually seen and heard by\nthe witnesses, written in their hand or written out or certified by him as\nfound to be true and correct and as seen, witnessed, and heard by them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During investigation,\nit plays very important role in establishing guilt of accused.&nbsp; Moreover, sometimes&nbsp; PANCHANAMA&nbsp;\nbecomes key document in the appreciation of evidence by the court.&nbsp;&nbsp; The reality of the situation has to be\nproperly and correctly grasped in the panchanama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panch (witness) may\nhave to render accurately the facts of the scene where the goods were\nfound.&nbsp;&nbsp; The panch witnesses must be\navailable at the spot.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They must know and see\nfor themselves as to how the facts and circumstances came out, that existed at\nthe time of search and seizure, as to how the offender was discovered or the\nsuspect was located as to the evidence collected relating to the goods that\nhave offended the provisions of the act and as to how the suspect has come into\npossession and became owner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A panchanama seen and\nheard by the panchas and recorded by a scribe or an officer is only a modus as\ndictated by an officer and will not render the panchanama invalid and\npanchanama would be admissible in evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This panchanama\ncontains the details and boundaries of the spot of the offence/accident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Essentials of\nPanchanama :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Description of the\nscene of offence with sketch&amp;drawing and photographs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Persons found at scene\nof offence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Records found at scene\nof offence or weapons or exhibits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The contraband material\nfound during search and seizure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking photo's<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It should be signed by\nthe prosecution Witness[PW], Prosecuting officer / I.O and mediators.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief Ingredients of\nthe Panchanama :&nbsp; --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Names of officers\nconducting Panchanama<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Place ,Date and Time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Description of Panchas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Description of Scene of\noffence with Sketch describing the scene neatly , with direction of body placed &nbsp;( North , South, East , West ), houses ,boundaries of the house.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mentioning\nexhibits/weapons recovered at the scene of offence &nbsp;(like clothes, documents\n,personal belonging&nbsp; or other human\nparticles &nbsp;) &nbsp;prepare list of articles recovered at the scene of offence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Explaining the panchas\n,purpose of search &amp;seizure with or without order of the court. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Describing persons\nfound working at the time of Search and Seizure mentioning their age and nature\nof duty undertaken at that place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">List of legal documents\nfound during&nbsp; Search and Seizure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Description of\ncontraband &amp;particular place where they have been found ,during Search and\nSeizure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panchanama should\nbe drawn as follows:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(a) Heading, time,\ndate.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(b) Details such as\nNames, addresses, S/o, W/o etc. of the panchas for closer identification.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(c) Occupation of\nPanchas</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(d) Age of Panchas</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(e) Residential address\nof Panchas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THESE THINGS MUST BE REFORMED TO BE IN CONSONANCE WITH THE DIGITAL AGE--LIKE VIDEOS&nbsp;, AADHAR NUMBER etc. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE NEED TO COME OUT OF THE GREASE AND TACKLE AGE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where female members\nare there in the place of search, try to include female panch witness also.\nPanchas should be either two or more, not less than two.&nbsp;&nbsp; Explain to the panchas the purpose of the\nsearch.&nbsp;&nbsp; Introduce the owners to the\npanchas.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Identify the suspect in\nthe panchanama by taking his full name, his father\u2019s / husband\u2019s name etc.,\noccupation, residential address, identification marks, if any.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take the signatures of\nthe panchas, the owner/suspect on the warrant or the authorization for search\nand specify the details of the said documents in the panchanama and state that\nthe same has been dated and signed by the panchas and suspects. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No pancha must be able\nto claim later that his signature is forged or his statement was subverted . So\nhave electronic proof\u2014 we need reforms &nbsp;.\nGive a brief and accurate description of the search carried out.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brief statement of\npersons found at scene of offence or place where contraband material found.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Drawing of samples and its procedure.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The records searched\nand verified relevant to the case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">List of articles seized\nduring search and seizure should be given to accused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very important\nfor police department to train the young policemen in the art of&nbsp; drafting good panchanama and senior police\nofficers should take initiative to train and help junior colleagues while\ndrafting panchanama ,especially complicated cases .</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is advised and it is\nbetter to draft panchanama in regional language ,if I.O is not well conversant\nwith English.&nbsp; The court will find bad\ndocument,hard to understand or comprehend&nbsp;\n, when it is poorly drafted with grammatical errors and inadequate or\ninaccurate&nbsp; description,in order to avoid\nsuch problems ,it is better to draft the panchanama in local language.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchas\u2019 should be\nindependent and respectable people. They should normally belong to the locality\nand/or neighborhood of the place where the panchanama is drawn. There is\nhowever no bar in getting panchas from distant places also if need be or to\novercome the non-availability of local panch witnesses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The panchas should be :---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(a) Intelligent</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(b) Literate as far as\npossible</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(c) Respectable\ncitizens</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(d) Should possess an\nunderstanding and of impartial nature</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(e) Must be with good\nantecedents. No convictions earlier.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(f) Should not be\ninterested /prejudiced in the matter they are attending to.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(g) Should not be\neasily influenced by pecuniary / other considerations.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(h) Should not be a\nminor.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(i) Acceptable to the\nreligious sentiments of the owner of the house.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(j) Free from\ncontagious diseases and infirmities as to effect their being proper panchas\n(for instance deaf, mute, blind etc.)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(k) Should have no\nrelationship either with the place or persons searched.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(l) Complainant or\nowner of the house should not be made a pancha.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(m) Well-to-do or\naffluent persons may not necessarily be respectable persons,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(n) No objection if\npanchas are Government servants,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(o) Other Important\nthings regarding Panchas:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(i) Panchas should be\npresent from the time of entry into the premises.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(ii) They should have\nknowledge of the purpose of the search.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(iii) Should be present\nfrom the beginning to the end of the search.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(iv) Should initial the\ndocuments/records for identification of having seen it at the time of search\nfor use at a later date.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(v) They may be\nexplained that they should carefully watch the proceedings in the search.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchanama should be\ndrawn on the spot. Where it is not possible to do so, for reasons of security,\npeace and tranquility, the panchanama may be drawn at the safe and convenient\nplace but the panch should be present at the spot and continue throughout the\nentire process and the panchanama should incorporate details/reasons why the\npanchanama was being drawn elsewhere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Panchanama may be drawn during the day as far\nas possible but it can be drawn at night if circumstances so necessitate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panchanama should be\nwritten only once. There is nothing like a rough and fair copy. Do not destroy\na panchanama drawn. If any differences arise state reasons in the same\npanchanama and continue. Write them neatly and legibly and corrections must be\nattested by the panchas. Avoid erasures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only problem\nconfronting prosecution is witness turning hostile,&nbsp; which is the main reason for acquittal of\ncases, all hard work of police goes waste, conviction rate increases , if they\nensure that witness don't turn hostile, but it never happens in reality.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don't have witness protection mechanism.\nThis must be a reform . The trend of witness turning hostile should be curbed,\nwhich is not an easy task.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The defence counsel\n,however smart ,&nbsp; intelligent or famous ,\nhe may be ,&nbsp; can't win his client case\n,if case is excellently, meticulously and smartly investigated by an intelligent\n,duty minded and honest police officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, if I have a\nvideo of what transpired and produce it, the first allegation of the defence\nlawyer will be that it is doctored.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThen I will have to approach a forensic lab and I cannot rely on the\ntime-frame of its return.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A truth serum cannot be\nadministered till I get permission from the court . A brain mapping will again\nhave the defence lawyer say you had made leading questions . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, scientific evidence\ndoesn\u2019t stand a scrutiny of law . This is because we ( collegium judiciary and Noam Chomsky ) are overly zealous in guarding\nthe rights of an accused \u2014especially when it comes to separatists, naxals and\nterrorists .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 7, 2017 at 11:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.xossip.com/showthread.php?t=1497568<br />\n<br />\nWoman faces action for framing two Delhi doctors in False gang rape case<br />\n<br />\nThe woman had alleged that the two doctors gang-raped her at Lajpat Nagar in January 2014. She used to work in their clinic as administrative assistant (field) but her service was terminated in 2013. She alleged that both the doctors called her on the pretext of giving her job back and raped her.<br />\nIn an unprecedented verdict, the Delhi High Court has initiated criminal proceedings against a woman for making false allegations of gang rape against two Delhi-based doctors.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cA false accusation of rape may be as damning to an accused as to a victim of rape,\u201d a bench of Justice GS Sistani and Justice AK Chawla said, noting that such cases cannot be \u201ctaken lightly\u201d.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; M. S. Namboodiripad.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;It was the first time a Communist\ngovernment was democratically elected to power in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nehru government dismissed\nthe commie govt of EMS Namboodiripad on July 31, 1959 and imposed President's\nrule in the state, under Article 356 of the constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; TODAY COMMIE CADRE KNOW WHO IS MAO/ LENIN/ MARX ARE THEY ARE DISILLUSIONED</b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE PEOPLE INVOLVED IN THE KILLINGS AND WHO GOT KILLED AMONG THIYYAS ARE NO CRIMINALS-- THEY ARE ORDINARY PEOPLE</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I BLAME IT ON ARRACK SHOPS WHERE THEY USE CHEMICALS FOR FAST FERMENTING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On the night of September 23, 1972 Azhikodan Raghavan was assassinated--he poor family was given a house and small pirce of land by the Commie party-- this land was bought from our family in Kannur</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parapram in Kannur\u2019s Pinarayi village, where the Kerala unit of the Communist movement was born in 1939, is just a stone\u2019s throw away from the home of Pinarayi Vijayan</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://www.thenewsminute.com/article/murder-beloved-comrade-and-revenge-killing-turbulent-village-pinarayi-51443</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MIMICRY ARTISTS COULD LAMPOON VS ACUTANANDAN IF YOU TRY THE SAME THING WITH PINARAYI VIJAYAN , POLICE IN PLAIN CLOTHES WHO DONT KnOW ENGLISH WILL VISIT YOU AT NIGHT AND UTTER WORDS LIKE \"MALICIOUS \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN 1962 VS ACHUTANANDAN WAS THROWN INTO JAIL BY NEHRU. HE WANTED TO SHOW THAT HE IS NOT A TRAITOR AND WANTED TO DONATE HIS BLOOD TO JAWANS .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; IF HE LOOKS AT YOU YOU FEEL FEAR.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALL LIKE TO WATCH MIMICRY PROGRAMMES WHERE THEY LAMPOON VS ACHUTANANDAN , LOVED BY THE MASSES -- &nbsp;YOU WILL GET ACHE ON YOUR SIDES DUE TO ENDLESS BELLY LAUGHING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I GET JUICY STORIES FROM THE COMMIE WHO GIVES ME A BODY MASSAGE -- DURING THE 90 MINUTES SESSION WE TALK .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN MUTHAPPAN TEMPLES MORE COMMIES GO THAN RSS HINDUS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; All know how! Pinarayi Vijayan was the youngest of 14 siblings of his very poor father.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">All know what business ( and whose ) Kerala commie leader Kodiyeri Balakrishnan's son Bineesh does.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kodiyeri Balakrishnan is from Kannur . He is the Secretary of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) Kerala --after the chair was vacated by Pinari Vijayan</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Bineesh Kodiyeri is the vice president of Ravi Pillai Group of Companies in Dubai. One, Two ,\nThree , Four\u2026 First three people were killed. The first person was shot to\ndeath. The next one was stabbed to death. One was beaten to death. Do you\nunderstand ? The first one was shot down . The second person was beaten to\ndeath. The third person was stabbed to death. After this, the congressmen\nstripped off their Khader dress and ran away. After this for some time the\ncongressmen used to ask us whether they would be allowed to wear their Khader\ndress. Do you know why ? Because they were afraid to be beaten. \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mani\u2019s confession came\nat a meeting held to explain the situation which had arisen in Kerala after the\nmurder of Marxist dissident T P Chandrashekharan by CPM men on the fourth of may\n2012 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three murders Mani\nwas referring to are :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Murder of &nbsp;Anjeri Baby on\nNovermber 13, 1982 . Baby was shot dead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Murder of Mullanchira Mathayi on January\n16, 1983 . Mathayi was beaten to death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Murder of Muttukadu Nanappan on June 6,\n1983. Nanappan was stabbed to death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">The accused in all\nthree murders were CPM men. All three murders occurred in MM Mani\u2019s area of\noperation as CPM leader. All the accused in all the three murders were acquitted\nbecause the witness turned hostile.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/uVZ0-29sfgk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/uVZ0-29sfgk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with.html?showComment=1502200142999#c7896305035326579470\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2017 at 7:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_123MC\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSENIORITY SHOULD NOT MATTER<br />\n<br />\nWHAT MATTERS IS --DOES HE LOVE HIS WATAN<br />\n<br />\nThe CJI is a constitutional authority and presides over the country\u2019s judiciary, comprising 31 Supreme Court justices, over 1000 high court judges and over 16,000 subordinate judges.<br />\n<br />\nThe Supreme Court, through a bench led by J. Dipak Misra, mandated the playing of the national anthem before movies in cinema halls. THE DESH DROHIS DO NOT LIKE THIS</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>The Indian Constitution does not recognise any personality whether historically or otherwise</b></span>-- read this a trillion times..</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Yet, Dipak Misra gave Gandhi a pedestal by applying a partial ROTH TEST which cannot be applied in India .</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nMarathi poem called \u201cGandhi Mala Bhetala\u201d (\u2018I Met Gandhi\u2019) was published in a private magazine. On reading the poem, one V.V. Anaskar, a member of the \u2018Patit Pawan Sangathan\u2019, took offence, and filed a complaint with the local police.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nIn an odd sleight of hand, in its May 14, 2015 decision, the Supreme Court got around Roth, and held that a distinct standard of obscenity would apply to \u201chistorically respectable personalities.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nWHO DECIDES THAT GANDHI IS HISTORICALLY RESPECTABLE ?-- ROTHSCHILD?</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.firstpost.com/india/no-dirty-poems-mahatma-sc-obscenity-ruling-big-blow-free-speech-2245416.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IF GANDHI WAS ALIVE TODAY HE WOULD HAVE BEEN HUNG FOR INCEST AND HAVING SEX WITH MINORS-- NAY-- HIS BIZARRE EXPERIMENTS WITH TRUTH !!!!!</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nSO SOME LAWYER TURNED JUDGE WILL<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> KICK THE CONSTITUTION </span></b>AND DECLARE THAT HIS \"PERSONAL WHIM \" ABOUT SOME ROTHSCHILD CREATED PENGUIN MUST HOLD WATER?</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nEVR PERIYAR MAY BE GOD FOR KAMALAHAASAN OR SOME SUPREME COURT JUDGE -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DOES NOT CARE FOR ROTHSCHILDs AGENT ATHEIST EVR PERIYAR</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/hinduism-in-bali-turn-of-tide-and-hindu.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nEVEN COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">OUR ELECTED EXECUTIVE ARE NAPUNSAKS -- IF THEY DO THEIR JOB ( </b><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">as per their swearing in OATHS</span></b><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"> ) MELORDS WHO GO AGAINST THE CONSTITUTION WILL BE IN JAIL</b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTH TEST OF USA CANNOT BE APPLIED IN INDIA</span></b>- &nbsp;IN INDIA THE JUDGE WHO SWORE AN OATH TO UPHOLD THE CONSTIUTION , MUST FOLLOW THE CONSTITUTION \u2013 OR BE SACKED IN DISGRACE</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roth_v._United_States</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nPUT THIS IN PM MODIs, PMO, LAW MINISTERs, ATTORNEY GENERALs, CJI, HOME MINISTERs , EDUCATION MINISTERs WEBSITES</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nASK FOR AN ACK.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_124b+seedDQYfD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_124b+seedDQYfD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; ( MOST WERE FAKE CLAIMS BY JEWS )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe compensation fund for Nazi-era forced labor set up by Germany\u2019s government and corporations finished paying out some $6 billion to 1.7 million people living in 100 countries. Many of these recipients received wages during the war; some even lived in their own homes.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/doctor-death-shiro-ishii-emperor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTaro Aso WANNABE PM OF JAPAN oversaw publication of the 1,500-page company history as president and CEO of Aso Cement Co.<br />\n<br />\nMarking the centennial of the family firm, the book suggests the United States tricked Japan into attacking Pearl Harbor.<br />\n<br />\nINDEED !</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: xx-large;\">PEARL HARBOUR WAS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC</b></div>\n<br />\nTop U.S. leaders had detailed knowledge of Japanese military plans before the attack on Pearl Harbor, according to Aso historians. Japan was purposely allowed to strike the first blow, so that \u201cRemember Pearl Harbor\u201d could become a rallying cry for Americans.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/the-lie-of-pearl-harbour-revealed-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAso Takakichi, Aso Taro\u2019s father, became the second president of Aso Mining Co. in 1934 at age 24.<br />\n<br />\nAso reveals that more than 700,000 Korean labor conscripts were brought to Japan using varying degrees of coercion beginning in 1939.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -BALLS TO YOU ASO !<br />\n<br />\nMore than 2.3 million Koreans -- REPEAT -- 2.3 million OR 23 lakhs Koreans worked as slave labour in Japan in the years 1939 to 1945 .. These were from all over Korea.<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN SOLDIERS ABANDONED BY BRITISH AT DUNKIRK WORKED AS SLAVES IN ROTHSCHILDs TUNGSTEN MINES IN PORTUGAL, SPAIN AND GERMANY<br />\n<br />\n14500 Indian soldiers were killed by Germans --while securing the perimeter of Dunkirk along with the French.<br />\n<br />\nSurviving 25300 Indian soldiers were captured as slaves , and transported to Rothschild\u2019s tungsten mines..Not a single Indian survived enervating work in the mines..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Though no investigation has taken place in that matter, the inquest report found the suicide note to be genuine. Under Section 32 of The Evidence Act, a suicide note has evidentiary value and must be followed up with a detailed enquiry after lodging an FIR, if need be.<br />\n<br />\nRecently, newspaper reports have also appeared about Justice Misra\u2019s name cropping up in the course of an enquiry by three judges of high courts into allegations against two sitting judges of the Odisha high court.'<br />\nFurther quoted<br />\n\"The recommendation by the present CJI for Justice Misra to succeed him is unfortunate in light of his own observations in the NJAC case.\"<br />\n<br />\nAll water under the bridge now?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_148BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When it began operating, it had just the three most senior judges of the Supreme Court, including the CJI<br />\n<br />\nIn the third Judges case in 1998, the SC expanded it a bit, by nominating the five senior-most judges to it.<br />\n<br />\nA COLLEGIUM meeting was attended by CJI Khehar, Justice Dipak Misra, Justice Ranjan Gogoi and Justice Madan B. Lokur. &nbsp; &nbsp;The third senior-most Judge, Justice J. Chelameswar, however, did not attend the meeting, in keeping with his decision to boycott...<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">Only Justice </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Chelameswar</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> dissented from the majority, and upheld the NJAC Act, and the accompanying Constitution Amendment-- the rest judges against NJAC were CJI Khehar, Justice Dipak Misra, Justice Ranjan Gogoi and Justice Madan B. Lokur. ...</span></span><br />\nWE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA DO NOT WANT COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT WANT JUDGES TO ELECT JUDGES<br />\n<br />\nCOLLEGIUM SYSTEM IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION&nbsp;. &nbsp; &nbsp;</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_147B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_147MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PM MODI, LAW MINISTER, ATTORNEY GENERAL, HOME MINISTER<br />\n<br />\n##############</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedSqND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedSqND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4528898496457485101\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_160M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with.html?showComment=1502262802313#c6788192172600570133\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 9, 2017 at 12:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.huffingtonpost.in/2017/08/07/why-its-dangerous-for-the-centre-to-tamper-with-article-35a-in_a_23068270/</span><br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was added to the Constitution by the executive head without any discussion in the Parliament<br />\n<br />\nCHOLBE NAAH !!!!!<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS STOPPED LISTENING TO THE WHITE MANs VIEWS AND COMMENDATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nRATHER IT IS NOW THE REVERSE-- INDIA SHALL CALL THE SHOTS<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A of the Indian Constitution is an article that empowers the Jammu and Kashmir state's legislature to define \u201cpermanent residents\u201d of the state and provide special rights and privileges to those permanent residents.<br />\n<br />\nIt is added to the Constitution through a Presidential Order, i.e., The Constitution (Application to Jammu and Kashmir) Order, 1954 - issued by the President of India, \"in exercise of the powers conferred by\" clause (1) of Article 370 of the Constitution, with the concurrence of the Government of the State of Jammu and Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution (Application to Jammu and Kashmir) Order, 1954 was issued by President Rajendra Prasad under Article 370, with the advice of the Union Government headed by Jawaharlal Nehru<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIt was a subsequent to the '1952 Delhi agreement', reached between Jawaharlal Nehru and the then Prime Minister of Jammu and Kashmir Sheikh Abdullah ( NEHRUs HALF BROTHER ) , which dealt with the extension of Indian citizenship to the Jammu and Kashmir \"state subjects\".<br />\n<br />\nThe Jammu and Kashmir Constitution, which was adopted on November 17, 1956, defined a Permanent Resident (PR) of the state as a person who was a state subject on May 14, 1954, or who has been a resident of the state for 10 years, and has \u201clawfully acquired immovable property in the state!\u201d<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/remove-word-secular-from-indian.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKASHMIR IS A PART OF INDIA --IT SHALL REMAIN SO TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was not added to the Constitution by following the procedure prescribed for amendment of the Constitution of India under Article 368. Article 370 does not anywhere confer on the President legislative or executive powers so vast that he can amend the Constitution or perform the function of Parliament. It has been brought about by the executive organ when actually the right of amendment of the Constitution lies with the legislative organ. Therefore, it is, allegedly, ultra vires the basic structure of the Constitution since it violates the Constitutional procedures established by law<br />\n<br />\nBesides carrying out many modifications and changes, this order 'added' a new \"Article 35A\" to the Constitution of India. Addition or deletion of an Article amounted to an amendment to the Constitution which could be done only by Parliament as per procedure laid down in Article 368. But, Article 35A was never presented before Parliament. This meant the President had bypassed Parliament in this order to add Article 35A<br />\n<br />\nThe PRC classification created by Article 35A suffers from the violation of Article 14, Equality before the Law. The non-resident Indian citizens cannot have the rights and privileges, same as permanent residents of Jammu and Kashmir<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_162BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When the President of India does not have legislative powers, he performed the function of Parliament<br />\n<br />\nIt gives a free hand to the state government and politicians to discriminate between citizens of India, on an unfair basis and give preferential treatment to some by trampling over others, since the non-residents of the state are debarred from buying properties, getting a government job or voting in the local elections<br />\n<br />\nChildren of non-state subjects do not get admission to state colleges.<br />\n<br />\nIt facilitates the violation of the right of women to \u2018marry a man of their choice\u2019 by not giving the heirs any right to property, if the woman marries a man not holding PRC. Therefore, her children are not given Permanent Resident Certificate and thereby considering them unfit for inheritance \u2013 not given any right to such a woman\u2019s property even if she is a permanent resident.<br />\n<br />\nAG NOORANI WHO CALLED THE SHOTS ON 35A WAS A STOOGE OF ROTHSCHILD AND SHEIKH ABDULLAH.. max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c537405768249066097\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_119M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502263035090#c537405768249066097\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 9, 2017 at 12:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_119MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.huffingtonpost.in/2017/08/07/why-its-dangerous-for-the-centre-to-tamper-with-article-35a-in_a_23068270/<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was added to the Constitution by the executive head without any discussion in the Parliament<br />\n<br />\nCHOLBE NAAH !!!!!<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS STOPPED LISTENING TO THE WHITE MANs VIEWS AND COMMENDATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nRATHER IT IS NOW THE REVERSE-- INDIA SHALL CALL THE SHOTS<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A of the Indian Constitution is an article that empowers the Jammu and Kashmir state's legislature to define \u201cpermanent residents\u201d of the state and provide special rights and privileges to those permanent residents.<br />\n<br />\nIt is added to the Constitution through a Presidential Order, i.e., The Constitution (Application to Jammu and Kashmir) Order, 1954 - issued by the President of India, \"in exercise of the powers conferred by\" clause (1) of Article 370 of the Constitution, with the concurrence of the Government of the State of Jammu and Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nThe Constitution (Application to Jammu and Kashmir) Order, 1954 was issued by President Rajendra Prasad under Article 370, with the advice of the Union Government headed by Jawaharlal Nehru<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIt was a subsequent to the '1952 Delhi agreement', reached between Jawaharlal Nehru and the then Prime Minister of Jammu and Kashmir Sheikh Abdullah ( NEHRUs HALF BROTHER ) , which dealt with the extension of Indian citizenship to the Jammu and Kashmir \"state subjects\".<br />\n<br />\nThe Jammu and Kashmir Constitution, which was adopted on November 17, 1956, defined a Permanent Resident (PR) of the state as a person who was a state subject on May 14, 1954, or who has been a resident of the state for 10 years, and has \u201clawfully acquired immovable property in the state!\u201d<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/remove-word-secular-from-indian.html<br />\n<br />\nKASHMIR IS A PART OF INDIA --IT SHALL REMAIN SO TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/the-kashmir-conflict-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A was not added to the Constitution by following the procedure prescribed for amendment of the Constitution of India under Article 368. Article 370 does not anywhere confer on the President legislative or executive powers so vast that he can amend the Constitution or perform the function of Parliament. It has been brought about by the executive organ when actually the right of amendment of the Constitution lies with the legislative organ. Therefore, it is, allegedly, ultra vires the basic structure of the Constitution since it violates the Constitutional procedures established by law<br />\n<br />\nBesides carrying out many modifications and changes, this order 'added' a new \"Article 35A\" to the Constitution of India. Addition or deletion of an Article amounted to an amendment to the Constitution which could be done only by Parliament as per procedure laid down in Article 368. But, Article 35A was never presented before Parliament. This meant the President had bypassed Parliament in this order to add Article 35A<br />\n<br />\nThe PRC classification created by Article 35A suffers from the violation of Article 14, Equality before the Law. The non-resident Indian citizens cannot have the rights and privileges, same as permanent residents of Jammu and Kashmir<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_119BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_118T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_118TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_118TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_118TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_118TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_118TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_118TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_118TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_118TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_118B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left;
