max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4786178772433174617\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_118M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502263082329#c4786178772433174617\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 9, 2017 at 12:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_118MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThis also meant that the amending power of Parliament under Article 368 of the Constitution itself was abridged in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, another amendment, without any reference to Parliament. When the President of India does not have legislative powers, he performed the function of Parliament<br />\n<br />\nIt gives a free hand to the state government and politicians to discriminate between citizens of India, on an unfair basis and give preferential treatment to some by trampling over others, since the non-residents of the state are debarred from buying properties, getting a government job or voting in the local elections<br />\n<br />\nChildren of non-state subjects do not get admission to state colleges.<br />\n<br />\nIt facilitates the violation of the right of women to \u2018marry a man of their choice\u2019 by not giving the heirs any right to property, if the woman marries a man not holding PRC. Therefore, her children are not given Permanent Resident Certificate and thereby considering them unfit for inheritance \u2013 not given any right to such a woman\u2019s property even if she is a permanent resident.<br />\n<br />\nAG NOORANI WHO CALLED THE SHOTS ON 35A WAS A STOOGE OF ROTHSCHILD AND SHEIKH ABDULLAH.. I HAVE READ HIS BOOKS--ALL BULLSHIT.<br />\n<br />\nNoorani baby had defended Sheikh Abdullah of Kashmir during his long period of detention.<br />\n<br />\nIn January 2017, the Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir, NOT SO GRAND Mehbooba Mufti of PDP has commented that anybody raking up Article 370 &amp; Section 35 A -- is hurting the soul of Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_119b+seedBGhPD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8356699397707404032\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_123M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502455282060#c8356699397707404032\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2017 at 6:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_123MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRn MurthyAugust 11, 2017 at 4:32 PM<br />\nDear Capt Ajit sir,<br />\nWhat do you think that this Art 35A should be scrapped ??<br />\n<br />\nIf you ask an ordinary man on the street, specific details about our constitution, he may not be aware of the specific aspects. But it will be a bigger surprise to know that a person who was the Solicitor General of India fumbled when she was asked a simple question by a law student.<br />\n<br />\n\u201cDoes the President of India have the power to amend or insert any article into the constitution without taking the Parliament into confidence\u201d?<br />\n<br />\nThe Ex Solicitor General replied candidly, yes, the President has the power to amend the constitution \u2018but not without the Parliament\u2019s consent.\u2019 The law student continued: Mam, but an article 35A has been inserted in Indian constitution without the consent of Parliament. Much to his surprise, Ex Solicitor General said, I am not aware about this but if it has happened, we will look into it.<br />\n<br />\nIf this is the case with Constitutional experts in our legal fraternity, nothing more can be expected from the students of law who are studying law to socially engineer the society with their legal proficiency on matters concerning statutory rights of citizen.<br />\n<br />\nBut all that is set to change as the Jammu Kashmir Study Centre, a think tank close to RSS is set to challenge what is considered one of the most brazen violations of Indian Constitution by the then Congress government which was headed by Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru. Article 35A was incorporated in Constitution of India through a Presidential Order, on May 14, 1954. Termed as Constitution (Application to Jammu and Kashmir) Order, 1954, it is this article not article 370 which legitimizes any preferential treatment given to residents of Jammu and Kashmir over other citizens by J&amp;K state assembly.<br />\nhttps://www.myind.net/Home/viewArticle/article-35a-biggest-constitutional-fraud-history-india/</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_123BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_123b+seedBGhRD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_120T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_123b+seedBGhRD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_120TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_120TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_120TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_123b+seedBGhRD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_120TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_120TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_123b+seedBGhRD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_120TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_120TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_120TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_123b+seedBGhRD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_120B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3953912502349058313\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_120M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502455299930#c3953912502349058313\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2017 at 6:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_120MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi rm,<br />\n<br />\nTHE ELECTIONS TO JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY 1951 WAS RIGGED.<br />\n<br />\nThey exploited Article 370 and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 gave the solitary State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir the right to have a separate Constitution and separate flag, but nowhere does it say which category of Indians will enjoy all citizenship rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir and which sections will not.<br />\n<br />\nSection 6 as adopted and strictly enforced by the State Government reads: (I) \u201cEvery person who is, or is deemed to be, a citizen of India under the provisions of the Constitution of India shall be a permanent resident of the State, if on the fourteenth day of May, 1954, (a) he was a state subject of class I or of class II, or (b) having lawfully acquired immovable property in the State, he has been ordinarily resident in the State for not less than ten years prior to this date\u201d and (II) \u201cany person who, before the fourteenth day of May, 1954 was a State Subject of class I or of class II and who, having migrated after the first day of March, 1947, to the territory \u2013 now included in Pakistan, returns to state under a permit for resettlement in the State or for permanent return issued by or under the authority of any law made by the State Legislature shall on such return be a permanent resident of the State\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nSections 8 and 9, the former gives the State Legislature the right to define Permanent Residents and the latter empowers the State Legislature to alter the definition of Permanent Residents.<br />\n<br />\nThese provisions in the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constitution have been working to the detriment of Hindu refugees from West Pakistan, who number about 1.5 lakh<br />\n<br />\nJawaharlal Nehru the HALF BROTHER of Shiekh Abdulaah subverted the basic structure of the Indian Constitution in May 1954 to deprive all Indian citizens, including refugees from West Pakistan settled in Jammu province, of their fundamental right to exercise all rights in Jammu &amp; Kashmir.<br />\n<br />\nNehru and Shiek Abdullah made sure that the Permanent Residents of Jammu &amp; Kashmir shall exercise all rights all over India.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD SPLIT INDIA BETWEEN THREE KOSHER FAMILIES --AND HOPED THE KOSHER RULE WOULD CONTINUE FOREVER.<br />\n<br />\nSHIEF ABDULLAHs WIFE BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN WAS A CRYPTO JEWESS WHOSE FIRST HUSBAND WAS LAWRENCE OF ARABIA-- AS PER MY PAKISTANI OFFICERS .<br />\n<br />\nNehru amended Article 368 without taking the Indian Parliament into confidence, though Parliament alone had the power to amend or not amend the Constitution, to amend Article 35 and add to it the atrocious Article 35A which was enforced in Jammu &amp; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A reads: \u201cSaving of laws with respect to permanent residents and their rights: Notwithstanding anything contained in this (Indian) Constitution, no existing law in force in the State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir, and no law hereafter enacted by the Legislature of the State \u2013 (a) defining the classes of persons who are, or shall be permanent residents of the State of Jammu &amp; Kashmir, or (b) conferring on such permanent residents any special rights and privileges or imposing upon other persons any restrictions as respects (i) employment under the State Government; (ii) acquisition of immovable property in the State; (iii) settlement in the State; or (iv) right to scholarships and such other forms of aid as the State Government may provide, shall be void on the ground that it is inconsistent with or takes away or abridges any rights conferred on the other citizens of India by any provision of this part\u201d.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_120MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_120BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_120B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_121B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4437920856963184716\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_121M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502455315695#c4437920856963184716\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2017 at 6:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_121MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nArticle 35A enabled the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly to deny citizenship rights to the refugees from West Pakistan and all other Indians, barring Permanent Residents of the State. Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.<br />\n<br />\nSection 6 meant two things: Denial of citizenship rights to the Indians who were not Permanent Residents of the State as per the definition of Permanent Resident of the State and provision to grant full citizenship rights to those who migrated from the State to Pakistan on or after March 1, 1947 and adopted Pakistani citizenship in case they returned to Jammu &amp; Kashmir (meaning Muslims).<br />\n<br />\nNehru enforced Article 35A in Jammu &amp; Kashmir UNCONSTITUTIONALLY --more important he criminally CONCEALED it.<br />\n<br />\nhid the amendments from the public by not mentioning the same in the main body of the Constitution. The unconstitutional amendments to Article 368 and Article 35 were mentioned only in Appendix-I and Appendix-II, respectively, so that they could escape public attention, and this is what actually happened.<br />\n<br />\nAPPENDIX CAN NEVER HIJACK THE MAIN BODY OF ANY ARTICLE.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE WORLD MARITIME UNIVERSITY AT MALMOA--THEY HAVE A RULE\" THE NUMBER OF WORDS IN ANY DISSERTAION CANNOT EXCEED SO MANY WORDS\"<br />\n<br />\nSO IF WE VISIT THE SWEDISH LIBRARY --EVERY THESIS IS A THIN BOOKLET--EXCEPT FOR A SCI SHIP CAPTAIN NAMED DHIR. HE PUT HAJAAR FUNDA INTO THE APPENDIX AND EXPLOITED A LOOPHOLE..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY TIME A SCI CAPTAIN GRADUATED FROM MALMAO WORLD MARITIME UNIVERISTY-- DHIR BABY WOULD INQUIRE\" DID YOU SEE MY THICK DISSERTATION --IS IT STILL THERE \"<br />\n<br />\nCAPT DHIR WAS A CHARACTER . HE WOULD TERRORISE ALL CAPTAIN-- THIS FELLOW WAS SHREWD . BASICALLY A CRYPTO JEW FROM EAST AFRICA SHOT, FAIR SKIN, PALE EYES AND TERRIBLY MEAN<br />\n<br />\nSO HE CAME ON MY HUGE TANKER ( 300 THOUSAND TONNES CRUDE OIL )AT LIBSON IN 1978--WE WERE AT LISNAVE DRYDOCK FOR A MONTH<br />\n<br />\nI HAD READ UP ALL TECHNICAL MANUALS AND NOBODY KNEW THIS SHIP BETTER THAN ME.<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN AND CHIEF OFFICER USED TO WONDER WHY CAPT DHIR NEVER TANGLED WITH SECOND MATE AJIT --THOUGH HE CHEWED THE BALLS OF EVERYBODY ELSE<br />\n<br />\nSO WHEN CHIEF OFFICER PANWAR AND ME WENT ASHORE AT LISBON--HE WAS GETTING HIS SHOES POLISHED BY A WHITE MAN ( PAYING PLENTY MONEY--HE SAID IT FELT GOOD) -- HE ASKED ME WHY DHIR DOES NOT CHEW MY BALLS.<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED \" EVERY TIME I PASSED HIM BY--I WOULD ASK HIM A HIGHLY TECHNICAL DOUBT WHOSE ANSWER I KNEW ALREADY-AND THEN I WOULD CATCH HIM GIVING BULLAND STRIP HIM LITERALLY NAKED. HE WAS NOT SUED TO THIS.<br />\n<br />\nSO IF HE SAW AJIT ON PORT SIDE THIS FELLOW DHIR WOULD LITERALLY RUN TO STARBOARD. IF HE SAW ME ON FORECASTLE HE WOULD RUN TO THE STERN PART<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nMUCH LATER IN ONE CROATIAN SHIPYARD I SAW A VERY OLD MAN. HE SAID \"I WAS THE BRAIN BEHIND THIS SHIP VLCC KOYALI AS A YOUNG MAN. I AM TOLD I CAN TALK TECHNICAL MATTERS WITH YOU \"<br />\n<br />\nINDEED WE TALKED FOR ONE HOUR EVERY DAY FOR SEVERAL DAYS . WE RECALLED FROM MEMORY --OF A SHIP DELIVERED IN 1976.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BIGGEST THING I TOLD HIM WAS \" THE GENERATORS WERE FRENCH PIELSTICK -THEY WERE NOT \"MARINE\" GENERATORS BUT \"LAND LUBBER GENERATORS \" WHOSE ALTERNATORS COULD NOT HANDLE RESONANT VIBRATIONS .<br />\n<br />\n############<br />\nHere is a poem I wrote in 1977 at Capetown. Ship had alternator problems.. Our ship was the largest ship to ever enter Capetown. I knew Rothschild's agent GANDHI since then<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_121MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_121BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_121B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_122B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2252252628218662389\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_122M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/09/uniform-civil-code-in-india-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1502455331852#c2252252628218662389\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2017 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_122MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nVLCC Koyali was a huge SCI oil tanker which could carry nearly 300,000 tonnes of crude . It was too big for the Suez canal. I was 2nd mate of this ship for 13 months. I knew who the REAL was Gandhi was even 4 decades ago.<br />\n<br />\ni still remember our days in cape town<br />\nour engines on koyali were sick and down<br />\nwe danced and sung the nights away<br />\nand scouted the hills during the day<br />\nthe deck officers had a well earned rest<br />\nthe girls they had were cape town's best<br />\nthe engineers slogged night and day<br />\nfor the work in hand , was no child's play<br />\nevery time the cape, koyali will round<br />\nwe shall remember our days of joy unbound<br />\n( with apologies to the engineers )<br />\n#############<br />\n<br />\nGETTING BACK AFTER HAJAAAAAR DIGRESSION--<br />\n<br />\nNehru in cahoots with his HALF BROTHER Shiekh Abdullah conspired against the refugees from West Pakistan, and then further hatched a conspiracy against all Indian citizens in order to pander to communalists in Kashmir by subverting Articles 16 and 19 of the Indian Constitution which deal with the rights of Indian citizens, including fundamental rights.<br />\n<br />\nrticle 19, for example, says that \u201cAll citizens shall have the right (a) to freedom of speech and expression, (b) to assemble peacefully and without arms, (c) to form associations or unions, (d) to move freely throughout the territory of India, (e) to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIt follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nIn the new city,</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nAnd the world will end soon after.</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\nCapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_133b+seedDdDgD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_133b+seedDdDgD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE THIN RED LINE IS\nPOETRY ON SCREEN .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOT A SINGLE WESTERN\nCRITIC ( THOUSANDS OF THEM ) HAD THE BRAINS TO APPRECIATE HOW DIRECTOR TERENCE\nMALICK DELVED IN THE HUMAN PSYCHE<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I may post a review on\nTHE THIN RED LINE -- only because halfwits have judged this classic\nmasterpiece.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">It did NOT get a single\n1999 Oscar award..despite 11 nominations (including the score)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The first man Terence\nMalick hired for his movie was Hans Zimmer to write the music 9 months before\nthe movie was actually shot which is a strange way of scoring a film.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Traditionally, music\ncomposers watch the footage first and score to picture.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hans Zimmer did NOT\nlike this-- playing second fiddle to the director of the movie.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Director Terrence\nMalick, made three movies already and all of them are seen as masterpieces-- he\ncame back after a hiatus of 2 decades<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ego laden Zimmer\nstarted having heated conversations with Malick about trivial musical minutia\nthat boiled over into huge arguments<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Zimmer used to being\ntreated like ZE cat's whiskers complained that nothing survived the final cut\nand this was his hardest assignment ever. Zimmer wrote music for 9 months\nstraight and it all culminated in a WEE 59 minute long album.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hans Zimmer became so\nstressed \u2013 nay -- neurotic about the experience that movie editor Billy Weber\nbanned him from the dub stage.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Terence Malick movies\nare poetry in motion\u2014 he is an art director. This was the only time Malick\nworked with composer Hans Zimmer\u2014 and they parted ways .<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Zimmer said that this\nis the hardest assignment he has ever done--especially when his music was put\nto LOW volume<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Zimmer had a point.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Malick asked Zimmer to\nminimalize the amount of electronic instruments used in the score and resort\nmostly to a live ensemble.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Devoid of the context\nand his usual \u201cplay to the gallery\u201d tricks, Hans Zimmer had to find a new\nlanguage to live up to the very hard task.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">BUT-- LET ME SAY THIS--\nHANS ZIMMER DESERVED THE OSCAR FOR HIS SCORE<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Lack of the film's\ncontext made Zimmer create an abstract work, without clear references to the\nfilm's reality, which let him concentrate on its philosophical message--and\nthis was what genius Malick wanted<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The film got mixed\nreviews.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The movie could not be\nappreciated by pea brained critics who write in flowery English\u2014but that is\nwhere it ends \u2013they do not understand the artistic nuances<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">For an intelligent\ncritic ,The Thin Red Line goes beyond mundane --breaks the art barrier and\nbecomes a philosophical treatise.</span><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The filmmaking process\nwas conformed to the music. This makes Zimmer's score the subject of the movie.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Zimmer's huge German\nego did NOT allow him to understand this truth.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE FILM IS FULL OF\nPRICELESS MONOLOGUES -- AND HIGH VOLUME OF ZIMMERs SCORE ( EVEN IF IT WAS GOOD\n) WOULD INTERFERE -- THIS IS WHY MUSIC VOLUME WAS KEPT LOW.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The soldiers'\nmonologues rarely refer to recent events, they are abstract and have a\nphilosophical character, from questions about evil's ontology (ie. its nature\nand existence) to ethical reflection (\"I killed a man... That's worse than\nrape...\").<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Simple soldiers look\nfor answers for the most complex and basic questions ('What is evil? Who we\nare?').&nbsp;&nbsp; They tug at heart strings as\nthey are put in the context of war. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">August 1, 2017 at 10:29\nAM<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">SOME RANDOM EXAMPLES OF\nMONOLOGUES IN THE MOVIE:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This great evil. Where\ndoes it come from? How\u2019d it steal into the world? What seed, what root did it\ngrow from? Who\u2019s doin\u2019 this? Who\u2019s killin\u2019 us? Robbing us of life and light.\nMockin\u2019 us with the sight of what we might\u2019ve known. Does our ruin benefit the\nearth? Does it help the grass to grow, the sun to shine? Is this darkness in\nyou, too? Have you passed to this night?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Everything a lie.\nEverything you hear, everything you see. So much to spew out. They just keep\ncoming, one after another. You\u2019re in a box, a moving box. They want you dead or\nin their lie. Only one thing a man can do: Find something that\u2019s his. Make an\nisland for himself. If I never meet you in this life, let me feel the lack. A\nglance from your eyes and my life will be yours.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">My dear wife, you get\nsomething twisted out of your insides by all this blood, filth, and noise. I\nwant to stay changeless for you. I want to come back to you the man I was\nbefore. \u2026 Why should I be afraid to die? I belong to you. If I go first, I\u2019ll\nwait for you there, on the other side of the dark waters. Be with me now. \u2026 We.\nWe together. One being. Flow together like water. Till I can\u2019t tell you from\nme. I drink you. Now. Now. \u2026 Love. Where does it come from? Who lit this flame\nin us? No war can put it out, conquer it. I was a prisoner. You set me free. \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Are you righteous?\nKind? Does your confidence lie in this? Are you loved by all? Know that I was,\ntoo. Do you imagine your suffering will be any less because you loved goodness,\ntruth?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">War don't ennoble men.\nIt turns them into dogs... poisons the soul.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Where is it that we\nwere together? Who were you that I lived with? The brother. The friend.\nDarkness, light. Strife and love. Are they the workings of one mind? The\nfeatures of the same face? Oh, my soul. Let me be in you now. Look out through\nmy eyes. Look out at the things you made. All things shining.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In this world, a man,\nhimself, is nothing. And there ain't no world but this one.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Love. Where does it\ncome from? Who lit this flame in us? No war can put it out, conquer it. I was a\nprisoner. You set me free.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I remember my mother\nwhen she was dyin', looked all shrunk up and gray. I asked her if she was\nafraid. She just shook her head. I was afraid to touch the death I seen in her.\nI couldn't find nothin' beautiful or uplifting about her goin' back to God. I\nheard of people talk about immortality, but I ain't seen it.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I wondered how it'd be\nlike when I died, what it'd be like to know this breath now was the last one\nyou was ever gonna draw. I just hope I can meet it the same way she did, with\nthe same... calm. 'Cause that's where it's hidden - the immortality I hadn't\nseen.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">What's this war in the\nheart of nature? Why does nature vie with itself? The land contend with the\nsea? Is there an avenging power in nature? Not one power, but two?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I seen another world.\nSometimes I think it was just my imagination.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">August 1, 2017 at 10:30\nAM<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We. We together. One\nbeing. Flow together like water. Till I can't tell you from me. I drink you.\nNow. Now.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Everyone lookin' for\nsalvation by himself. Each like a coal thrown from the fire.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">How did we loose all\nthe good that was given us?. Let it slip away. Scattered careless.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We're living in a world\nthat's blowing itself to hell as fast as everybody can arrange it<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You are my sons, my\ndear sons. You live inside me now. I'll carry you wherever I go.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We were a family. How'd\nit break up and come apart, so that now we're turned against each other? Each\nstanding in the other's light. How'd we lose that good that was given us? Let\nit slip away. Scattered it, careless. What's keepin' us from reaching out,\ntouching the glory?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oh, my soul, let me be\nin you now. Look out through my eyes, look out at the things you've made. All\nthings shining.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You're death that\ncaptures all. You too are the source of all that's going to be born.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OYvP4QLjPEQ<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DrLbhW7f0i8</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I HAVE NOT SEEN A\nSINGLE GOOD WESTERN MOVIE CRITIC TILL TODAY.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He was addicted to eating human liver and\nhaving sex with small girls.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were some political\nprisoners in a Siberian prison. &nbsp;They dug\na tunnel and everyone escaped except for one man. He chose to stay behind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the morning the jailer\ncame from his shack, and discovered that all had escaped except for the one man\nwho had elected to stay behind. &nbsp; The frustrated guard began beating the man who\nstayed behind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why would the jailer\nbeat the man who stayed behind\u2014the man who did NOT break the rules ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man who stayed\nbehind was truly independent. &nbsp;He didn\u2019t care whether he was running around on\nthe outside or whether he was stuck inside. To him it didn\u2019t matter. &nbsp;You see, no &nbsp;jailer had any power over him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brutal jailer\nwanted power to dominate. But the man who stayed behind could not be dominated <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep inside his heart, the jailer\nwanted this frozen prison to be shut down so that he could get transferred away\nfrom that godforsaken place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It doesn\u2019t matter who\nyou are because the inner world is the place of independence. &nbsp;Deeper still, the inner world is the place\nwhere we go beyond the illusion of independence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
