, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS FLUTE CAN RESONATE THE SOUL. &nbsp; IT GOES WAY BEYOND STRUMMING HEART STRINGS&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/the-haunting-and-eerie-melodies-from.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/the-haunting-and-eerie-melodies-from.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9rECGiBzspA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9rECGiBzspA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hans Zimmer&nbsp; uses a similar method to the Russian\nlegendary composer Dmitri Shostakovich. His music is characterized by sharp\ncontrasts, elements of the grotesque, and ambivalent tonality..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shostakovich's\nworks are broadly tonal and in the Romantic tradition, but with elements of\natonality and chromaticism.&nbsp;&nbsp; Both tend\nto use church scales, which, in case of The Thin Red Line, makes the not very\nintense music gain authority and dramatism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EaSxam5c5es/WYMfarHnC2I/AAAAAAABVOk/sBtSQibGsHAz-2rX0UU1lgf4YWrfWshJgCLcBGAs/s1600/the-thin-red-linre-narrative-project-2-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"359\" data-original-width=\"638\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EaSxam5c5es/WYMfarHnC2I/AAAAAAABVOk/sBtSQibGsHAz-2rX0UU1lgf4YWrfWshJgCLcBGAs/s640/the-thin-red-linre-narrative-project-2-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Below: Zimmer's keyboard score-- touted to be ZE masterpiece --balls !</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TG9-j3eevL4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TG9-j3eevL4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real liberation is the\ndirect experience of \u201cDying into the Nothing\u201d where you are free from the\ndelusion of separation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6yQwVyvs33c/WYL9W1z1WdI/AAAAAAABVNA/pIGA20O-2xQpBbQ0PY8n_mPGeKKiebxdQCLcBGAs/s1600/6df4142e08f508Wbcf341f332faa24b22.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"480\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6yQwVyvs33c/WYL9W1z1WdI/AAAAAAABVNA/pIGA20O-2xQpBbQ0PY8n_mPGeKKiebxdQCLcBGAs/s400/6df4142e08f508Wbcf341f332faa24b22.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>MANY TRAUMATISED WAR VETERANS &nbsp;, CAME HOME , &nbsp;JUST HAPPY TO BE ALIVE , TOTALLY\nDEVOID OF EGO.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>THEIR WIVES, CHILDREN AND FRIENDS WONDER\u2014 IS THIS\nTHE SAME GOLD DIGGIN' , EGO LADEN SON OF A BITCH, &nbsp;WHO LEFT HIS HOME FOR WAR A YEAR AGO?</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama is a yogic\ntechnique of Patanjali , penned 7000 years ago<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama is the state of\nresting in deep inner silence&nbsp; (samadhi),\nalong with the ability to pick up a thought (dharana) and let it go inward\n(Dhyana). &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama is like the\nsurgeon's scalpel, the razor sharp tool of discrimination&nbsp; that is used for the deep introspection,\nwhich eventually uncovers the jewel of the Self, in the core of our being , into\nthat EGOLESS state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the inner light\ndawns through samyama , it is used to examine the stages of subtle objects,\nwhether normally veiled or far away. The finest discrimination finally leads to\nliberation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lazp_KwuxzU/WYMI14lhIsI/AAAAAAABVNY/A5AsGVCE3eMy2q8f1IduKbjyadVRb8y6wCLcBGAs/s1600/dWownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lazp_KwuxzU/WYMI14lhIsI/AAAAAAABVNY/A5AsGVCE3eMy2q8f1IduKbjyadVRb8y6wCLcBGAs/s400/dWownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRAUMA IN WAR CAN LEAD\nTO SAMYAMA VIA THE BACKDOOR\u2014 SUCH IS THE TRANSCEDENT PARADOX OF THE HUMAN MIND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Transcendence abounds in\nTHE THIN RED LINE . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shallow minds of Rajeev Masand SQUEAK type critics cant\ngrasp it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Japanese\nstronghold has been run over &nbsp;Witt is\nseen sitting down along the edge of a pond. On the diegetic soundtrack there\nare ambient pond noises such as the sound of splashing water, wind, rustling\nleaves, and insects. Witt pours water over his head and then down the large,\ngreen leaf of an arrowhead plant. There is a cut to a low-angle shot of the\npond which shows reflections in the water and a ripple moving across the pond\u2019s\nsurface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yVTdJEbvIps/WYMJHwLh7YI/AAAAAAABVNg/SxrphDVxuXQAZnH2nuibkar4x-K9ccjPwCLcBGAs/s1600/imESages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yVTdJEbvIps/WYMJHwLh7YI/AAAAAAABVNg/SxrphDVxuXQAZnH2nuibkar4x-K9ccjPwCLcBGAs/s640/imESages.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gradually mixed into the soundtrack at this point is the Islander\nmusic heard near the start of the film and the sound of rushing water\nreminiscent of the crashing waves heard in the green island paradise sequences;\nthen a cut to a long shot of one of the \u2018natives\u2019 perched on a rock adjacent to\na large waterfall. What follows is a shot of Witt standing at the base of the\nwaterfall happily being drenched in the cascading water; then a series of\nimages showing Melanesian \u2018natives\u2019 at the seashore living their Arcadian-like\nexistence.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z3i5yT711oU/WYMIHAL14nI/AAAAAAABVNQ/-QfP8gIbMqop5F9voNk06j816o6NyRK1QCLcBGAs/s1600/quote-if-no-one-else-the-dying-must-notice-how-unreal-howW-full-of-pretense-is-all-that-we-accomplish-rainer-maria-rilke-309776.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"850\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z3i5yT711oU/WYMIHAL14nI/AAAAAAABVNQ/-QfP8gIbMqop5F9voNk06j816o6NyRK1QCLcBGAs/s640/quote-if-no-one-else-the-dying-must-notice-how-unreal-howW-full-of-pretense-is-all-that-we-accomplish-rainer-maria-rilke-309776.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The combination of the movement and sound of water at the pond\ntriggers Witt\u2019s memories of the green island paradise \u2013 or, it triggers\nimagined scenes of such a paradise, since the Melanesian community also\nfunctions as part of the character\u2019s search for transcendence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is this desire\nfor escape to the peace of transcendence revolved around the connections\nbetween existence and transcendence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick is able to\nimpress upon the intelligentsia among the audience - the sensation that nature\nis in a state of indifference vis-\u00e0-vis human affairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout the movie\nthere is a reach for the transcendent arising out of the most horrible circumstances<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Terrence Malick crafts\na masterpiece--&nbsp; a powerfully written,\nsuperbly acted story that casts new light on his characteristic themes of\nnature and culture, thought and language, humanity and inhumanity, paradise\nlost and transcendence found.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bs2XeY2zooc/WYMJq4B3X4I/AAAAAAABVNk/9gB2dVOmNLwBh9HXYai-xRJhRNduXEOKACLcBGAs/s1600/iH5mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bs2XeY2zooc/WYMJq4B3X4I/AAAAAAABVNk/9gB2dVOmNLwBh9HXYai-xRJhRNduXEOKACLcBGAs/s640/iH5mages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Yoga once the core Samyama\npractice is mastered, it becomes a natural habit of letting go.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals cant witness themselves-only\nconscious humans can.. When you develop the witness, it empowers your ability\nto know who you are, both as an individual living in the world, and as a\ntranscendent, universal consciousness.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Witnessing requires you\nto be in the moment and to see things as they are\u2014the essence of Bhagawad Gita\npenned 6000 years ago.. It enables you to respond with greater skill, intuition\ngrace and wisdom.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XSEXavCdUeg/WYMqEwByD2I/AAAAAAABVPY/KDdgvycLKaUGwjzp2QNKrBXL1DT05DD0QCLcBGAs/s1600/jap-transpor00t-and-mini-sub.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"740\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XSEXavCdUeg/WYMqEwByD2I/AAAAAAABVPY/KDdgvycLKaUGwjzp2QNKrBXL1DT05DD0QCLcBGAs/s1600/jap-transpor00t-and-mini-sub.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The witness is the\nsilent,&nbsp; peaceful centre of your\nbeing.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is from this perspective that\nyou view your mind, the eternally changing, thinking, emoting, feeling,\nremembering, desiring part of you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You learn how to make the mind a tool that\nyou can use to live a fulfilled life.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIf you have not developed the witness then your mind becomes your\nmaster.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama is an advanced\nyogic technique, one that is based on principles which utilize the operative\npowers of some of the more subtle and universal facets of consciousness; facets\nwhich many of us are not aware even exist, but which are available to all of us</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate objective\nof yoga is not to get entangled like assholes in PRETZEL positions---but to\nmove beyond one's natural tendencies of anger, frustration, disappointment,\nhappiness, and contentment, all of which could be short lived<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marking an end to\nTerrence Malick's twenty plus years of hibernation ( after two master pieces ) ,\nTHE THIN RED LINE is less a war film than a full-fledged existential inquiry\ninto, well, everything<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dJZZhS7sRHk/WYMIQHISCmI/AAAAAAABVNU/yMM922fqctogkEF84_eRgLirm3Fk7i3zgCLcBGAs/s1600/Quote-MariaAnne-Williamson-635534.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"900\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dJZZhS7sRHk/WYMIQHISCmI/AAAAAAABVNU/yMM922fqctogkEF84_eRgLirm3Fk7i3zgCLcBGAs/s640/Quote-MariaAnne-Williamson-635534.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The film opens with an\nidyll on a Pacific island. Two soldiers have gone AWOL and live blissfully with\ntribal people who exist in a pre-lapsarian state, eating the fruit that falls\nfrom the trees and the fish that leap from the seas, and smiling contentedly at\nthe bounty of Eden.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/oI26jhnjD1o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/oI26jhnjD1o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is, the movie implies, a society that reflects man's\nbest nature. But soon GRUESOME reality interrupts when the two soldiers are\ncaptured and returned to their Army company for the assault on a crucial hill\non Guadalcanal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can read the plot\nof the film from Wikipedia --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Thin_Red_Line_(1998_film)\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Thin_Red_Line_(1998_film)</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-e2dA-dNoqrE/WYMQppa-y-I/AAAAAAABVN8/UjD3ePwxVGoaQIGy-AhYUKe1HZ8QnbbwACLcBGAs/s1600/a93040ffd05124a4Wb25b1ebc90c2c217.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"778\" data-original-width=\"1024\" height=\"486\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-e2dA-dNoqrE/WYMQppa-y-I/AAAAAAABVN8/UjD3ePwxVGoaQIGy-AhYUKe1HZ8QnbbwACLcBGAs/s640/a93040ffd05124a4Wb25b1ebc90c2c217.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">QUOTE:</span> &nbsp; United States Army\nPrivate Witt goes AWOL from his unit and lives among the carefree Melanesian\nnatives in the South Pacific. He is found and imprisoned on a troop carrier by\nFirst Sergeant Welsh of his company. The men of C Company, 1st Battalion, 27th\nInfantry Regiment, 25th Infantry Division have been brought to Guadalcanal as\nreinforcements in the campaign to secure Henderson Field and seize the island\nfrom the Japanese.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they wait in a Navy transport, they contemplate their\nlives and the invasion. Battalion commander Lieutenant Colonel Tall talks with\nBrigadier General Quintard about the invasion and its importance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">C Company lands on\nGuadalcanal unopposed and marches to the interior of the island, encountering\nnatives and evidence of the Japanese presence. They arrive near Hill 210, a key\nJapanese position. The Japanese have placed bunkers at the top of the hill and\nanyone attempting the climb will be cut down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/j924qaMb0d8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/j924qaMb0d8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A brief shelling of the\nhill begins the next day at dawn. C Company attempts to capture the hill but is\nrepelled by gunfire. Among the first killed is one of the platoon leaders,\nSecond Lieutenant Whyte. During the battle, a squad led by Sergeant Keck hides\nbehind a swell safe from enemy fire to wait for reinforcements. Keck reaches\nfor a grenade but accidentally pulls the pin and dies in the process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lieutenant Colonel Tall orders the company commander, Captain James Staros, to\ntake the bunker by frontal assault, at whatever cost. Staros refuses and Tall\ndecides to join Staros on the front line to see the situation. The Japanese\nresistance seems to have lessened, and Tall's opinion of Staros seems to have\nbeen sealed. Private Witt, having been assigned punitively as a stretcher\nbearer, asks to rejoin the company, and is allowed to do so.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: &nbsp;One of The Thin Red\nLine\u2019s most emotionally affecting scenes finds Woody Harrelson blowing his own\nass off with a grenade.&nbsp; We don\u2019t see the\nmoment of bloody impact; only the gut-wrenching aftermath and the look in his\neyes as he realizes his family jewels is toast.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YMUHkM1t7l0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YMUHkM1t7l0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A small detachment of\nmen performs a reconnaissance mission on Tall's orders to determine the\nstrength of the Japanese bunker. Private Bell reports there are five machine\nguns in the bunker. He joins another small team of men (including Witt), led by\nCaptain John Gaff, on a flanking mission to take the bunker. The operation is a\nsuccess and C Company overruns one of the last Japanese strongholds on the\nisland. The Japanese they find are largely malnourished and dying, and put up\nlittle resistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For their efforts the\nmen are given a week's leave: the airfield where they are based comes under\nenemy artillery bombardment; Bell receives a letter from his wife informing him\nthat she has fallen in love with someone else and wishes to divorce;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Captain\nStaros is relieved of his command by Lieutenant Colonel Tall, who deems him too\nsoft for the pressures of combat and suggests that he apply for reassignment\nand become a lawyer in the JAG in Washington. He offers to arrange a Purple\nHeart for Staros, to avoid the unit's name being stained by having an officer\nremoved from command.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Witt comes across the locals and notices that they have\ngrown distant and distrustful of him and quarrel regularly with one another.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company is sent on\npatrol up a river but with the inexperienced 1st Lieutenant George Band at its\nhead. As Japanese artillery fire falls close to their positions; Band orders\nsome men to scout upriver, with Witt volunteering to go along. They encounter\nan advancing Japanese column and are attacked.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/jLzAny3O5-E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/jLzAny3O5-E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To buy time for Corporal Fife to\ngo back and inform the rest of the unit, Witt draws away the Japanese but is\nthen encircled by one of their squads, who demand that he surrender. He raises\nhis rifle and is gunned down.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The company is able to retreat safely, and Witt\nis later buried by Welsh and his squadmates. C Company receives a new\ncommander, Captain Bosche and boards a waiting LCT, departing from the island. <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VfEmOO2Bb5c/WYMQejmGOFI/AAAAAAABVN4/rjDoW7yt2Wc9S51bsM7KxHBP2uN0LtpaQCLcBGAs/s1600/Captu2Qred_Japanese_lg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"582\" data-original-width=\"819\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VfEmOO2Bb5c/WYMQejmGOFI/AAAAAAABVN4/rjDoW7yt2Wc9S51bsM7KxHBP2uN0LtpaQCLcBGAs/s640/Captu2Qred_Japanese_lg.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most\ninteresting aspects of the music of The Thin Red Line are the Melanesian chants\nthat are sung by the inhabitants of the village depicted in the beginning of\nthe movie.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE BEEN TO ALL THESE\nMELANESIAN ISLANDS ON SHIPS I COMMANDED.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Melanesians ( before WW2 ) are\nliving in a sort of idyll. This is the only place where Private Witt (one of\nthe main characters, played by Jim Caviezel) feels safe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody loves each\nother, there are no fights between children.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UMcfnLJ1uAc/WYMlWLNo1eI/AAAAAAABVOw/2_KV8HIEkocMnfAfnBJJe7Jvv4TJplv9QCLcBGAs/s1600/maxresde0fault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"1280\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UMcfnLJ1uAc/WYMlWLNo1eI/AAAAAAABVOw/2_KV8HIEkocMnfAfnBJJe7Jvv4TJplv9QCLcBGAs/s640/maxresde0fault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when the Americans find him\nand pick him up, the film becomes dark. The chants are a part of the idyll.\nIt's good, simple religiosity, full of mutual love and that's what the chants\nare like.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iqrXI-VTJ1w/WYMdJMEKGnI/AAAAAAABVOU/GGbMhM1zZlYCCrA4gcnMhlP2L5uXmREAwCLcBGAs/s1600/930df24c8ba06cda9bbc83dd0b5ed41c8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1062\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iqrXI-VTJ1w/WYMdJMEKGnI/AAAAAAABVOU/GGbMhM1zZlYCCrA4gcnMhlP2L5uXmREAwCLcBGAs/s640/930df24c8ba06cda9bbc83dd0b5ed41c8.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The title of The Thin\nRed Line means a number of things. In one of the epigraphs of Jones\u2019s novel,\nit\u2019s a line of military heroes praised by Rudyard Kipling; in the other\nepigraph, it\u2019s the porous border \u201cbetween the sane and the mad\u201d mentioned in an\nold midwestern saying.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SO SO SO-- WHAT IS THIS THIN RED\nLINE ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red Line is\nAmerican author James Jones's fourth novel. It draws heavily on Jones's\nexperiences at the Sea Horse during World War II's Guadalcanal campaign.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of particular\nsignificance, Jones recounts his own experience killing a Japanese soldier with\nhis bare hands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The novel has been\nadapted for cinema twice, first by Andrew Marton in 1964, then by Terrence\nMalick in 1998.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The title comes from\nRudyard Kipling's poem \"Tommy\", from the collection Barrack-Room\nBallads, in which Kipling describes foot soldiers as \"the thin red line of\n'eroes\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kipling's poem is based on the 1854 action of British soldiers\nduring the Crimean War called The Thin Red Line (Battle of Balaclava).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Pqxd2dILo-E/WYMl_yIkFtI/AAAAAAABVO4/YGCiRNPhPeMijzDaDknmkpTVLkD6uwJ7ACLcBGAs/s1600/Thke_Thin_Red_Line.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"296\" data-original-width=\"642\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Pqxd2dILo-E/WYMl_yIkFtI/AAAAAAABVO4/YGCiRNPhPeMijzDaDknmkpTVLkD6uwJ7ACLcBGAs/s640/Thke_Thin_Red_Line.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Tommy\" is an\n1890 poem by Rudyard Kipling.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The\npoem addresses the ordinary British soldier fightimg for&nbsp; ROTSHCHILDs EMPIRE of Kipling's time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I went into a\npublic-'ouse to get a pint o' beer,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The publican 'e up an'\nsez, \"We serve no red-coats here.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The girls be'ind the\nbar they laughed an' giggled fit to die,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I outs into the street\nagain an' to myself sez I:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\n\"Tommy, go away\";<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; But it's \"Thank you, Mister\nAtkins\", when the band begins to play,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The band begins to play, my boys, the band\nbegins to play,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O it's \"Thank you, Mister\nAtkins\", when the band begins to play.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I went into a theatre\nas sober as could be,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They gave a drunk\ncivilian room, but 'adn't none for me;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They sent me to the\ngallery or round the music-'alls,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But when it comes to\nfightin', Lord! they'll shove me in the stalls!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\n\"Tommy, wait outside\";<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; But it's \"Special train for\nAtkins\" when the trooper's on the tide,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The troopship's on the tide, my boys, the troopship's\non the tide,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O it's \"Special train for Atkins\"\nwhen the trooper's on the tide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, makin' mock o'\nuniforms that guard you while you sleep<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is cheaper than them\nuniforms, an' they're starvation cheap;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An' hustlin' drunken\nsoldiers when they're goin' large a bit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is five times better\nbusiness than paradin' in full kit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Then it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\n\"Tommy, 'ow's yer soul?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; But it's \"Thin red line of\n'eroes\" when the drums begin to roll,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The drums begin to roll, my boys, the drums\nbegin to roll,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O it's \"Thin red line of 'eroes\"\nwhen the drums begin to roll.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We aren't no thin red\n'eroes, nor we aren't no blackguards too,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But single men in\nbarricks, most remarkable like you;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An' if sometimes our\nconduck isn't all your fancy paints,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why, single men in\nbarricks don't grow into plaster saints;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; While it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\n\"Tommy, fall be'ind\",<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; But it's \"Please to walk in front,\nsir\", when there's trouble in the wind,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There's trouble in the wind, my boys,\nthere's trouble in the wind,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; O it's \"Please to walk in front,\nsir\", when there's trouble in the wind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You talk o' better food\nfor us, an' schools, an' fires, an' all:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We'll wait for extry\nrations if you treat us rational.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't mess about the\ncook-room slops, but prove it to our face<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Widow's Uniform is\nnot the soldier-man's disgrace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\n\"Chuck him out, the brute!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; But it's \"Saviour of 'is country\"\nwhen the guns begin to shoot;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; An' it's Tommy this, an' Tommy that, an'\nanything you please;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; An' Tommy ain't a bloomin' fool -- you bet\nthat Tommy sees!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4Vs5iEfieNg/WYMdQh5jBvI/AAAAAAABVOY/hV4W7SBkoJAnuLKbK0wWz_CX-JrnZx4NQCLcBGAs/s1600/Battle%252Bof%252BWWGuadalcanal%252BAugust%252B7th%252B1942%252B-%252BFebruary%252B9th%252B1943.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
