margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7289909392014491080\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1501830800243#c7289909392014491080\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 4, 2017 at 12:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi ss,<br />\n<br />\nThe Melanesian singers had a strange voice timbre<br />\n<br />\nI loved it<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j924qaMb0d8</span><br />\n<br />\nI have dropped off Petrol / Diesel and Jet fuel in these islands. I know local stories .<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW2 THERE WAS NO FUEL-- THE LOCALS USED COCONUT OIL-- FOR BRAKE FLUID THEY PISSED INTO IT..<br />\n<br />\nJaps used to catch women and cut off one breast -it was a dinner delicacy<br />\n<br />\nthere are things I cant say .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedHqfD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedHqfD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gNhUAcmqcy0/WYQvfCgudiI/AAAAAAABVR4/nCL2Si-MgPggcw16S4nj1UuzN8nQHfMIgCLcBGAs/s1600/doWQwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"174\" data-original-width=\"290\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gNhUAcmqcy0/WYQvfCgudiI/AAAAAAABVR4/nCL2Si-MgPggcw16S4nj1UuzN8nQHfMIgCLcBGAs/s400/doWQwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our lives and deaths\nmay be impersonally swallowed in the current, yet we are fleetingly a part of\nthe continuity of life . &nbsp;&nbsp;In The Thin\nRed Line this is reflected via evocative and spiritualised notions of \u2018all\nthings shining\u2019 and \u2018the glory\u2019 of existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zEzfcNL4Ezk/WYQwLrPfULI/AAAAAAABVSE/rw1yaOiH6JQeQQmgtO_R12tc4hlpu3FTQCLcBGAs/s1600/imaWges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zEzfcNL4Ezk/WYQwLrPfULI/AAAAAAABVSE/rw1yaOiH6JQeQQmgtO_R12tc4hlpu3FTQCLcBGAs/s1600/imaWges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick\u2019s desire to make\nnot a war movie but a movie about what happens to people who go to war results\nin a film that is more prose and poetry than it is a narrative or fiction.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For all the dissonant\nvoices, the star cameos, the awesome cinematography, this is Malick's vision\nalone.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick\u2019s genius is that\nhe takes us in to not only the real and physical hell of war, but also into the\nthoughts and passions, doubts and deliberations of soldiers ,their officers,\nand the people who sent them into battle.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick uses poetic\nmetaphors in many sequences as a haunting afterglow instead of any narratives<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick a philosophy\nprofessor has loaded the beast of war with soul, filled its belly with the\nspirit of the men, good and evil, who die, or survive its appaling appetite.\nThe film's message is life, pure and simple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How can a war film be\ntruly great unless you care deeply about its effects on people you've come to\nknow after some rich character development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I WAS JUST LISTENING TO\nSOME PEA BRAINED ACTORS ON TV TALKING ABOUT CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT OF \u201cJAB HARRY\nMET SEJAL\u201d &nbsp;==</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>--AND I HAD THE BIGGEST BELLY\nLAUGH OF 2017.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>OH BOY ! &nbsp; &nbsp;I STILL CANT STOP LAUGHING !!<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">FROGS IN THE WELL CRY \u201c\nKITHNA CHENGA DUNIYA HAI HAMAARA \u2026 AAKASH DEHKO GOL GOL NEELA \u201c</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Hy3tpcWJoaQ/WYRAJPmFpbI/AAAAAAABVS8/bpxjb515XHkL5DNf3oBfyAz9fEs0fAccACLcBGAs/s1600/v1.bjsxMjUw5NTA2O2o7MTc0Mjk7MTIwMDszNTQzOzIzNjI.bjsxMjU5NTA2O2o7MTc0Mjk7MTIwMDszNTQzOzIzNjI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"800\" data-original-width=\"1200\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Hy3tpcWJoaQ/WYRAJPmFpbI/AAAAAAABVS8/bpxjb515XHkL5DNf3oBfyAz9fEs0fAccACLcBGAs/s640/v1.bjsxMjUw5NTA2O2o7MTc0Mjk7MTIwMDszNTQzOzIzNjI.bjsxMjU5NTA2O2o7MTc0Mjk7MTIwMDszNTQzOzIzNjI.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike Spielberg,\nMalick doesn't immediately hurtle us into the inferno of battle. Instead, he\nlulls us into the brutality of war through an extended prologue..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red\nLine is almost a profound and almost poetic meditation on the nature of war and\nhow it poisons man's soul. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malik shows\nthat there is nothing noble about this bloody conflict, and, ultimately, there\nare no winners. &nbsp;He gives this war film\nan almost elegiac quality and a rare humanity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nick Nolte as Tall is\ndynamic as the obsessed and driven colonel who relishes his first opportunity\nto fight a war after fifteen years in the army, and who doesn't care how many\nmen have to lose their lives in securing a vital strategic position<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VZCFs-KgXA/WYQ_gKnd_AI/AAAAAAABVS0/eS52HUuxZAcO-8Pz4e35bjMA1YlabMIywCLcBGAs/s1600/Film_536w_ThinRedLin00e_B_original.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"252\" data-original-width=\"448\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VZCFs-KgXA/WYQ_gKnd_AI/AAAAAAABVS0/eS52HUuxZAcO-8Pz4e35bjMA1YlabMIywCLcBGAs/s640/Film_536w_ThinRedLin00e_B_original.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red Line is a\nmetaphysical war movie \u2013 made for the thinkers not the DUFFERS.&nbsp; Malick raised the bar and how !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spielberg&nbsp; never asks&nbsp;\ntoo many uncomfortable questions, or get too much in your face about the\nqueasiness of war. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movie is cocooned\nin dreamy narration, with a peak behind most major characters' minds (there's\nalso a \"neutral\" narrator played by a non-cast member), woven\ntogether into a kind of aural poetry <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The results are a war\nmovie unlike anything you've ever seen, a far-out, consciousness-raising meditation\non the nature of man and violence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It might not be everyone's cup of tea,\nbut&nbsp; the intelligentsia will be in\nabsolute heaven.&nbsp; There is a &nbsp;movie that challenges all of your preconceived\nnotions of what a \"war movie\" is or should be.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yOmGsiyGru0/WYQ_Refc4LI/AAAAAAABVSw/ohBk7zbjIpAlGvyP13kvFAhBb93xAWWIgCLcBGAs/s1600/04328_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"409\" data-original-width=\"728\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yOmGsiyGru0/WYQ_Refc4LI/AAAAAAABVSw/ohBk7zbjIpAlGvyP13kvFAhBb93xAWWIgCLcBGAs/s640/04328_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malik came back after a\n20 year haitus and blew everyone away, as expected&nbsp; \u2013 the gorgeous photography, the editorial\ncubism, his naturalistic way with actors; everything is top notch and\ngo-for-broke.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We get raw realism \u2014what do we get today?\u2014all bullshit unreal\nfilms like Picasso shit!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a movie which\nis better than a novel&nbsp; Terrence Malick\ncracked this one out of the park though.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a hundred years from now, when critics and cinema lovers will\nremember Malick, they will remember The Thin Red Line before all his other\nmovies.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's a movie with balls, heart\nand supreme technical mastery. You don\u2019t need to make Interstellar to show\ntechnical mastery<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick\u2019s film is one of\nthe most honest ever made about the brutality of war. When soldiers are\nrelieved of duty, they don\u2019t make \"politically correct \"speeches about staying until the job is done;\nthey make for the next boat out with scant hesitation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-s1tHcu7nUCw/WYQ_tn_z8RI/AAAAAAABVS4/v06Kzlp_FU4JpqqEZL8FgBDdQzyBxjSJgCLcBGAs/s1600/thin99red2_large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"595\" data-original-width=\"900\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-s1tHcu7nUCw/WYQ_tn_z8RI/AAAAAAABVS4/v06Kzlp_FU4JpqqEZL8FgBDdQzyBxjSJgCLcBGAs/s1600/thin99red2_large.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Hans Zimmer admitted\nthat Malick understands music better than most directors he's worked with.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">You don\u2019t have to be a hen to appreciate a\nfuckin\u2019 omelet<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ejn38xv5B-A/WYRBJSrcK3I/AAAAAAABVTI/yDY1dD-w0V4QK9ooKQlzdIT2bzPAmfLMQCLcBGAs/s1600/terrence_maliick.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"328\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ejn38xv5B-A/WYRBJSrcK3I/AAAAAAABVTI/yDY1dD-w0V4QK9ooKQlzdIT2bzPAmfLMQCLcBGAs/s320/terrence_maliick.jpg\" width=\"262\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Terrence Malick, after\ntwo decades of absence, created a one-of-a-kind masterpiece that is still being\npuzzled two decades later.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The puzzle ends today\u2014and it took a Capt Ajit\nVadakayil to do it</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zH78bTbyzNI/WYQ--2mTBkI/AAAAAAABVSs/tgoV3udMiAAqLKQxQGEJFdUuUS_PcoXEgCLcBGAs/s1600/600pxe-TRLNambu14-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"274\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zH78bTbyzNI/WYQ--2mTBkI/AAAAAAABVSs/tgoV3udMiAAqLKQxQGEJFdUuUS_PcoXEgCLcBGAs/s640/600pxe-TRLNambu14-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Liberal Hollywood hates\nreal wars, but adores the hell out of war movies. How else can you explain the\nsheer bulk of actors, stars and would-be stars, who flock to be a part of war\nmovies no matter how small their part? Maybe it\u2019s the need to feel \u201ctough,\u201d so\nyou play the toughest guys out there \u2014 and who is tougher than the men who\nsurvived a \u201cworld war\u201d?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aged colonel\nshooting for a general\u2019s star on his helmet&nbsp;\norders men to keep moving directly up the hill. He wants his glory, and\nhe\u2019ll sacrifice hundreds to get it.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nOnly when a captain&nbsp; directly\ndisobeys him does the colonel stop to consider what he\u2019s doing, though not\nbefore he chews out the captain in front of God and everybody.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, when the men break through, the\ncolonel pushes the men far ahead of the water supply in the hopes of swift\nvictory, compounding the soldiers\u2019 misery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Possibly the most\nprimal scene occurs early in the film as Charlie Company marches in file\nthrough Guadalcanal's rain forest. A native man approaches them on foot. He is\nold, with a shaggy beard and an unruly head of hair. He passes the army unit\nwithout acknowledging it, without even appearing to see it. The soldiers in\nturn stare quizzically at this local curiosity. Who is he? What is his\nbusiness? Is he God? Is God ignoring us?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-alwpWASpcmw/WYRBaOT1ARI/AAAAAAABVTM/8fS49AxlTrE4VwLlXLJGpUCzEBVF-FXdwCLcBGAs/s1600/9221.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"369\" data-original-width=\"853\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-alwpWASpcmw/WYRBaOT1ARI/AAAAAAABVTM/8fS49AxlTrE4VwLlXLJGpUCzEBVF-FXdwCLcBGAs/s640/9221.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a war movie, The\nThin Red Line is oddly pensive. It contemplates its own action, its own\ncarnage, and its own chaos.. These soldiers are true poet-warriors in the\nAncient Greek sense. When that same soldier realizes he's about to die, the camera\nconcentrates on his face. There is silence -- no music, no gunfire. He\nrecognizes the face of death, contemplates it, and chooses not to resist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite our detachment,\nthe soldiers never degenerate into war stereotypes. Their minds are completely\nexposed to us; no thoughts or ideas remain hidden.. From Nolte's teeth-gnashing\ncolonel to Sean Penn's no-bullshit sergeant, Malick trusts that we'll find\nsomething salvageable buried within these disillusioned wrecks.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TYv1B4pHPHU/WYQ-h3gh3wI/AAAAAAABVSo/nvu9D01ep7wi0zmMDjy7AYkUlU8gN5aJQCLcBGAs/s1600/juhngle.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"350\" data-original-width=\"243\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TYv1B4pHPHU/WYQ-h3gh3wI/AAAAAAABVSo/nvu9D01ep7wi0zmMDjy7AYkUlU8gN5aJQCLcBGAs/s640/juhngle.jpg\" width=\"444\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the most realistic\nscenes in The Thin Red Line feel like they're couched in a reverie. The\nsoldiers are jolted awake by incoming mortar shells or exploding grenades; they\nspring to action with gung-ho clarity; and when all is done, they naturally\nretreat back into their thoughts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick films physical\nconfrontations as sudden bursts of consciousness, as something temporary and\nethereal. They don't persist in the soldiers' minds or in our minds. They\nevaporate from our subconscious. For Malick, battle scenes are merely catalysts\nfor pondering the question one soldier asks, \"How did we lose the good\nthat was given us?\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hhIaWDYqvFs/WYQ-Uw9QkQI/AAAAAAABVSk/242DUsQ3CVgD37_kkK_VQMDoeOH25x3PgCLcBGAs/s1600/The%2BTjhin%2BRed%2BLine_Japanese.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"466\" data-original-width=\"1008\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hhIaWDYqvFs/WYQ-Uw9QkQI/AAAAAAABVSk/242DUsQ3CVgD37_kkK_VQMDoeOH25x3PgCLcBGAs/s640/The%2BTjhin%2BRed%2BLine_Japanese.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On this island, the men\nat war are seized by dreams, visions, and hallucinations. Much of the\nscreenplay consists of stream-of-consciousness monologues by various characters\nabout nature, good and evil, love, pain, the fear of death, and the mystical\noneness of all creation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Thin Red Line is a rare personal film that\nfeels like a generous gift to mankind's collective conscience. After twenty\nyears of hibernation Malick proves that he can still tread the thin line\nbetween poetry and journalism, dreams and reality, film and life.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TjMlnEWtEv8/WYRAxtv-wWI/AAAAAAABVTE/Xg0DRcm9JFosKcbyUXB0Hzffsi48uWp6QCLcBGAs/s1600/thinre3dline011-640x296.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"296\" data-original-width=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TjMlnEWtEv8/WYRAxtv-wWI/AAAAAAABVTE/Xg0DRcm9JFosKcbyUXB0Hzffsi48uWp6QCLcBGAs/s1600/thinre3dline011-640x296.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The title of the film\nrefers to an old Midwestern saying, \"There's only a thin red line between\nthe sane and the mad.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The film&nbsp; conveys the obscenity of war and the strange\nmixture of virtue and vice it draws out of men.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The poetic voice overs\nemerge from the souls of the soldiers rather than their minds.&nbsp; This movie goes even further to show us the\nhumanity of the people we kill while we are in war..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Malick&nbsp; intermingles&nbsp;\nbrutality and beauty, his signature cutaways to indigenous flora and\nfauna-the gentle lyricism of his disjunctive narration - painterly images too\nrich to fully register in one single viewing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Duffers keep away\u2014 even the first\nview will be too much for your empty brain to handle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In The Thin Red Line,\neach of these soldiers are really just dying for nothing&nbsp; .. . They leave just as much impact as the\nleaves that fall to the ground when the trees are shaken by their explosions\nand ruin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s even a moment in the film where the numerous deaths of\nvarious infantrymen are interrupted by a shot of a small bird that\u2019s been just\nas damaged from the ensuing battle; crawling, writhing around the ground, and\nflapping its wings in a futile attempt to fly away from the destruction its\nhuman counterparts are creating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Throughout The Thin Red\nLine, we hear a narrator that we never really get a good glimpse of throughout\nthe experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the voice that opens the film with \u201cWhat\u2019s this war in\nthe heart of nature? Why does nature vie with itself?\u201d and then proceeds to\nnarrate with some of the more famous lines like \u201cWhat is this great evil? How\ndid it steal into the world? From what seed, what root did it spring? Who\u2019s\ndoing this? Who\u2019s killing us? Robbing us of light and life. Mocking us with the\nsight of what we might have known.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">The Thin Red Line is\none of the most harrowing of anti-war statements\u2014and hence is unsuitable to a\nmilitary cadet academy library. . </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And as we see hundreds\nof these men losing their lives, the one true constant in this war is, yet\nagain, nature. The vines and the trees outlive the humans. They\u2019re the ones\nthat leave the legacy of the earth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And while these two fight, the Melanesians\nare probably still in their village, living peacefully, swimming freely in the\nsame oceans that Private Witt once swam in for a brief but impactful period of\ntime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It\u2019s clear from the very beginning that this\nisn\u2019t a film about heroes but instead victims. Instead of war glorifying the\nindividual, it \u201cpoisons the soul\u201d, as one character puts it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The film\u2019s official\ntagline was \u201cEvery man fights his own war\u201d and one of Malick\u2019s obsessive themes\nthat connects all of his work is the contemplation of man\u2019s place in the\nuniverse, how important we are as a species in the grand scheme of life, and\nwhat mark will we leave when we\u2019re eventually gone forever. Yet they\u2019re all\nequal in their importance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What differs, however, is each soldier\u2019s view of\nthat importance.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The majority of the\nsoldiers in C Company are neither heroes nor cowards. They\u2019re simply men, many\nof whose spirits are too fragile for the war in which they\u2019re involved. They\nlook upon each other and the world with searching eyes as though looking for\nsomething in the world that matches their own conception of it</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: 6000 years ago, when the white man was running around naked, clubbing down animals for food, doing GRUNT GRUNT for language --check out the wisdom below&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-buaPf9duVHg/WYW72d2FhFI/AAAAAAABVUY/xUu1vcaaTb01qQcfSXFRnhhLCka3UDhKQCLcBGAs/s1600/dwweath-soul-660x440.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"440\" data-original-width=\"660\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-buaPf9duVHg/WYW72d2FhFI/AAAAAAABVUY/xUu1vcaaTb01qQcfSXFRnhhLCka3UDhKQCLcBGAs/s640/dwweath-soul-660x440.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">John Steinbeck mirrored\nVedanta</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\u2013</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">\"maybe all men got one big soul\neverybody's a part of\"...</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Pwrex7kjLaI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Pwrex7kjLaI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red Line\nevokes equal (if not greater) horror by operating in such irregular, fitful\nrhythms, by juxtaposing the brutal with the banal, and by depriving both\nsoldier and viewer of any sturdy foundation against which to measure their\nexperience.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Characters emerge and disappear with startling suddenness<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Some people create\ntheir own rules and Malick is one of them. He creates his own path while\ncarrying his own lamp.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">War numbs the soul, and\nin the midst of this meaningless at least one main character in this movie\nrefuses to degenerate into an animal, even at his moment of death. This is\ninspiring indeed<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This film takes you\ninside the men who are fighting. Two main characters reveal profound states of\nmind in the midst of their hell, and both refuse to harden their hearts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red Line is\nbeautiful to watch, and flows deeply into profound areas of faith, life and\ndeath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This film rightly\nchallenges the waste of human life resulting from the egos of detached military\nleaders.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man in the trenches has very often been slaughtered at the hands\nof some leader\u2019s personal objectives\u2014and rarely does the private see the big\npicture around him.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many have run down The Thin\nRed Line for the lack of characterization, plot and an unclear setting. &nbsp;&nbsp;They must know that &nbsp;these \u201cflaws\u201d are intentional, a deliberate\nattempt to divorce the audience from the character and the narrative and\ninstead explore something else entirely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thin Red Line is a\ncomplete divorce from any previous war film. The film shows little interest in\nthe history or the characters. Instead, WWII becomes a backdrop for Malick to\nexplore the nature of war itself, ruminate on why men are driven to kill each\nother.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He concludes it\u2019s not a struggle against an outward foe, but an inward\ncontention, something Malick sees as innate to human nature, man vying against\nhis very self.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wfn1PR_kle0/WYW-cBC5kHI/AAAAAAABVUw/e-68ic1bNVknjt56MBAQk8cCEkDQmqxQgCLcBGAs/s1600/0-0-namgka23.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"800\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wfn1PR_kle0/WYW-cBC5kHI/AAAAAAABVUw/e-68ic1bNVknjt56MBAQk8cCEkDQmqxQgCLcBGAs/s640/0-0-namgka23.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire film is\nbuilt around one battle which is driven by a lieutenant colonel\u2019s ambition. The\nmen fighting the battle have little investment in the conflict and many have a\nbleak and existential view of the whole affair.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no victory or\ntriumph in The Thin Red Line through battle. War is inevitable; the only thing\nto do is to find a way cope<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;This film is nearly 3 hours long..</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movie takes shape\nas a rich network of opposing forces: fear of death and awe for life, the heady\nabstraction of its ideas and the near-hallucinatory clarity of its sounds and\nimages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>DUH ?</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eXc4R2O18mk/WYXOxGJIE5I/AAAAAAABVVQ/CCB-2Bt9hE0wHxYI9to2cvqg6y15WpvoQCLcBGAs/s1600/83c2441963acdK66f2588377fc804bc97--apex-predator-wwe-funny.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"374\" data-original-width=\"478\" height=\"500\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eXc4R2O18mk/WYXOxGJIE5I/AAAAAAABVVQ/CCB-2Bt9hE0wHxYI9to2cvqg6y15WpvoQCLcBGAs/s640/83c2441963acdK66f2588377fc804bc97--apex-predator-wwe-funny.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS MOVIE IS NOT FOR HALF\nWITS , GAYS AND NYMPHOMANIACS WHO GO TO DROOL AT WWF WRESTLING&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0ym6wKpnQmM/WYQ95x4V7dI/AAAAAAABVSg/O2rjZjVkAoIoc0o3Ksjn2bcDod3fhi5QACLcBGAs/s1600/1e9855804.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"610\" height=\"314\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0ym6wKpnQmM/WYQ95x4V7dI/AAAAAAABVSg/O2rjZjVkAoIoc0o3Ksjn2bcDod3fhi5QACLcBGAs/s640/1e9855804.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Thin Red Line is\nperhaps the most romantic war film ever made- what sets it apart is that it\nnever romanticizes war. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">DUFFERS cry\u2014if there is\nromance where is the fuckin\u2019 sex ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">There\u2019s an old joke\nthat goes like this:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Worried that their son\nwas too optimistic, the parents of a little boy took him to a psychiatrist. In\nan attempt to dampen the boy\u2019s spirits, the psychiatrist showed him into a room\npiled high with nothing but horse manure. Instead of displaying distaste, the\nlittle boy clambered to the top of the pile and began digging.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cWhat are you doing?\u201d\nthe psychiatrist asked.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cWith all this manure,\u201d\nthe little boy replied, beaming, \u201cthere must be a pony in here somewhere.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-x-dZ6M33tqs/WYQ9h3juF7I/AAAAAAABVSc/wldigvSOvnIKkeED98NvXXhUcJfWo08xACLcBGAs/s1600/iwwmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"299\" height=\"359\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-x-dZ6M33tqs/WYQ9h3juF7I/AAAAAAABVSc/wldigvSOvnIKkeED98NvXXhUcJfWo08xACLcBGAs/s640/iwwmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/the-art-of-writing-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/the-art-of-writing-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sIaMU3oo1KU/WYR3PsYrhRI/AAAAAAABVTo/tQkV90xii7EGGn2Hb9ePonY5AbOA4hGwgCLcBGAs/s1600/Shooting-oWn-the-Front-Line-1-600x337.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"200\" data-original-width=\"350\" height=\"227\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sIaMU3oo1KU/WYR3PsYrhRI/AAAAAAABVTo/tQkV90xii7EGGn2Hb9ePonY5AbOA4hGwgCLcBGAs/s400/Shooting-oWn-the-Front-Line-1-600x337.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Below &nbsp;: At sea, on shipboard parties ,my crew forced me to this this song-- &nbsp;they said my voice has more emotion. &nbsp;It is homecoming for the DEAD soldier -- &nbsp;in a body bag..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ftk7ogLAV3Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ftk7ogLAV3Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">I CHOSE THIS POEM FOR&nbsp; MY 9 YEAR OLD ELDER SON FOR AN INTER SCHOOL\nPOETRY COMPETITION\u2014WHICH GOT HIM THE TOP PRIZE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNARMED and unattended walks the Czar, Through\nMoscow's busy street one winter's day.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crowd uncover as his face they see,-\n\" God greet the Czar !\" they say.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">Along his path there moved a funeral, Grey\nspectacle of poverty and woe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">A wretched sledge, dragged by one weary man, Slowly\nacross the snow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">And on the sledge, blown by the winter wind,\nLay a poor coffin, very rude and bare. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">And he who drew it bent before his load, With\ndull and sullen air.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Emperor stopped and beckoned to the man ;\n\" Who is't thou bearest to the grave ?\" he said..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"\nOnly a soldier, Sire !\" the short reply. \" Only a soldier, dead.!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" Only a soldier??!!\" &nbsp;musing, said the Czar ; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" Only a Russian, who was poor and\nbrave.. &nbsp;Move on. I follow. Such an one\ngoes not Unhonoured to his grave.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">He bent his head, and silent raised his cap;\nThe Czar of all the Russias, pacing slow,. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the coffin, as again it went,\nSlowly across the snow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">The passers of the street, all wondering,\nLooked on that sight, then followed silently <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peasant and prince, and artisan and clerk,\nAll in one company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">Still, as they went, the crowd grew ever\nmore, Till thousands stood around the friendless grave,. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Led by that princely heart, who, royal, true,\nHonoured the poor and brave.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sJgli1I3OXY/WYSGLnD1gtI/AAAAAAABVT4/V3edCRTk5WUoonWaBRc4TMlmB_yfiPz0ACLcBGAs/s1600/Damocles-8Sword.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"410\" data-original-width=\"510\" height=\"514\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sJgli1I3OXY/WYSGLnD1gtI/AAAAAAABVT4/V3edCRTk5WUoonWaBRc4TMlmB_yfiPz0ACLcBGAs/s640/Damocles-8Sword.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 4, 2017 at 7:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_49MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE SECOND TIME YOU HAVE DECLARED BEFORE WRITING YOUR REVIEW OF A MOVIE &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;\"IF ANYBODY ON THE PLANET CAN WRITE A BETTER REVIEW, I WILL STOP BLOGGING\"<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU DO THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nWELL--- &nbsp;THIS HAS ALWAYS BEEN MY STYLE --IT FORCES ME TO PERFORM<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN BEFORE -- I PLAY BETTER TO A HOSTILE AUDIENCE<br />\n<br />\nIN THE VIDEO BELOW--FLINTOFF PASSED SOME HOSTILE REMARK--<br />\n<br />\nRESULT?<br />\n<br />\nSIX SIXES--A WORLD RECORD<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5SkBZcvuuQs</span><br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE WHO HAVE SAILED WITH ME WILL VOUCH -- &nbsp; THE FIRST THING CAPTAIN DOES AFTER ASSUMING COMMAND IS TO HANG THE \"SWORD OF DAMOCLES \" OVER HIS CHAIR<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN HE SENDS A MESSAGE TO HIS SHORE BOSSES--WELL YOU BASTARDS--I AM HERE -- STAND BY-- TWANGGGGGGGG --HERE IS ONE KICK ON YOUR COLLECTIVE BALLS ( BY EMAIL ) &nbsp;!<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TWANGGGG ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br />THAT IS THE SOUND OF MULAKHAAT BETWEEN PRIME BALLS AND CAPTAINs SHOE !</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nInsecurity or the sword of Damocles is the chief propulsive power in this world. Some mavericks, like you know who-- welcome a certain amount of frustration as a challenge\u2014it gives them a kick to overcome it. Treat a quickened pulse caused by adrenaline rush as an ally \u2013and not as an enemy. You have the power now to convert fear into excitement, flight to fight.<br />\n<br />\nWhen people gun for them it gives a chance to prove themselves . Tactical anger has more to do than what meets the eye. You can now do things you would not have done normally. Some people need to feel angry in order to create enough leverage on themselves to make a change.<br />\n<br />\nToo little stress may be as harmful as too much stress, especially when you want to get a task done. Some stress or stimulation is needed for optimum performance\u2014this is termed positive stress response PSR. Optimum stimulation causes creativity and change.<br />\n<br />\nPerformance rises as stress increases. Once a optimum point is crossed however, increasing stress impairs judgement and alertness and performance falls off. Too much stress causes panic and feeling of inability to cope.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5150885242750546224\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , serif;\">ONE WEE INCIDENT OUT OF HUNDREDS ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY SHIP WAS PROCEEDING TO SAIGON TO LOAD CARGO USING SHIPs CRANES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;EVERY SINGLE CRANE BROKE DOWN .. &nbsp; &nbsp;WE WANT YOU TO DO BLAH BLAH BLAH- GIVE US SITREPS EVERY 3 HOURS \u2013 BLAH BLAH BLAH \u201c</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SEE THEY WANT TO PUT ME IN A CORNER ON THE ROPES \u2013ON THE DEFENSIVE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VADAKAYIL GOES ON THE OFFENSIVE INSTEAD \u201c YOU HAVE A NEW BANDMASTER ON BOARD. &nbsp;I WILL BE SURPRISED IF MY SHIP HAS EVEN A MINUTE DELAY DUE TO BREAKDOWNS. &nbsp; REST YOUR FEARS \u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY FANS IN SHORE OFFICE TOLD ME\u2014THAT NIGHT MY DETRACTOR BOSSES ( ENGINEERS ) HELD A PARTY \u2013GOT DRUNK \u2013AND CRIED \u2013 WE WILL HANG CAPTAIN BY THE BALLS , IF HE HAS ANY DELAY\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; So the income is assured and 90% of the returns have to be distributed to the shareholders. The returns from Reits are expected to be in the range of 12-13%.<br />\n<br />\nGlobally, Blackstone LP has assets under management to the tune of $103 billion in real estate.<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE CORRUPT POLITICIANS WHO SPONSOR BLACKSTONE<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />WE KNOW WHO HAS ALLOWED WHITE JEWS TO BUY REAL ESTATE IN INDIA AT THROW AWAY PRICES USING SHELL COMPANIES </span></b>&nbsp;.... ...<br />\n<br />\nDLF is the second largest office space owner in the country, after Blackstone.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2014, BLACKSTONE acquired the Express Towers in Nariman Point from the Indian Express Group for close to Rs 900 crore.<br />\n<br />\nIn Budget 2016, the government had removed a major bump in the path of successful listing of REITs: Dividend Distribution Tax (DDT).<br />\n<br />\nDDT was dropped in the case of special purpose vehicles (SPVs). Rules for REITs were relaxed and the investment cap in under-construction projects raised to 20 per cent from 10 per cent. SPVs are now allowed to have holdings in other SPV structures and the limit on the number of sponsors has also been removed.<br />\n<br />\nNow, REITs would own real estate, and most of them are expected to have their shares listed on the stock market.<br />\n<br />\nThe REIT platform has been approved by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) and like mutual funds, it will pool the money from all investors across the country<br />\n<br />\nREITs\u2019 exemption from tax on the distribution of dividends would make it much more attractive for investors<br />\n<br />\nThe Reserve Bank of India (RBI) wants Rothschild's benami banks to invest<br />\n<br />\nChina has sunk its fingers in Indian real estate.<br />\n<br />\nBlackstone Group had invested in Bengaluru-based Salarpuria Sattva<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/small-biz/startups/airbnb-to-invest-in-branding-to-capture-indian-market-over-2-years/articleshow/59127907.cms</span><br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Instead, it encourages criminality.\nMeagre chances of being prosecuted or punished embolden the people to take law\nin their own hands or take help of anti-social elements to evict their tenants,\ntake revenge, etc . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In such a situation\ncriminals thrive and law abiding citizens live under constant threat to their\nlife, liberty, dignity and property. This shakes the constitutional authority\nand erodes the people\u2019s faith in the whole State machinery<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
