SOME WHITE MAN WILL EXPOSTULATE ? AUTHENTICATE YOURSELF CAPTAIN.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS WAS A BRAND NEW CHEMICAL TANKER WHOSE DELIVERY I TOOK FROM A EUROPEAN YARD --CLASSED UNDER LLOYDS REGISTER -- A 100% WHITE MANs ENTERPRISE .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Lloyd's Register Group Limited (LR) is THE oldest and most respected maritime classification society, wholly owned by the Lloyd\u2019s Register Foundation, a UK enterprise dedicated to research and education in science and engineering. The organisation dates back to 1760. Lloyds is GOLD standard.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY HAD ALREADY TAKEN OUT SEVERAL SISTER SHIPS- -ALL COMMANDED BY WHITE CAPTAINS --TILL A BROWN CAPTAIN CAME ON THE SCENE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I made a 1000 item DEFECT LIST . Every equipment was EXCELSIOR white industry.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I was most sarcastic-- dont read more than 40 items in a day--your WHITE brains will get overheated.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When it became too much they would keep a compartment locked -and open it out for the first time for me -- with a group of the yard's best intellectuals following me inside --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">--say a CO2 room -- and I would immediately point out-- CO2 is heavier than air --put the exhaust at the bottom--- remove these \"transport \" locking plates on the 200 CO2 cylinders , or in case of real fire the bank wont release CO2 etc . You will NOT find this in the 1000 item list in the post -- as they rectified it before sailing.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Consider this post below--</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ABOVE WAS A 13 YEAR OLD SHIP-- A BRITISH OFFICERS/ CREW COMPANY --TILL A INDIAN CAPTAIN ( YOURS TRULY ) ASSUMED COMMAND&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITHIN 24 HOURS OF TAKING OVER COMMAND I MADE A 198 ITEM DEFICIENCY LIST- WHICH THIS BRITISH ENTERPRISE WITH ALL THEIR DEADLY INSPECTION AND VETTING PROCESSES COULD NEVER EVEN IMAGINE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE OF THE ITEMS WAS \" THE POST SLOP TANK IS THE CLEAN SLOP TANK AND STARBOARD SLOP TANK IS THE DIRTY SLOP TANK . IN THE PAST 13 YEARS EVERY OIL RECORD BOOK ENTRY ASSUMED THE REVERSE \u201c.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS MEANS FOR 13 YEARS EVERY WHITE CAPTAIN , CHIEF OFFICER LIED--THEIR SIGNATURES ARE IN THE OIL RECORD BOOK.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/annex-1-closed-cycle-wash-on-chemical.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SHIP MOSTLY TRADED IN USA AND EUROPE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY CAPTAIN /CHIEF OFFICER WHO SIGNED THIS BOOK COULD BE THROWN INTO JAIL AND KEYS THROWN AWAY FOR MARINE POLLUTION AND LYING WHITE IN A MOST IMPORTANT OFFICIAL LOG BOOK.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OWNER OF THE COMPANY COULD BE JAILED FOR \"NOT EMPLOYING COMPETENT OFFICERS AND NOT EXERCISING DUE DILIGENCE \".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW DID THEY MAKE THIS GRAVE DISGRACEFUL MISTAKE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ON EVERY SHIP AT SEA , THE CAPTAINS CABIN IS ON THE TOP STARBOARD SIDE WHILE THE CHIEF ENGINEERS CABIN IS ON THE TOP POST SIDE.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS AN UNWRITTEN RULE -- AS WHEN THERE IS A CROSSING SHIP FROM STARBOARD TO POST , THE SHIP HAS TO ALTER COURSE TO STBD AND GO FROM BEHIND THE STERN OF THE CROSSING SHIP ( ROR--RULES OF THE ROAD AT SEA ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEN THERE WAS ANOTHER ITEM ( AMONG 198 ) .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"THIS SHIP HAS MORE THAN 2000 CHARTS-- ALL AUTO SUPPLY --EVERY CHART COSTING MORE THAN 55 US DOLLARS\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WROTE \" THIS SHIP IS SO HUGE THAT IT CANNOT ENTER 85% OF THE PLACES FOR WHICH WE HOLD CHARTS -- AND IT WASTES THE TIME OF THE SECOND MATE WHO HAS TO CORRECT THEM WITH WEEKLY NOTICES.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CHINESE \"SIR\" RAPED SEVERAL BRITISH SHORE BOSSES -- I GOT THIS REPORT FROM A FAN IN THE SHORE OFFICE -- ALL CAPTAINS AND CHIEF ENGINEERS .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AND THEY WERE ALL HOSTILE TO ME WITHIN 24 HOURS OF ME TAKING OVER COMMAND--AS SAME \"AUTO SUPPLY\" STATE EXISTED IN ALMOST ALL THEIR LARGE SHIPS&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I SIGNED OFF AFTER THE STORM--THIS CHINESE SHIP OWNER \"SIR\" CAME TO MEET ME IN MY HOTEL.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; font-weight: bold;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS UBER RICH MAN WANTED TO SEE IF I AM SUPER NATURAL OR A MORTAL HUMAN.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE SPAKE &nbsp; \" IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO MAKE A 198 ITEM DEFECT LIST OF A SHIP IN JUST 24 HOURS OF ASSUMING \" SOMETHING WHICH HAS BEEN MISSED FOR 13 YEARS OF MINUTE INSPECTIONS BY SHIP AND SHORE STAFF ....&nbsp;\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">--AND MORE IMPORTANT I GUESS HE WANTED TO IMPLORE \" DEAR CAPTAIN- SPARE MY HONOURABLE CHINKY SLIT ASSHOLE --IF YOU REPORT TO US COAST GUARD I WILL LOSE MY FORTUNE AND I WILL BE IN JAIL..\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I CAN GIVE THOUSANDS OF SUCH EXAMPLES--&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">TODAY WHEN I SEE A JOHN , DICK OR PRICK IN FRONT OF ME-- I AUTOMATICALLY ASSUME TOTAL SUPERIORITY -- HENCE MY HUMONGOUS CONTEMPT FOR \"PICKLE JOHNS\" AND \"CHUTNEY MARYS\"</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BROWN SAHAB WEARING TIE , AUR BROWN MADAME WEARING SLIT GOWN SHOWING THIGH -- HAI BHAIYYA --WITH FAKE ANGREZI ACCCENT --</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">--LEKIN CHUTNEY / PICKLE - NAY-- PIG SORPOTEL KA BHAAASSS AAYENGA \"</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I ASK MY READERS TO PUT THIS IN \"FAYE SORPOTEL DZOUZAs \" WEBSITE . &nbsp; &nbsp;SHE MAY LIKE TO KNOW WHY CAPTAIN HAS A PROBLEM WITH THE \"WANNABE GORA GAANDS \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_184b+seedCN6lD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_184b+seedCN6lD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assassination of some\nprominent leaders such as Indira Gandhi, Rajiv Gandhi, and Beant Singh forced\nthe authorities to augment the security of V.I.P.s categorizing them under Z\nspecial, Z, Y, X, etc., according to the threat perception.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large number of private\npersons including businessmen, film personalities, etc. have also been provided\nwith police&nbsp; protection because of\nthreats from criminal gangs, especially in big cities. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Why should the private rich and mighty be\ngiven police protection unless he is a most valuable asset to the nation. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Is a Bollywood star kid\nan asset ? Oh yeah ?&nbsp; . Let them hire\ntheir own body guards.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>We dont mind politicians who have taken TOUGH DECISIONS for the watan getting police cover --&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EVERY EXAM FOR POLICE ( INCLUDING\nRE-ORIENTATION COURSE EXAMS ) MUST HAVE A QUESTION ASKING IF THE INDIAN POLICE CAN BE\nMANIPULATED BY RULING POLITICIANS ( LEAVE OUT PM AND CENTRAL HOME MINISTER ) &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Man, when perfected, is the best of animals,\nbut if he is isolated from law and justice, he is the worst of all</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In pre-independence COLONIAL\nperiod the jails were the dumping yards where criminals ( mostly freedom\nfighters on fake charges ) suffered all sort of miseries. &nbsp;&nbsp;The jailers job was to BREAK THE PSYCHE AND\nWILL of the prisoner.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But today, the situation\nhas totally changed; the jails are supposed to be so organized that the inmates\nreceive humane treatment and proper training to become better citizens. A poor\nman who has stolen to SURVIVE is not a criminal. It is our system failure which\nmade this man a criminal.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Specialized training\nprogrammes, including sessions on understanding human psychology,social responsibility,\nbehaviouralism, human rights, yoga and spiritual development, etc. should be\norganized to enhance the capabilities of the jail staff.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I came across Guruji's\nblog almost 9 months back. At first i was shocked to see the truths unveiled in\nthis blog &amp; to be honest i was not ready to believe all until i had done\npersonal research. today our confidence is at that level that readers even\nshare their personal problem with Captain to get benefit from his experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would like to share\nan incidence about a week ago. I had met my school time friend in a shopping\nmall on 1st september. He is currently into merchant Navy. So after some\nexchanging words on each others well being i started ask him that in merchant\nnavy which stream he is into &amp; which one is the toughest one. The toughest\none is carrying chemical tankers. Then i asked him who is the best man to carry\nthis &amp; the answer he gave within a second was guruji's name. i also asked\nhim about the approx paychecks a chemical ship captain would get(Sorry\nguruji).Then he told me many other things about Captain's mastery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; be proud of our\nmotherland(although i was never much attracted to foreign land).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>yes, the toughest is\ntank cleaning of chemical stainless steel tanks. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>sometimes as captain i\ndo NOT sleep for 72 hours-- to ensure continuity of change of shifts.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>and regarding my\nreputation -- it is NOT about my mastery of my job --<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>- it is that i have\nnever ever allowed any of my bosses to ride rough shod over me or my crew. i\nstood like the mighty himalayas covering their a$$es.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>it was an incident\nwhich happened on my first ship as captain, where i had to burn bridges behind\nme , and became don Corleone -- which i was NOT.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>circumstances forced me\nfor safety of my ship and crew to take on big bosses far stronger than me.. &nbsp;who\ncould destroy me by a HUFF and a PUFF.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>i have NOT big claims\nof merit.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>i preserved the dignity\nof captain's chair -- which other captains were unwilling to do out of self\npreservation. &nbsp; mind you,this is NOT about indians , i had united nations crew.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>i have run my own ship\naground twice -- to save life.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; She was once traveling with me in a car, and I passed\nby Muktananda\u2019s ashram. &nbsp;</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The people staying in\nMuktananda\u2019s ashram invited me to be there for a five-minute stay, just to take\na cup of tea. And it was a long journey so I said, \u201cThere is no harm in it.\u201d\nAnyway I love a cup of tea! So I stayed for five minutes. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Nirmala saw Muktananda.\nShe could not believe that this stupid-looking man \u2013 disgusting, more or less a\nbuffoon \u2013 had become a great spiritual leader.</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;\u201c IF\nTHIS MAN CAN BECOME A SPIRITUAL GURU WHY CAN I ?\u201d</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any person who repeatedly files &nbsp;false or frivolous complaints\u2014 must be warned\nfirst and then punished the next time he does it . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sometimes a case must look to be false and\nfrivolous\u2014 but 80 % of the time it will be true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I once met a Bengali boy of my age ( in 1974\n) in Mumbai.&nbsp; While talking he said that\nhis brother is the No 1 diamond jewellery maker in India&nbsp; --a highly skilled craftsman.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He said that Bollywood film stars ask him to\nmake necklaces in their homes to prevent the diamonds being exchanges with fake\nones and that he goes as helper.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He\ntold me the story of Indias No 1 film heroine those days . He and his brother\npacked their suitcases ( for two weeks ) and went to her home. &nbsp;&nbsp;They were made to stay in her bed room and\nshe brought food and drinks. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They had to sleep on her kingsized bed &nbsp;on which she also slept. &nbsp;Before sleeping she would put the diamonds and\nthe unfinished necklace into a safe . The bedroom was converted in a luxury\nprison.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Not believing this I asked him \u201cHow did you\nsleep , who was in&nbsp; the middle ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He replied I was in the middle , and one\nnight he got a terrific hop and tried to poke this beautiful film actress on\nher ass crack &nbsp;\u2013 and she immediately got up and\nput on the lights .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">She did NOT complain to his elder brother. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But his brother figured out , got hoppin' mad and warned him not\nto repeat it again . &nbsp;&nbsp;The younger guy\nwas a handsome bloke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOW IMAGINE .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IF SOME WHISTLEBLOWER\u2014EXAMPLE HER BUILDING WATCHMAN\nOR HER DRIVER ACTS AS A WHISTLE BLOWER , WHO WILL BELIEVE THEIR STORY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE REASON WHY THIS ACTRESS WANTED BOTH THE BONG\nBROTHERS TO SLEEP ON THE SAME BED IS BECAUSE IF SOMEONE BLEW THE WHISTLE AND\nEVEN DID A NARCO TEST\u2014&nbsp; NOBODY WOULD BELIEVE\nTHAT A MOST BEAUTIFUL AND FAMOUS WOMAN ALLOWED TWO UNKNOWN WORKER MEN TO SLEEP\nON HER OWN BED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The diamond necklace would have costed several\ncrores those day and there were more than fifty large diamonds and more smaller ones .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-m-Egx24hYUA/WX7LgS22IEI/AAAAAAABVKI/ibDUbWuKvLgOxeIf7J-SZC2KURRM4opVwCLcBGAs/s1600/diamond-neckWW2lace-250x250.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In November 2003, Satyendra Dubey a\nwhistleblower and National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) engineer was\nmurdered after he exposed corruption in the construction of highways. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most of the project money goes into the bank\naccounts of the corrupt politicians via SHELL COMPANIES . &nbsp;We all know how Mannargudi Mafia got thousands\nof crores .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We all know how a dalit woman politician who\ndid not have CHAAR ANNA in her purse during her young student days is now worth\nthousands of crores. &nbsp;All such corrupt\npoliticians have mafia in their payroll.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now these fan clubs of Bollywood , Tollywood\n, Mollywood stars . How is funding them ? &nbsp;The stars themselves .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Their job is to buy up all tickets in the\ninitial week , clap like hell . &nbsp;&nbsp;Also\nbuy up tickets of their rival stars , BOOOO , break seats and make a high\nprofile exit . This was revealed by a Malayalam star , who is now dead. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;When\none Kannada actor died there were deadly riots and vandalism. &nbsp;&nbsp;Why ? Their meal ticket source dried up.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In March 2011, the Supreme Court refused to\nframe guidelines for protection of whistle blowers in the country, saying that\nit cannot make law. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sorry , we&nbsp; want a law .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In August 2013, a bench of Justices K S\nRadhakrishnan and Arjan Kumar Sikri ruled that identity of whistleblower can\nnever be revealed to the accused facing prosecution under Prevention of\nCorruption Act, 1988. &nbsp;&nbsp;This is where the\nAADHAR card number comes in.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In June 2011, a parliamentary panel\nrecommended that ministers, the higher judiciary, security organisations,\ndefence and intelligence forces and regulatory authorities be brought under the\nwhistleblowers' protection bill to check corruption and the willful misuse of\npower. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Can China be behind this?<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n#############<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJuly 8, 2017 at 6:57 PM<br />\n<br />\nWHY ARE NAXALS INVOLVED IN GORKHALAND PROTESTS<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A CHICKEN NECK CORRIDOR CONNECTING MAIN LAND INDIA TO THE NORTH EAST STATE<br />\n<br />\nTHIS NARROW STRIP OF LAND CREATED THE NAXALBARI REVOLT --WITH FOREIGN WHITE JEW COMMUIST SUPPORT<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS A PASSAGE FROM THE POST BELOW-<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/communist-maoist-naxalite-movements-in_22.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">QUOTE : AS A SMALL SCHOOL BOY , MY MOTHER PRESENTED ME AN ATLAS ON MY BIRTHDAY<br /><br />I opened the atlas and was looking at the map of India when my eyes fell on the narrow strip connecting the mainland to NE states over East Pakistan.<br /><br />I said to myself \u201cIt is easy to cut off this arm \u2013 all that is required is for traitors to grab land at the narrow strip \u201d<br /><br />I even identified the spot of&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Naxalbari&nbsp;</span></b>with Mechi river flowing past, with unrestricted crossing to Nepal for armed traitors to do HIT AND RUN guerilla tactics.<br /><br />I was most shocked when this indeed happened in May 1967 \u2013 a few months later.<br /><br />UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<br />\nLAND GRABBING BY INDIAN COMMIES KICKSTARTED AT NAXALBARI<br />\n<br />\nthe western part of gorkhaland will create a break and the entire north east part of india becomes an island ( like east and west pakistan ) --this is why china is supporting gorkhaland<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">INDIA MUST NEVER ALLOW THE \"CHICKEN NECK\" BE PART OF GORKHALAND</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />GORKHAS HAD SUPPORTED ROTHSCHILD IN THE 1857 FIRST WAR OF INDEPENDENCE</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gorkhaland#/media/File:Gorkhaland_map.jpg</span><br />\n<br />\nWARNING-- MODI MUST IMMEDIATELY DECLARE THAT BENGALI CAN BE REJECTED BY GORKHA SCHOOLS AND ADMIN AND INSTEAD HINDI CAN BE USED<br />\n<br />\nForeign sponsored Bimal Gurung was formerly a Gorkha Volunteers Corps member who fought for the creation of a Gorkhaland state in India during 1986-1988 under the Gorkha National Liberation Front (GNLF)<br />\n<br />\nPrashant Tamang \u2013 a Kolkata police constable hailing from the Darjeeling hills \u2013 caught popular imagination by qualifying for the last rounds of the Indian Idol song contest.<br />\n<br />\nGurung helped Tamang\u2019s cause by reaching out to Nepali-speaking residents of Darjeeling and adjoining areas to vote via SMS for Tamang, who ultimately won the 2008 edition of the show.<br />\n<br />\nTamang was a mediocre singer<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THIS INCIDENT &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ISI FUNDED BIMAL GURUNG</span></b>&nbsp;THINKS OWNS THE GORKHAS .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GnBgGOa-bbU</span><br />\n<br />\nThe largest concentration of Indian Gorkhas is in north Bengal in the hill district of Darjeeling comprising subdivisions of Kurseong, Kalimpong, Darjeeling and parts of Dooars. It has a Gorkha population of nearly 24 lakh compared to six lakh in Sikkim, which became a state in 1975 following Indian annexation.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">The region is of great strategic value. It is contiguous -- or nearly contiguous -- to Nepal, China, Bhutan and Bangladesh.<br /><br />The vulnerable Chicken's Neck and Siliguri Corridor and the National Highway 31A to Sikkim along with the only road and rail links to the North East along the Tiger and Sevok bridges lie in this area.</span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT ARE OUR INDIAN SECURITY AGENCIES WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\nAS A SMALL BOY WITH AN ATLAS I WAS BETTER THAN THEM.<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PM MODI, PMO, PRESIDENT, DEFENCE MINISTER, HOME MINISTER , AJIT DOVAL, ARMED FORCE CHIEF .<br />\n<br />\nNO-- DONT SEND IT TO THAT STUPID WOMAN MAMATA BANNERJEE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Output measured by Jew Rotshchild's Keynesian\nGDP accounting\u2014-especially China\u2019s blatantly massaged variety\u2014 isn\u2019t\nsustainable wealth if it is not rooted in real savings, efficient capital\nallocation and future productivity growth.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; It\nwas funded with credit manufactured by state controlled banks and their shadow\naffiliates, not real savings.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was driven by Chinese Commie govt initiated\ngrowth plans and GDP targets. These were cascaded from the top down to the\nprovince, county and local government levels\u2014\u2013an economic process which is the\nopposite of entrepreneurial at-risk assessments of future market based demand\nand profits.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Uo0tvY_4PlM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Uo0tvY_4PlM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The purpose of credit has been to fund state\nmandated GDP quota\u2019s, ( conjured by MAD commie rulers )&nbsp; not finance efficient investments with\ncalculable risks and returns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China has become a credit-driven economic\nmadhouse. The 54 % of GDP attributable to fixed asset investment actually\nconstitutes the most spectacular spree of malinvestment and waste in recorded\nhistory. It is the footprint of a future depression<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China\u2019s fantastically over-built industry and\npublic infrastructure embodies monumental economic waste equivalent to the\nconstruction of giant dams on dry land--just to keep people busy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the credit pyramid finally collapses or\nsimply stops growing, the pace of construction will decline dramatically. In\nturn, as we suggested above, the collapse of its construction boom will leave\nthe Red Ponzi riddled with economic air pockets and negative spending multipliers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Over the last two years China has engineered\na sophisticated macroeconomic strategy to artificially boost factory prices,\nincrease profits, and ease loan repayments for the most troubled companies.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China announced a OBOR bonanza of billions of\ndollars for the participating countries . &nbsp; Many poor countries couldn\u2019t resist the &nbsp;temptation of the lavish spread.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">There are some countries ( whose rulers have\nbeen BRIBED )--which believe in mortgaging their future and </span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">imperiling</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;the\nprosperity of their people for nothing more than a few billion dollars which\nwill eventually end up becoming an inescapable debt trap--&nbsp; a SHIT situation in which a debt is difficult\nor impossible to repay, typically because high interest payments prevent\nrepayment of the principal.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Over the last three decades China heavily\nsubsidised its export manufacturing sectors at a time when there was a\nprosperous cycle of high global demand of not so high value goods that China\nabundantly provided.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wYfoIXqahqQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wYfoIXqahqQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China is faced with excess industrial\ncapacity, rising labor costs, ageing population, property bubble created by unsustainable\nand idle infrastructure projects, rampant shadow bank lending and transition\nfrom an export driven economy to a more domestic consumption based one backed\nby the technological prowess to manufacture high value goods primarily aimed at\nEurope, the richest continent in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinese Government rely on infrastructure\ndevelopment to sustain artificial growth.. China has a 7.9 trillion USD shadow\nbanking sector\u2026 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If millions who form the labour force are to\nbe laid off for lack of work, the situation could become very volatile.&nbsp; If that were to lead to a CASCADE nay\nDOMINO&nbsp; effect <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China should be sitting pretty as with the\nworld\u2019s largest forex reserves of just over 3 trillion dollars, it can weather\nany kind of untoward economic storm.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China has depleted about USD 1 trillion in\nits foreign exchange reserves since June 2014 to prevent a depreciation\nof the Chinese currency. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China\u2019s debt to GDP ratio rose to 400%,\nthanks to Beijing\u2019s unabated use of cheap credit to stimulate slowing growth,\nunleashing a debt-fuelled spending binge.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Small Chinese firms that can\u2019t get loans by\nthemselves have been winning banks over by getting other companies to guarantee\ntheir borrowings. The companies making those pledges exclude them from their\nbalance sheets, leaving creditors in the dark.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The recent tightening of credit we have seen\nin China is primarily aimed at clamping down on shadow financing. Wealth\nmanagement products have rapidly grown in size, from only 7.8 % of total\nbanking deposits in 2012 to over 22 % today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Rothschild controlled IMF forecast\nChina\u2019s gross domestic product to grow 6.7 per cent this year --the real rate\nis just 3.9%.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WMPs, which are technically investments kept\noff the balance sheets of the book. A wealth management product is an uninsured\nfinancial product sold in China by banks and other financial institutions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Typically they offer a high rate of interest, and, sometimes, guaranteed\nreturn. .. It also does not include provincial obligations that take the form\nof guarantees. Those will have to be bailed out by Beijing\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinese banks rely\non sales of new WMPs to redeem the old ones at maturity. Today, when a customer\nwants his money back, the bank sells a new WMP, and uses that money to cash out\nthe redeeming customer. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The banks use sales of WMPs to invest in the\nriskiest development projects and state-owned enterprises (SOEs) on the edge of\nbankruptcy\u2026 The new investor steps into the shoes of the old with the same bad\nunderlying investment\u2026 These institutions behind these projects, financed by\nthe original WMPs, cannot repay them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So most of the WMPs will never be repaid\u2026\nThat means they may have to be bailed-out by the government when the bubble\nbursts-- when the system finally crumbles\u2026 Chinese WMPs\u2019 are the greatest Ponzi\nscheme in history\u2014a scheme devised by MAD MEN .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WMPs are something like the collateralized\ndebt obligations (CDOs)-- the pooled assets \u2013 such as mortgages, bonds and\nloans \u2013 are essentially debt obligations that serve as collateral for the CDO\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Much of Chinese debt is denominated in U.S. dollars so the situation is made\neven worse by the strong dollar and the global dollar shortage. Both of those\nfactors make dollar-denominated debt much harder to repay\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The debt system is propped up \u2014 for now \u2014 by\nmore debt and dishonest Chinese state accounting. If the banks were forced to\nwrite-down bad loans, the system would have collapsed a long time ago\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LIKE\nBIHARI EXAM TOPPER CHEATS--\u2026HOW LONG WILL CHINA CHEAT BY TABULLASSSANN ?....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HIs0na0CYfY/WXr4pK_DF8I/AAAAAAABVGs/e-OFhyDpaE80SHP-0LZ84rnm9pVJadaYwCLcBGAs/s1600/hKqdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"360\" data-original-width=\"480\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HIs0na0CYfY/WXr4pK_DF8I/AAAAAAABVGs/e-OFhyDpaE80SHP-0LZ84rnm9pVJadaYwCLcBGAs/s640/hKqdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But one dysfunction that cannot be finessed is cash-flow. As every entrepreneur\nand small businessperson knows, cash never lies. You either have it or you\ndon\u2019t\u2026 Because of excessive debt and inability to pay, cash flow problems are\nnow reaching epidemic proportions in China\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Clearly there are no easy answers\nto China\u2019s debt problem\u2026 The only painless escape would be on a wave of\neconomic growth-- and China thinks their OBOR road will solve it ( DUMPING\nGOODS ) --&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">B ALLS IT WILL TAKE OFF !... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China is faced with a mountain of\nunpayable debt, weaker growth, and a stronger dollar that will make the debt\neven harder to repay.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Chinese credit bubble has only one feasible solution,\nChina must use its hard currency reserves to bail-out the entire banking and\nSOE sector ( state owned enterprises ) and try to start over with a relatively\nclean balance sheet\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">USA HAS 20 TRILLION USD DEBT--WHICH JEW OBAMA NEVER SPOKE\nABOUT DURING HIS TWO TERMS OF PRESIDENCY. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The G7 nations are a bunch of\nbeggars -- Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan and the UK\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ONLY INDIA HAS A\nHEALTHY ECONOMY\u2026. OUR GROWTH TODAY IS 10.1 % .. OUR TRAITOR MAIN STEAM MEDIA\nAND THEIR FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS LOVES TO RUN DOWN INDIAs ECONOMY\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Currently, Chinese shadow banks fund approximately 24 % of Chinese debt\u2026 With\nthe global slowdown, many of China\u2019s factories closed resulting in\napproximately 20 million workers unemployed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China\u2019s leaders responded by\ninstituting a $600 billion stimulus plan to build and boost the nation\u2019s\ninfrastructure and provide jobs to its people and dump these goods on the OBOR\nroad\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For the next few years China is unlikely to manage growth rates above\n3.8% on an average\u2014hence this headlong rush into ONE BELT ONE ROAD\u2026. Stimulus\nis becoming less effective, requiring four units of credit for each unit of\ngrowth.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;If this trend continues, China and its local government entities will\npay much more in order to borrow and ultimately get a lower return on every\nunit borrowed..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If interest rates in the United States continue to rise, funds\nwill flee China, causing immense capital outflows. If President Trump imposes\ntariffs on Chinese goods into the United States, this will reduce demand\ncausing China\u2019s economy to slow down--OBOR road or no OBOR road\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China\u2019s growth\nhas been largely driven by investment, but this has started to slow because of\ndeclines in infrastructure and property investment\u2026</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Recent Chinese growth has primarily been\ndriven by the real estate bubble, and that too in second tier cities. First\ntier cities are saturated and they don\u2019t want negative publicity from western\ntourists \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Chinese have a middle-class of several hundred million people\nwith a high propensity to save. Most Chinese don\u2019t get to invest overseas, so\nthey are limited to real estate, gold and local investment products, mostly\nsold through banks\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When customers go into a bank, they are offered a standard\nbank deposit paying about 2%, or a \u201cwealth management product,\u201d (WMP) that pays\nabout 8%.... Many customers naturally take the 8% return and invest in\nbank-managed WMPs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Customers believe the WMPs are guaranteed by the bank or the\ngovernment. They\u2019re not \u2014 WMPs are just unsecured investments\u2026. Along with\nwealth management products from banks, online lenders are jumping into the\ngame, adding to the risks.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are PONZI online Chinese finance companies\nfleecing merrily\u2026 China has depended on debt to grow its economy. China uses\ndebt as the key mechanism to build its infrastructure and expand businesses\u2026\nHowever, the problem is that private and public debt are not only linked, but\nthat both are growing at unsustainable rates .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To expand their operations and\nbe competitive, businesses borrow through bank loans and issuing bonds. \u2026. This\nexpansive lending has occurred for over a decade resulting in $23,600 in bank\nloans, bonds, and other debt obligations for each person in China.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The problem\nis that businesses in China are state-owned enterprises (SOEs) run and owned by\nthe government in order to keep people working. .. Loans come mainly from\nstate-owned banks resulting in money being shifted from one pocket to another\nin the Chinese government accounting methodology\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Compounding matters is that\nChinese businesses often guarantee each other\u2019s loans and debt obligations.\nThis way of doing business makes it easier for a company to obtain a loan that\nwould otherwise be very difficult. The state-owned banks complicate this situation\nby lending primarily to SOEs since they have implied governmental guarantees\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is also the role of shadow banking. Shadow banking is bank-mediated\nbusiness-to-business loans, allowing lending to occur when a potential borrower\nhas been refused by a Chinese bank or not able to float a bond offering..\nMortgage lending has increased sharply, and made up the largest share of bank\nloans..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shadow banking is booming in China.. Chinese growth ( unlike India ) is\nstill driven mainly by debt-fuelled spending and \u00adexports.. China has an\ninsatiable demand for credit.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With stringent controls on banking activities,\nshadow banking had spiraled high with a debt-to-GDP ratio climbing to a\ntowering 400%. China will NOT admit this\u2026 China is now this planets No 1 in\nshadow-banking asset and No 1 in the shadow-banking sector\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most popular forms of shadow banking, are\nso-called entrusted loan agreements and trust loans. Under the former, a\ncompany lends money to another firm with the bank as the middleman, while for\nthe latter, banks use money raised from wealth-management products to invest in\na trust plan, with the proceeds eventually going to a corporate borrower\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shadow banking, a term for financial agents that perform bank-like activity but\nare not regulated as banks, has boomed in China,as a way of circumventing\ngovernment's tight controls on lending.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This has been a key driver of the\nbreakneck growth in debt in the economy.. China is doing endless propaganda\nabout its Eurasian connectivity scheme,-- the One Belt One Road (OBOR), or the\nBelt Road Initiative (BRI)\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is this land-based \"Silk Road Economic\nBelt\" (SREB) and the oceangoing \"Maritime Silk Road\" (MSR)\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India does NOT benefit from the land based connectivity\u2014and we don\u2019t need\nChina\u2019s permission to use the sea..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The strategy underlines China's push to\ntake a larger role in global affairs, and the desire to coordinate\nmanufacturing capacity with other countries\u2014in reality DUMPING their goods\nwhich they keep producing to show some GDP growth \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2017 will see over 2,000\ntrains travel from a dozen Chinese cities to over 20 European destinations on\nnewly built lines and tunnels in Central Asia. Its primary goal is to integrate\nthe rich European economy with that of China\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The shorter term goal is for China\nto emerge as the dominant regional power in its neighborhood\u2014never mind its\nhumongous debt . &nbsp; Paying off &nbsp;debt requires growth, but the growth itself is\nfueled by more debt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China is now at the point where enormous new debt is\nrequired to achieve only modest new growth. This is clearly non-sustainable\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You\u2019re a middle-class Chinese saver and you walk into a bank. They offer you\ntwo investment options. The first is a bank deposit that pays about 2%. The\nother is a WMP ( wealth management products ) that pays about 7%. \u2026 In the past\nten years, bank customers have chosen almost $12 trillion of WMPs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That might\nbe fine if WMPs were like high-quality corporate or municipal bonds. They\u2019re\nnot. They\u2019re more like the biggest Ponzi scheme in history\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What happens when\na WMP matures? Usually the bank customer is encouraged to rollover the\ninvestment into a new WMP. &nbsp; What happens if the customer wants her money back? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The bank sells a new WMP to another customer, then uses those sales proceeds to\nredeem the first customer. The new customer now steps into the shoes of the\nfirst customer with the same pile of bad debt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That\u2019s where the Ponzi dynamic\ncomes in\u2026. Simply put, most of the debts backing up the WMPs cannot be repaid,\nwhich means it\u2019s just a matter of time before the WMP market goes into a full\nmeltdown and triggers a banking panic\u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finally, there is an infrastructure bubble.\nChina has kept its growth engine humming mostly with investment instead of\naggregate demand from consumers\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China projected false growth rates by\ncurrency manipulation and shadow banking.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Chinese economy is run by MAD men.\nGhost cities of China are an example of that which no society should imitate\u2026.\nAbout half of China\u2019s investment in the past ten years has been wasted on\n\u201cghost cities,\u201d white elephant transportation facilities, and prestige projects\nthat look good superficially, but that don\u2019t produce enough revenue or\nefficiencies to pay for themselves.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Much of this investment was financed with\ndebt. If the project itself is not revenue producing then the associated debt\ncannot be repaid, and will go into default\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The toxic combination of\ngovernment debt, corporate debt, WMPs, and unrealistic growth expectations have\nset up China for the greatest market crash in history\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The tail wags the\nChinese dog .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Why would a country hold so\nmuch of bonds of other countries? &nbsp; The answer is, \u201cto manipulate\u201d. &nbsp; Interestingly\nwhen China holds USA Treasury bonds, the return on those bonds are mere 1%. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The best way to arm twist USA is to pump-or-pull these money holdings at will\u2026.\nWith aging, infra and the majority of funds locked in 1% type of investments,\nChinese premier gets a CHINKERILAL KE RANGEEN SAPNE . This will benefit\nChina and NOT these nations who will receive these Chinese loans\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is\nintended to generate demand for the sale of products of Chinese steel mills,\ncement plants and construction companies, which could help this country to\nmaintain employment at home intact.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China to bring the neighbouring countries\nwithin its economic orbit and thereby maintain regional hegemony\u2026 Once a\ncountry falls in China\u2019s debt trap, it becomes far difficult to get out of it\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">China uses its clout on the aid receiving countries to pressurize them to work\nin its own interest. The Kingdom of Ryukyu terminated tributary relations with China\nin 1874. \u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vietnam :: China claims large parts of Vietnam on historical\nprecedent (Ming Dynasty, 1368-1644).
